original: @10b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @10b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pra da'i po dyo ta no dyo ta:n'a ma pa nytsi k'a /
analyzed: pra da'i po dyo ta no dyo ta:n'a ma pa nytsi k'a /
translated: Pradipoddyotana-dyotana-nama-panjika

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i gsal byed ces bya ba'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i gsal byed ces bya ba'i dka' 'grel /
translated: The commentary on the difficult points called Illuminating the Lamp

original: dpal la gsang ba 'dus pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal la gsang ba 'dus pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Guhyasamaja

original: rdo rje slob dpon na dang 'dus par //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon na dang 'dus par //
translated: The vajra master, having drunk

original: rab tu btung nas bshad par bya //
analyzed: rab tu btung nas bshad par bya //
translated: from the Guhyasamaja, should explain.

original: 'bras lam mngon par brjod pa po //
analyzed: 'bras lam mngon par brjod pa po //
translated: The one who expresses the result and path

original: sgron ma gsal byed gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sgron ma gsal byed gsal ba'o //
translated: is the illuminator of the Illuminating Lamp.

original: ci ltar 'bras bu dang lam mngon par brjod pa por brjod ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'bras bu dang lam mngon par brjod pa por brjod ce na /
translated: How is he called the one who expresses the result and path?

original: 'dus pa phyi mar yang gsungs pa //
analyzed: 'dus pa phyi mar yang gsungs pa //
translated: It is also said in the Later Guhyasamaja:

original: rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes brjod de //
analyzed: rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes brjod de //
translated: Tantra is called continuous,

original: rgyun de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyun de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
translated: that continuity becomes threefold.

original: zhes so // dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes so // dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for glorious and so forth,

original: dpal ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te de'i rjod byed yin pa'i phyir dang / de'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir dpal ldan te /
analyzed: dpal ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te de'i rjod byed yin pa'i phyir dang / de'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir dpal ldan te /
translated: glory is nondual wisdom, and because it expresses that and because it has the nature of that, it is glorious.

original: dbye ba med pa la yang ldan par brjod de /
analyzed: dbye ba med pa la yang ldan par brjod de /
translated: Also, one speaks of possession of what is not divisible,

original: gzugs dang ldan bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan bzhin no //
translated: like possession of form.

original: rgyud rgyal zhes pa ni 'dus pa phyi mar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyud rgyal zhes pa ni 'dus pa phyi mar yang gsungs pa /
translated: The term ‚Äúking of tantras‚Äù is stated in the Later Guhyasamaja Tantra:

original: ae ma shin tu rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: ae ma shin tu rnyed dka' ba //
translated: Amazing!

original: thabs ni byang chub sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: thabs ni byang chub sgrub byed yin //
translated: The method is what accomplishes enlightenment.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud //
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud //
translated: The tantra called Guhyasamaja

original: rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa //
translated: Is the supreme of all tantras.

original: legs par gsungs pa'i rgyud 'di ni //
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa'i rgyud 'di ni //
translated: This well-spoken tantra

original: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces so //
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / ces so //
translated: Is the supreme lord of all tantras.üîΩAlso, it is stated in the Commentary to be explained here:

original: 'dir 'chad par 'gyur ba las kyang gsungs pa ji srid ya ra la wa zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: 'dir 'chad par 'gyur ba las kyang gsungs pa ji srid ya ra la wa zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAs long as there are ya ra la wa‚Ä¶‚Äù and so forth.

original: gsal bar rnam phye zhes pa ni /üîΩrnam par 'byed par byed /
analyzed: gsal bar rnam phye zhes pa ni / rnam par 'byed par byed /
translated: ‚ÄúClearly explained‚Äù meansüîΩthat it is analyzed,

original: rnam par bshad par byed pa la /
analyzed: rnam par bshad par byed pa la /
translated: that it is explained.

original: 'dus pa phyi ma dang / dgongs pa lung ston pa dang / ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa dang / rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud rnams kyi 'phral du skabs su bab pa rnam par bshad pas //
analyzed: 'dus pa phyi ma dang / dgongs pa lung ston pa dang / ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa dang / rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud rnams kyi 'phral du skabs su bab pa rnam par bshad pas //
translated: In the Later Guhyasamaja Tantra, the Sandhivyakarana Tantra, the Jnanavajra-samuccaya Tantra, and the Vajravali Tantra, the relevant passages are explained.

original: rgyud gsum du zad pas shin tu gsal ba rnams kyis 'dus pa'i don rnam par bshad par byed pa nyid rtsom pa nyid 'di rnams rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyud gsum du zad pas shin tu gsal ba rnams kyis 'dus pa'i don rnam par bshad par byed pa nyid rtsom pa nyid 'di rnams rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the composition of this commentary on the meaning of the Guhyasamaja Tantra is undertaken in order to engage in the explanation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir shin tu legs bshad pa zhes pa ni yang dag par brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir shin tu legs bshad pa zhes pa ni yang dag par brjod pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is called very well explained, which is correct expression.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba yang /
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba yang /
translated: It will also be said:

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: Following the explanatory tantras,

original: bshad smra shin tu snyed par dka' //
analyzed: bshad smra shin tu snyed par dka' //
translated: the explanation is very difficult to express.

original: 'di ltar drangs te bshad pa ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar drangs te bshad pa ni //
translated: Thus, the explanation is drawn

original: rnal 'byor rgyud las gzhan du min //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud las gzhan du min //
translated: from the Yoga Tantra, not elsewhere.

original: zhes so // de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /üîΩgal te yan @11a * //
analyzed: zhes so // de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te / gal te yan @11a * //
translated: The intention of that is as follows:

original: mdo dang rgyud dang rtogs pa la sogs pa chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyis 'dus pa'i don so sor rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mdo dang rgyud dang rtogs pa la sogs pa chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyis 'dus pa'i don so sor rtogs par bya'o //
translated: If one wishes to understand the meaning of the Guhyasamaja Tantra, one should understand it by means of the four hundred and ninety-nine explanatory tantras.

original: de ltar yang bzhi po 'di nyid kyis legs par drang sa te yang dag par so sor rtogs pa'i yul du rgya cher 'grel gyis bshad pa ni 'dus pa'i rgyud kyis bshad par bya ba rgyud dag gi 'grel pa yang dag par gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar yang bzhi po 'di nyid kyis legs par drang sa te yang dag par so sor rtogs pa'i yul du rgya cher 'grel gyis bshad pa ni 'dus pa'i rgyud kyis bshad par bya ba rgyud dag gi 'grel pa yang dag par gsal bar byed do //
translated: Thus, these four are well drawn, and the commentary of the Extensive [Commentary] on the object of correct discernment is explained.

original: mtha' drug gi ni 'ching bas bcings //
analyzed: mtha' drug gi ni 'ching bas bcings //
translated: It is bound by the bonds of the six limits.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is said:

original: 'ching ba lta bus bcings pas rang dbang med pa can du byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'ching ba lta bus bcings pas rang dbang med pa can du byas pa'o //
translated: It is bound by the bonds of the six limits, like being bound by fetters, making it powerless.

original: mtha' drug gi don gyi 'ching ba ni mchog tu 'das pa rang gi rang nyid ma yin pa'i don gzhan mngon par brjod par nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' drug gi don gyi 'ching ba ni mchog tu 'das pa rang gi rang nyid ma yin pa'i don gzhan mngon par brjod par nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the six limits is bound by the supreme, because it is able to express the meaning of another that is not itself.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gang zhig 'dir ji bzhin pa'i sgra'i don tsam du 'chang par byed de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gang zhig 'dir ji bzhin pa'i sgra'i don tsam du 'chang par byed de /
translated: For that very reason, who here holds to the mere literal meaning as it is?

original: rim pa lnga rnams mthar gyis gnas pa med par mchog tu 'das pa'i don gzhan ston par byed de ;
analyzed: rim pa lnga rnams mthar gyis gnas pa med par mchog tu 'das pa'i don gzhan ston par byed de ;
translated: The five stages are taught without sequence, showing the supreme meaning of another that is beyond.

original: de ni yang dag pa ma yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur pa yang /
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa ma yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur pa yang /
translated: That is not correct.

original: rim pa 'di nyid kyis na /
analyzed: rim pa 'di nyid kyis na /
translated: This very process

original: bzhugs pa'i tshig nas brtsams te mtha' rnam pa drug tu bshad pa dang / rnam pa bzhir bshad pa 'dis dpal 'dus pa'i don rgyas btab po //
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i tshig nas brtsams te mtha' rnam pa drug tu bshad pa dang / rnam pa bzhir bshad pa 'dis dpal 'dus pa'i don rgyas btab po //
translated: is the seal of the extensive meaning of the glorious GuhyasamƒÅja, beginning with the words ‚Äúabiding‚Äù and explained in terms of the six and four modes.

original: de ma rtogs par ji bzhin par bshad pa'i sgra don tsam la brten te yul rnams la chags pa rnams 'gal ba dang / shin tu rmad du gyur pa'i bya ba byas nas /
analyzed: de ma rtogs par ji bzhin par bshad pa'i sgra don tsam la brten te yul rnams la chags pa rnams 'gal ba dang / shin tu rmad du gyur pa'i bya ba byas nas /
translated: Those who are attached to objects based on the mere literal meaning of the explanation as it is without realizing that will perform actions that are contradictory and extremely amazing.

original: las kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: They will come under the power of karma.üîΩAnd so on.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And:

original: slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyi lam las ni //
analyzed: slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyi lam las ni //
translated: Those outside the path of the venerable NƒÅgƒÅrjuna

original: phyi rol gyur la zhi pa'i thabs med do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyur la zhi pa'i thabs med do //
translated: have no means of peace.

original: de dag kun rdzob de nyid bdag las nyams //
analyzed: de dag kun rdzob de nyid bdag las nyams //
translated: They are lost with respect to the conventional and the ultimate.

original: de dag nyams pas thar pa grub yod min //
analyzed: de dag nyams pas thar pa grub yod min //
translated: Since they are lost, they do not achieve liberation.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: yan lag bzhi pa la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs byas pa de sgom pa po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin skye bar khyad par du sgrogs pa gang yin pa de ci lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: yan lag bzhi pa la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs byas pa de sgom pa po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin skye bar khyad par du sgrogs pa gang yin pa de ci lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn't it proclaimed that the meditation of those who perform the sadhana of the four branches, etc. is especially productive of samadhi?

original: bden te / 'on kyang de la yang la la bdag tu mthong ba med par phyi rol lta bur sems par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden te / 'on kyang de la yang la la bdag tu mthong ba med par phyi rol lta bur sems par 'gyur ro //
translated: True, but even there, some think of the deity as external, without seeing it as the self.

original: yongs su dag pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyi rim pa yongs su shis pa las /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyi rim pa yongs su shis pa las /
translated: From the complete purification of the stage of the form of the completely pure Vajrasattva,

original: de byas pa de rnams kyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'i @11b ngo bo sangs rgyas nyid do //üîΩmtha' drug gi ni 'ching pa rnams kyis zhes pa'i mang po'i tshig ni don drug po rnams kyis mang ba'i phyir dang / gang bshad pa rnam bzhi ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don yang rung ste /
analyzed: de byas pa de rnams kyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'i @11b ngo bo sangs rgyas nyid do // mtha' drug gi ni 'ching pa rnams kyis zhes pa'i mang po'i tshig ni don drug po rnams kyis mang ba'i phyir dang / gang bshad pa rnam bzhi ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don yang rung ste /
translated: the nature of Great Vajradhara is buddhahood.üîΩThe plural particle all in by the bonds of the six parameters is because there are six topics, and the four explained are also suitable as illustrative topics,

original: mtha' drug gi sgra nyid kyis don drug gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' drug gi sgra nyid kyis don drug gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the term six parameters itself teaches the six topics.

original: 'ching ba rnams kyis ni don bcings pa lta bus rang dbang med par byas nas /
analyzed: 'ching ba rnams kyis ni don bcings pa lta bus rang dbang med par byas nas /
translated: The bonds make the meaning bound, as it were, and so they make one powerless,

original: de rnams brling ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de rnams brling ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like a heavy burden, etc.

original: rgyal sras yul gyur zhes pa ni rgyal pa ni yang dag par rdzags  pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: rgyal sras yul gyur zhes pa ni rgyal pa ni yang dag par rdzags  pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: The domain of the victors‚Äô sons refers to the domain of the victors, i.e. the perfect buddhas.

original: de rnams kyi sras po ni thugs las skyes pa'i klu sgrub kyi zhabs dang / de dang mtshungs pa gzhan yang ngo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sras po ni thugs las skyes pa'i klu sgrub kyi zhabs dang / de dang mtshungs pa gzhan yang ngo //
translated: The sons of those are the sons of the mind, i.e. the venerable NƒÅgƒÅrjuna, and others who are similar to him.

original: de rnams kyi spyod yul te so sor rang gis rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi spyod yul te so sor rang gis rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That is their domain, because it is to be known individually by each.

original: rin po che'i gang zag kyang ste /
analyzed: rin po che'i gang zag kyang ste /
translated: It is also the domain of the precious person,

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyi skal par byed pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyi skal par byed pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: because it is the domain of the victors‚Äô sons,

original: de dag gi yul lo //
analyzed: de dag gi yul lo //
translated: because it is their domain.

original: 'dus gang yin zhes pa ni sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus gang yin zhes pa ni sbyor ba'o //
translated: What is the assembly? It is the application.

original: ci rnams kyi zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci rnams kyi zhen gsungs pa /
translated: Whose? It is said:

original: rgyal ba yi ste dus gsum gyi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste /üîΩ'dus pa phyi mar yang gsungs pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba yi ste dus gsum gyi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste / 'dus pa phyi mar yang gsungs pa //
translated: The victors, i.e. the perfect buddhas of the three times.üîΩIt is also said in the TathƒÅgataguhyas≈´tra:

original: 'dus pa spyor bar rab gsungs te //
analyzed: 'dus pa spyor bar rab gsungs te //
translated: The assembly is well proclaimed as the application.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon na rjod byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon na rjod byed //
translated: All the Buddhas are manifest in the recitation.

original: ces so // gal te 'di rgyal sras kyi yul yin no /
analyzed: ces so // gal te 'di rgyal sras kyi yul yin no /
translated: If this is the domain of the Sons of the Victor,

original: ci ltar don ni dngos po rnams 'dir rnam par bshad par rab tu 'brel bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar don ni dngos po rnams 'dir rnam par bshad par rab tu 'brel bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how is it that the meaning of the terms is related to the explanation here?üîΩIt is said:

original: gsungs pa / de ni dpal klu sgrub las rnyed pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gsungs pa / de ni dpal klu sgrub las rnyed pa zhes pa ni /
translated: That is found in the lineage of the glorious Nagarjuna.

original: klu sgrub zhabs kyi brgyud pa las rnyed pa ste /
analyzed: klu sgrub zhabs kyi brgyud pa las rnyed pa ste /
translated: It is found in the lineage of the glorious Nagarjuna.

original: mod dang bsre bar byed par gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: mod dang bsre bar byed par gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is said that it is mixed with the present,

original: dpal klu sgrub zhabs gyi brgyud pa las 'dus pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpal klu sgrub zhabs gyi brgyud pa las 'dus pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: following the explanatory tantra of the Guhyasamaja found in the lineage of the glorious Nagarjuna.üîΩThe two stages are the bases,

original: rim gnyis gnas zhes ba ni rim pa zung ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis te de dag gi rten no //
analyzed: rim gnyis gnas zhes ba ni rim pa zung ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis te de dag gi rten no //
translated: the two stages are the generation stage and the perfection stage, and they are the bases of that.

original: de dag 'dir so sor ston pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dag 'dir so sor ston pa'i phyir te /
translated: They are taught here individually,

original: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
translated: because it is said in the Later Guhyasamaja:

original: rdo rje can gyis chos ston to //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis chos ston to //
translated: The one with the vajra teaches the Dharma

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs so //
translated: in dependence on the two stages.

original: rim pa lnga yis bsdus pa'i don //
analyzed: rim pa lnga yis bsdus pa'i don //
translated: The meaning subsumed in the five stages

original: shes nas mtha' drug la 'jug go //
analyzed: shes nas mtha' drug la 'jug go //
translated: is known, and one enters the six limits.

original: zhes 'chad bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes 'chad bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't this explained?

original: de rim gnyis kyi gnas ci lta yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rim gnyis kyi gnas ci lta yin zhe na /
translated: What is the location of the two stages?

original: ri ma pa lnga po 'di dag nyid bskyed pa @12a * //
analyzed: ri ma pa lnga po 'di dag nyid bskyed pa @12a * //
translated: These very five topics are included in the generation

original: dang ; rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag gi nang du gtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dang ; rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag gi nang du gtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: and completion stages.

original: de ni rdzogs pa dang las rab 'byam la sogs pa byed pa rnams te 'dir nyes pa med de /
analyzed: de ni rdzogs pa dang las rab 'byam la sogs pa byed pa rnams te 'dir nyes pa med de /
translated: That is the completion, the performance of various activities, and so on. There is no fault here,

original: rim pa gnyis kyi dmigs pa rnams sku la sogs pa'i rnam par byas pa ni las rab 'byam la sogs pa'i mngon par brjod bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis kyi dmigs pa rnams sku la sogs pa'i rnam par byas pa ni las rab 'byam la sogs pa'i mngon par brjod bya'o //
translated: because the objects of observation of the two stages, which are made into the form of the body, and so on, are the subject matter of the performance of various activities, and so on.

original: rgyas btab pa ni legs par gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: rgyas btab pa ni legs par gsungs pa ste /
translated: The seal is well spoken,

original: bla na med cing gzhal du med pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bla na med cing gzhal du med pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the support of incomparable and immeasurable good qualities.

original: 'dus pa rin po che la rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa rin po che la rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: It is the seal of the precious assembly, and it is blessed.

original: sangs rgyas kyis zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The buddhas are an example.

original: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang ngo //
translated: and also by the Bodhisattvas, etc.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni dpal ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni dpal ni shes rab bo //
translated: The glorious Vajrasattva is as follows: glorious is wisdom.

original: rdo rje bzhin du sems dpa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag tu sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhin du sems dpa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag tu sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of being a sattva being like a vajra, he is Vajrasattva, because he unites with cyclic existence and nirvana.

original: dpal ldan yang de yin la rdo rje sems dpa' yang de yin pa'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan yang de yin la rdo rje sems dpa' yang de yin pa'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Because he is glorious and also Vajrasattva, he is the glorious Vajrasattva.

original: bshad ces pa ni ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar rtogs par byed pa ni 'chad bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: bshad ces pa ni ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar rtogs par byed pa ni 'chad bar byed pa ste /
translated: The explanation is as follows: He who explains what he has heard and what he has understood is the expounder.

original: rang dbang gis rdo rje 'chang chen po bzhin nam /
analyzed: rang dbang gis rdo rje 'chang chen po bzhin nam /
translated: Either by his own power, like the Great Vajradhara,

original: gzhan dbang gis 'phags pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan dbang gis 'phags pa bzhin no //
translated: or by the power of another, like the Arya [Vimuktasena].

original: de nyid kyi phyir ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ;
translated: For that very reason,

original: rim pas zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rim pas zhes gsungs te /
translated: he says in stages.

original: rim pa lnga'i go rims kyis so //
analyzed: rim pa lnga'i go rims kyis so //
translated: By the sequence of the five stages.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: He says that:

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la 'khor par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la 'khor par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The generation stage is to be generated, that is, the generation stage, etc.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bsdus pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bsdus pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The creation stage is the concise stage.üîΩThe body isolation taught in the Compendium of Practice is the concise

original: rigs brgya la sogs pa spyod bsdus su gsungs pa'i lus rnam par dpen pa yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rigs brgya la sogs pa spyod bsdus su gsungs pa'i lus rnam par dpen pa yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
translated: form of the hundred families and so on.üîΩIt is the first because it is the object of the beginner and because it is the

original: dang po yin zhes bya ba ni dang po ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir dang rags pa'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po yin zhes bya ba ni dang po ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir dang rags pa'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: coarse yoga.

original: gsang sngags kun ni rab sgrub byed //
analyzed: gsang sngags kun ni rab sgrub byed //
translated: It is the accomplishment of all mantras.üîΩThis passage eliminates the wisdom body from the meaning of the word

original: ces pa 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sgra la ye shes kyi sku rnam par gcod pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sgra la ye shes kyi sku rnam par gcod pa ste /
translated: creation stage.

original: ye shes kyi sku la yang ye shes kyi rim pas bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku la yang ye shes kyi rim pas bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the wisdom body is also created by the wisdom stage.üîΩBecause it is taught in the Compendium of Practice that without the

original: lus rnam par dben pa med dpar ngag rnam par dben pa shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes spyod bsdus su gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lus rnam par dben pa med dpar ngag rnam par dben pa shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes spyod bsdus su gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: body isolation, speech isolation cannot be known,

original: lus rnam par dben pa las gzhan pa'i @12b ngag rnam par dben pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: lus rnam par dben pa las gzhan pa'i @12b ngag rnam par dben pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: the speech isolation stage is different from the body isolation.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: sems la dmigs pa tsam zhig ni //
analyzed: sems la dmigs pa tsam zhig ni //
translated: The mere observation of the mind

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: sems la dmigs pa ni sems la dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: sems la dmigs pa ni sems la dmigs pa ste /
translated: The observation of mind is the observation of the mind.

original: de tsam zhig ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de tsam zhig ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: That alone is its result.

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: ji srid rlung ni mi rgyu zhing //
analyzed: ji srid rlung ni mi rgyu zhing //
translated: As long as the wind does not move

original: snang ba mi g-yo bar gyur pa //
analyzed: snang ba mi g-yo bar gyur pa //
translated: and the appearance is unmoving,

original: zhes so // ni'i sgra ni nges par bzung ba ste //
analyzed: zhes so // ni'i sgra ni nges par bzung ba ste //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for emphasis.

original: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched dang / yul la sogs pa rim pa dang por lha'i gzugs des rnam par brtags pa la /
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched dang / yul la sogs pa rim pa dang por lha'i gzugs des rnam par brtags pa la /
translated: The aggregates, elements, sense-fields, objects, etc., which are of the nature of the internal and external, are imagined by that divine form in the first stage.

original: sems tsam du kun du snang ba la sogs pa snang ba gsum po kho na rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba 'dis rim pa gzhan 'di'i rnam par ga cod par ston to //
analyzed: sems tsam du kun du snang ba la sogs pa snang ba gsum po kho na rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba 'dis rim pa gzhan 'di'i rnam par ga cod par ston to //
translated: The three appearances, such as the appearance as mere mind, etc., are just the second stage. This shows that this other stage is of the same nature as the former.

original: lus la brten pa med par 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rlung gi de kho na nyid dang / brjod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags kyi de kho na nyid dag nye bar dmigs pa med pa'i phyir 'di dang po ma yin te /
analyzed: lus la brten pa med par 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rlung gi de kho na nyid dang / brjod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags kyi de kho na nyid dag nye bar dmigs pa med pa'i phyir 'di dang po ma yin te /
translated: It is not the first, because the reality of the wind, which is the basis of the body, and the reality of the mantra, which is the basis of speech, are not perceived,

original: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / 'di sems rnam par dben par brjod pa can nyid kyi phyir gsum pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / 'di sems rnam par dben par brjod pa can nyid kyi phyir gsum pa ma yin no //
translated: and because it is explained that it is not the domain of the conceptual yogi. And it is not the third, because it is said to be the isolation of mind.

original: yid 'ong rim pa gsum pa yin //
analyzed: yid 'ong rim pa gsum pa yin //
translated: The third is the stage of the pleasing.

original: zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni ;
translated: This is

original: gsum pa zhes pa gnyis pa'i phyogs las 'di phra ba'i phyir dang / bzhi pa'i phyogs las rags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsum pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa zhes pa gnyis pa'i phyogs las 'di phra ba'i phyir dang / bzhi pa'i phyogs las rags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gsum pa'o //
translated: because it is the third, since it is subtler than the second stage and coarser than the fourth stage.

original: kun du snang pa'i snang ba la sogs pa gsum po nyid rang byin gyis brlab pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: kun du snang pa'i snang ba la sogs pa gsum po nyid rang byin gyis brlab pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And because the three, the appearance of all, etc., are the nature of the self-consecration.

original: rang byin gyis brlab pa la sems rnam par dben pa tha mi dad de /
analyzed: rang byin gyis brlab pa la sems rnam par dben pa tha mi dad de /
translated: In self consecration, the mind and the three isolations are not different.

original: gsungs pa yang /üîΩsnang pa gnyi ga'i rgyur gyur pa //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang / snang pa gnyi ga'i rgyur gyur pa //
translated: It is said:üîΩThe cause of both appearances

original: bdag gi dngos por rnam par brtags //
analyzed: bdag gi dngos por rnam par brtags //
translated: Is imagined as the entity of self.

original: zhes dang / ye shes gsum po rnam pa med pa zhes spyod pa bsdus su gsungs pa ma yin na ma zhe na /
analyzed: zhes dang / ye shes gsum po rnam pa med pa zhes spyod pa bsdus su gsungs pa ma yin na ma zhe na /
translated: And in the Compendium of Practice it says, ‚ÄúThe three wisdoms are without aspect.‚Äù

original: bden te 'on kyang ye shes gsum gyi 'bras bu yin pa nyid kyi rim pa gsum par mngon par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: bden te 'on kyang ye shes gsum gyi 'bras bu yin pa nyid kyi rim pa gsum par mngon par brjod par bya ste /
translated: This is true, but because it is the result of the three wisdoms, it is to be expressed as the third stage.

original: thog mar bshad pa'i rim pa gnyis po dag gi 'ang de 'bras bu dag tu mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyid 'ong ni 'od zer lnga yang dag par mchog tu 'bar ba /üîΩmtshan sum cu @13a * //
analyzed: thog mar bshad pa'i rim pa gnyis po dag gi 'ang de 'bras bu dag tu mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro // yid 'ong ni 'od zer lnga yang dag par mchog tu 'bar ba / mtshan sum cu @13a * //
translated: This is because it is expressed as the result of the first two stages that were explained.

original: rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i longs spyod rjog  pa'i sku so sor ston pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i longs spyod rjog  pa'i sku so sor ston pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Pleasing is the one who displays the enjoyment body endowed with the thirty-two major marks, blazing with the five supreme lights.

original: kun rdzob bden pa bstan pa ni //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa bstan pa ni //
translated: The explanation of the conventional truth

original: zhes ba ni kun rdzob pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can 'di nyid bden pa ste /
analyzed: zhes ba ni kun rdzob pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can 'di nyid bden pa ste /
translated: This is the truth of the aggregates, elements, etc. , of the relative, which are of the nature of the outer and inner.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is thus:

original: sgyu ma lta bu rnam par rig ba tsam nyid do //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu rnam par rig ba tsam nyid do //
translated: the mere representation which is like an illusion.

original: bden pa'i kun rdzob ni kun rdzob bden pa ste rang byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa'i kun rdzob ni kun rdzob bden pa ste rang byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: The truth of the relative is the relative truth, which is the self-consecration.

original: rnal 'byor ba so sor dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba so sor dag pa ste /
translated: The individual purity of the yogi/nis is the third stage.

original: 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa ni rim pa bzhi pa ste rim pa lnga pa las rags pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa ni rim pa bzhi pa ste rim pa lnga pa las rags pa'o //
translated: The realization of the nature of clearlight is the fourth stage, which is the gross of the five stages.

original: 'di yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid don dam par yang brjod par bya ste ;
analyzed: 'di yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid don dam par yang brjod par bya ste ;
translated: This is also to be stated as the ultimate reality of phenomena.

original: 'khor ba'i mthar thug par mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i mngon zhen gtong bar byed pa'i don no //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i mthar thug par mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i mngon zhen gtong bar byed pa'i don no //
translated: It is the meaning of the abandonment of the clinging to samsara by those who cling to the finality of samsara.

original: gsungs pa yang /üîΩgang gis skye ba yod min nyid //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang / gang gis skye ba yod min nyid //
translated: It is also stated:üîΩWhere there is no production at all

original: de yi mya ngan 'das yod min //
analyzed: de yi mya ngan 'das yod min //
translated: there is no nirvana.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: ye shes gsum po rnam pa med cing chos nyid kyang rnam pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ye shes gsum po rnam pa med cing chos nyid kyang rnam pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: Are not the three intuitions devoid of aspects, and is not reality also devoid of aspects?

original: 'di dag dbye ba de ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag dbye ba de ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the distinction between these?

original: spyod bsdus su gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: spyod bsdus su gsungs pa yang /
translated: The Compendium of Practice says:

original: ye shes gsum po rnam pa med pa don dam pa'i bden pa ltar reg par dka' ba ni bden mod kyi /
analyzed: ye shes gsum po rnam pa med pa don dam pa'i bden pa ltar reg par dka' ba ni bden mod kyi /
translated: It is true that the three intuitions are devoid of aspects and are difficult to touch, like ultimate truth.

original: 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas pa yin pa des na rjes su dpag pas rtogs par bya ste rlung gi khams bzhin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas pa yin pa des na rjes su dpag pas rtogs par bya ste rlung gi khams bzhin no //
translated: Nevertheless, they are accompanied by appearances, and therefore they are to be realized by inference, like the element of wind.

original: ji ltar rlung gi khams ni gzugs can ma yin yang grang dro'i reg pa dang / shing la sogs pa g-yo zhing 'gul ba la sogs pa'i rtags las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rlung gi khams ni gzugs can ma yin yang grang dro'i reg pa dang / shing la sogs pa g-yo zhing 'gul ba la sogs pa'i rtags las shes par bya'o //
translated: Just as the element of wind is not a form, it is to be known by signs, such as the touch of cold and warmth and the movement and shaking of trees and so on.

original: de bzhin du snang ba'i ye shes gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du snang ba'i ye shes gsum mo //
translated: In the same way, the three intuitions are appearances.

original: gang yang snang ba'i rtags kyis shes par bya ba de yang zla ba'i snang bal sogs pa'i rnam pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: gang yang snang ba'i rtags kyis shes par bya ba de yang zla ba'i snang bal sogs pa'i rnam pa'o zhes so //
translated: That which is to be known by the signs of appearances is also the form of the appearance of the moon and so on.

original: 'od gsal ba ni snang ba med ba ste /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni snang ba med ba ste /
translated: Clear light is without appearances.

original: snang ba dang bcas pa'i ye shes rtags can nye bar sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba dang bcas pa'i ye shes rtags can nye bar sdud pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of the meditative absorption of the wisdom that is endowed with appearances.

original: 'phags pas theg pa chen po nyid shu pa las gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: 'phags pas theg pa chen po nyid shu pa las gsungs pa yang /
translated: And the noble Twenty-Five Thousand also says:

original: sgyu ma'i rnam pas sgyu ma ni //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rnam pas sgyu ma ni //
translated: An illusion is an illusion by way of an aspect.

original: gang tshe nye bar sdud pa na //
analyzed: gang tshe nye bar sdud pa na //
translated: When it is withdrawn,

original: de tshe sgyu ma yod ma yin //
analyzed: de tshe sgyu ma yod ma yin //
translated: at that time the illusion does not exist.

original: de 'dir chos rnams chos nyid do //
analyzed: de 'dir chos rnams chos nyid do //
translated: This is the reality of phenomena here.

original: zhes so // rnam shes ni rang bzhin gsum po nyid kyi bstan bya ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhes so // rnam shes ni rang bzhin gsum po nyid kyi bstan bya ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt consciousness itself the object of the three natures?

original: de ci ltar 'di yis nye bar sdud ce na /
analyzed: de ci ltar 'di yis nye bar sdud ce na /
translated: How can it be withdrawn by this?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: lang kar gshegs par gsungs pa /
analyzed: lang kar gshegs par gsungs pa /
translated: The Descent into La·πÖkƒÅ says:

original: blo yis rnam dbye bya bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: blo yis rnam dbye bya bzhin pa'o //
translated: It is like the analysis by the mind.

original: gzhan @13b dbang med cing brtag pa'ang med //
analyzed: gzhan @13b dbang med cing brtag pa'ang med //
translated: There is no other-dependent and no imagined,

original: grub pa yod min dngos po bral //
analyzed: grub pa yod min dngos po bral //
translated: no establishment and no things.üîΩHow is it imagined by the mind?

original: ci ltar blo yis rnam par brtag / rang bzhin med cing rnam rig med //
analyzed: ci ltar blo yis rnam par brtag / rang bzhin med cing rnam rig med //
translated: There is no nature and no consciousness,

original: dngos po med cing kun gzhi med //
analyzed: dngos po med cing kun gzhi med //
translated: no things and no all-base.

original: byis pa dan pa rtog ge pa //
analyzed: byis pa dan pa rtog ge pa //
translated: The childish, the logicians,

original: ro dang 'dra bas rnam par brtags //
analyzed: ro dang 'dra bas rnam par brtags //
translated: imagine it like a corpse.

original: zhes so // 'phags pas kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam par bshad pa las /
analyzed: zhes so // 'phags pas kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam par bshad pa las /
translated: And the noble NƒÅgƒÅrjuna also says, in his Exposition of Bodhicitta:üîΩThis mind, which is of one nature, emptiness, is imagined

original: stong nyid bdag nyid tshul gcig gi / sems 'di nyid ni kun brtags dang // gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub pa //
analyzed: stong nyid bdag nyid tshul gcig gi / sems 'di nyid ni kun brtags dang // gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub pa //
translated: to be imagined, dependent, and real.

original: nyid ces brtags nas mngon par brjod //
analyzed: nyid ces brtags nas mngon par brjod //
translated: Having imagined it thus, it is expressed.

original: ces so // de ltar rim pa bzhi po de dag mthar gyis bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ces so // de ltar rim pa bzhi po de dag mthar gyis bstan pa ni /
translated: Thus, the four stages are taught in sequence.

original: sprul pa la sogs pa sku gsum so sor tha dad pa yid dang ngag gi lam gyi yul du so sor rtog pa'i lam nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: sprul pa la sogs pa sku gsum so sor tha dad pa yid dang ngag gi lam gyi yul du so sor rtog pa'i lam nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: The path of the three bodies, such as the emanation body, which are different from one another, is the path of discernment, the object of the mind and speech, and it is the engagement with the world.

original: da ni sku gsum rang bzhin gcig pa sku bzhi pa'i lam nyid kyis mngon par brjod pa rim pa lnga pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni sku gsum rang bzhin gcig pa sku bzhi pa'i lam nyid kyis mngon par brjod pa rim pa lnga pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the fifth stage is taught, the path of the four bodies, the single nature of the three bodies, which is the path of expression.

original: lnga pa zhes pa ni phung po la sogs pa'i dngos po med par rags pa la mi ltos pas lnga pa ste /
analyzed: lnga pa zhes pa ni phung po la sogs pa'i dngos po med par rags pa la mi ltos pas lnga pa ste /
translated: The fifth is the fifth because the absence of entities, such as the aggregates, does not depend on gross objects.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa nyid kyis 'di shes pa dang brjod par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phra mo nyid ni bzhi pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa nyid kyis 'di shes pa dang brjod par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phra mo nyid ni bzhi pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it cannot be known or expressed by things, non-things, sa·πÉsƒÅra, nirvƒÅ·πáa, and so on, and because subtlety is the fourth.

original: 'di'i ming gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i ming gsungs pa /
translated: Its name is stated:

original: zung 'jug ces bya zhes so //
analyzed: zung 'jug ces bya zhes so //
translated: It is called ‚Äúunion.‚Äù

original: 'di'i ming gi bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di'i ming gi bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of its name is:

original: bden gnyis sbyor ba gang yin pa ste de las bdag nyid yongs su shes pa ste /
analyzed: bden gnyis sbyor ba gang yin pa ste de las bdag nyid yongs su shes pa ste /
translated: It is the union of the two truths. From that, there is complete knowledge of the self.üîΩComplete knowledge itself is its meditation.

original: yongs su shes pa nyid ni 'di'i sgom pa nyid do zhes spyod bsdus su gsungs so //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa nyid ni 'di'i sgom pa nyid do zhes spyod bsdus su gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is stated in the Compendium of Practice.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thog mar mngon par brjod pa'i rim pa bzhi po gang gi bden pa gnyis po lhur len pa mngon par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thog mar mngon par brjod pa'i rim pa bzhi po gang gi bden pa gnyis po lhur len pa mngon par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, first, the four stages of expression should be expressed, which are the two truths that are emphasized.

original: de la dang po rim pa gsum pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa gsum pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de la dang po rim pa gsum pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa gsum pa ma yin nam /
translated: In that regard, is not the third stage the conventional truth?

original: kun rdzob bden pa bstan pa ni //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa bstan pa ni //
translated: The teaching of the conventional truth

original: yid 'ong rim pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: yid 'ong rim pa gsum pa'o //
translated: Is the third stage, which is pleasing.

original: zhes gsungs pas so zhe na /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas so zhe na /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bden te / de ltar gsungs pa yang kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid du lus dang ngag rnam par bden pa dag gi nang du gtogs la /
analyzed: bden te / de ltar gsungs pa yang kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid du lus dang ngag rnam par bden pa dag gi nang du gtogs la /
translated: This is true, but this statement is included among the truths of the body and speech of the conventional truth.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden par bshad pa ni so sor te /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden par bshad pa ni so sor te /
translated: The explanation of the conventional truth is individual,

original: gang zhig bshad pa ni /
analyzed: gang zhig bshad pa ni /
translated: and what is explained

original: so sor kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i phyir dang po'i rim pa dag @14a * //
analyzed: so sor kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i phyir dang po'i rim pa dag @14a * //
translated: is the individual conventional truth, because of the first order.

original: gi tha dad pa nyid kyis so sor ston pa'am /
analyzed: gi tha dad pa nyid kyis so sor ston pa'am /
translated: The individual is taught by the difference of the two.

original: lus dang ngag kyang 'dir sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang sems tsam nyid do zhe na bden te /
analyzed: lus dang ngag kyang 'dir sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang sems tsam nyid do zhe na bden te /
translated: If you say that the body and speech are also like an illusion and mind only, this is true.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is said:

original: gang rnams rgyu las yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: gang rnams rgyu las yang dag 'byung //
translated: Whatever arises from a cause

original: de rnams dngos med rtag pa min //
analyzed: de rnams dngos med rtag pa min //
translated: is said to be non-entity, not permanent.

original: ci ltar ming de gsal bar ni //
analyzed: ci ltar ming de gsal bar ni //
translated: Just as a name is clearly

original: gzugs brnyan dang ni mtshungs par 'dod //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dang ni mtshungs par 'dod //
translated: said to be like a reflection.

original: ces so // gzhan du yang /
analyzed: ces so // gzhan du yang /
translated: And elsewhere:

original: ji ltar sgyu ma ji ltar rmi //
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma ji ltar rmi //
translated: Like an illusion, like a dream,

original: ji ltar bar do'i srid par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar bar do'i srid par 'gyur //
translated: like the bardo existence,

original: de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor 'gyur //
translated: the ma·πá·∏çala is like that.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sems tsam nyid du'ang grub bo //üîΩbzhi pas don dam pa'i bden par gsung ba'i phyir ;üîΩkhyad par skye ba 'gog pa'i don du gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sems tsam nyid du'ang grub bo // bzhi pas don dam pa'i bden par gsung ba'i phyir ; khyad par skye ba 'gog pa'i don du gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is also established as mere mind.üîΩThe fourth is stated for the purpose of refuting the arising of a difference.

original: lnga ba skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang bral ba de kho na nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: lnga ba skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang bral ba de kho na nyid du gsungs so //
translated: The fifth is stated for the purpose of teaching reality free from arising, enduring, and ceasing.

original: de nyid kyi phyir skye ba dang gnas pa dang / 'jig pa dang / mngon par brjod pa ni 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir skye ba dang gnas pa dang / 'jig pa dang / mngon par brjod pa ni 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa ste /
translated: Therefore, arising, enduring, ceasing, and verbal expression are in accordance with the world.

original: song nyid bdun cu par yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: song nyid bdun cu par yang gsungs pa /
translated: The Yuktisastika states:

original: gnas dang skye dang 'jig dang yod med dam //
analyzed: gnas dang skye dang 'jig dang yod med dam //
translated: Enduring, arising, ceasing, existent, and non-existent,

original: dman dang mnyam pa khyad par 'phags pa ni //
analyzed: dman dang mnyam pa khyad par 'phags pa ni //
translated: Inferior, equal, and superior,

original: 'jig rten tha snyad dbang las sangs rgyas kyis //
analyzed: 'jig rten tha snyad dbang las sangs rgyas kyis //
translated: The Buddha taught these in accordance with worldly conventions,

original: gsungs so de nyid dbang las ma yin no //
analyzed: gsungs so de nyid dbang las ma yin no //
translated: Not in accordance with reality.

original: zhes so // 'di ni sgrub pa'i yan lag mchog / ces ba ni thog mar so sor rtog pa'i yan lag bzhi po la ltos nas so //
analyzed: zhes so // 'di ni sgrub pa'i yan lag mchog / ces ba ni thog mar so sor rtog pa'i yan lag bzhi po la ltos nas so //
translated: This is said in relation to the four branches of discernment at the beginning.

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How so? It is said:

original: rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa ste /
translated: The meaning of all the tantras is summarized here.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ni zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ni zhes pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthis‚Äù is that.

original: kun gyi ni 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi'o //
analyzed: kun gyi ni 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù refers to the Guhyasamaja Tantra.

original: 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi 'ang don du mngon par brjod par bya ba 'dir nang du gtogs so zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi 'ang don du mngon par brjod par bya ba 'dir nang du gtogs so zhes byas nas so //
translated: The meaning of all the tantras, such as the Guhyasamaja, is included here, it is said.

original: thams cad nyid du bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par so sor rtog par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad nyid du bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par so sor rtog par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because all of them are to be discerned as the nondual two truths.

original: las rab 'byam la sogs pa yang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor can las nges par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las rab 'byam la sogs pa yang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor can las nges par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the various activities are also definitely born from the yoga of nondual wisdom.

original: 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa rnams kyi rnam pa mang po blta bar bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa rnams kyi rnam pa mang po blta bar bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Here, are not the many aspects of the generation stage to be seen?

original: rgyud du de ji ltar rim pa lnga po rnams nyid kyis 'dus pa'i don mngon par brjod ce na /
analyzed: rgyud du de ji ltar rim pa lnga po rnams nyid kyis 'dus pa'i don mngon par brjod ce na /
translated: How are the five stages included in the Tantra?

original: gsungs pa / 'di rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / 'di rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said:

original: 'di rnams shes pa ni gsungs pa'i lnga po'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams shes pa ni gsungs pa'i lnga po'o //
translated: These are known as the five stages.üîΩThese are known as the five stages that have been taught.

original: rim pa'i dbye ba ni zhes ba  ni /
analyzed: rim pa'i dbye ba ni zhes ba  ni /
translated: The divisions of the stages

original: dbye bas @14b gzhan dang gzhan gyi khyad par rnams so //
analyzed: dbye bas @14b gzhan dang gzhan gyi khyad par rnams so //
translated: are the distinctions of the other and other.

original: de ltar don de rnams slar yang rgya cher 'grel pa dang bshad pa'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa dang / rgyas pas 'phangs pa don gzhan thob par bya ba 'dus par gsungs pa rnams khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar don de rnams slar yang rgya cher 'grel pa dang bshad pa'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa dang / rgyas pas 'phangs pa don gzhan thob par bya ba 'dus par gsungs pa rnams khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand that those topics are again included in the explanatory tantra, the Extensive Tantra, and the other topics that are implied by the Extensive Tantra are taught in the Condensed Tantra.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa la brten pa gang yin pa de la rab tu 'jug par byed pa slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhabs kyi rang gis byas pa'i mdo dang bsre bar bris pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa la brten pa gang yin pa de la rab tu 'jug par byed pa slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhabs kyi rang gis byas pa'i mdo dang bsre bar bris pa /
translated: Therefore, the master Candrakƒ´rti, who is engaged in the generation stage, wrote a commentary on the Condensed Tantra, which is a combination of the sutra and the commentary.

original: de la rdo rje slon dpon kha cig gis lha bcu gsum du rnam par dgod par 'dod do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la rdo rje slon dpon kha cig gis lha bcu gsum du rnam par dgod par 'dod do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Some Vajra Masters assert that the thirteen deities are arranged there.

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i rim pa yang mngon par brjod pa /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i rim pa yang mngon par brjod pa /
translated: The sequence of the arrangement is also stated in the Tantra of the Dialogue with Subahu:

original: slob dpon sna tshogs pas mngon par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dgod pa la sogs pa 'dir rab tu 'jug ste /
analyzed: slob dpon sna tshogs pas mngon par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dgod pa la sogs pa 'dir rab tu 'jug ste /
translated: The master of the various recitations should arrange the ma·πá·∏çala of the recitations here.

original: de la ci ltar sgrub pa po rnams the tshom med par 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la ci ltar sgrub pa po rnams the tshom med par 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: There, how will the practitioners be free of doubt?

original: de bzhin du rim pa gzhan gyi dbye pa yang rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rim pa gzhan gyi dbye pa yang rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, the divisions of the other sequences should be followed.

original: de ltar ni rim pa gnyis pa la 'bras bur gyur pa thams cad dag pa las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed par ba lta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni rim pa gnyis pa la 'bras bur gyur pa thams cad dag pa las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed par ba lta bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, in the second sequence, all the results are distinguished by the pure limits of action.

original: spyod bsdus su rim pa lnga po rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba gsungs so //
analyzed: spyod bsdus su rim pa lnga po rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba gsungs so //
translated: The Compendium of Practice discusses the divisions of the five sequences.

original: spros pa'i cho ga ni rab tu dbye ba bris pas so //
analyzed: spros pa'i cho ga ni rab tu dbye ba bris pas so //
translated: The elaborate rite is written as the division.

original: yang dag bsdus ba zhes pa ni yang dag par bsdus pa'i rab tu dbye pa rnams rim pa lnga po nyid kyi nang du gtogs so //
analyzed: yang dag bsdus ba zhes pa ni yang dag par bsdus pa'i rab tu dbye pa rnams rim pa lnga po nyid kyi nang du gtogs so //
translated: The ‚Äúperfect summary‚Äù is the divisions of the perfect summary included in the very five stages.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir sngags dang sems dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir sngags dang sems dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Because it is so, therefore, ‚Äúmantra, mind, and body, and purification‚Äù and so forth.

original: sngags zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid do //
analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Mantra‚Äù is the creation stage itself.

original: sems zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa nyid do //
analyzed: sems zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Mind‚Äù is the vajra repetition itself.

original: lus zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur mngon par brjod pa can rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa las so //
analyzed: lus zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur mngon par brjod pa can rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa las so //
translated: ‚Äú Body‚Äù is from the stage of self-consecration, which is the enjoyment body.

original: rnam dag ces pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i don bsdus pa gsum pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mngon par brjod pa can 'od gsal ba las so //
analyzed: rnam dag ces pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i don bsdus pa gsum pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mngon par brjod pa can 'od gsal ba las so //
translated: ‚Äú Purification‚Äù is from clear light, which is the third summary of the just-explained meaning, the very pure consecration.

original: zung 'jug ces pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i rim pa bzhi po dag gi mngon par brjod pa'i kun rdzob gyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i da den pa gnyis zung dang zung du de dag 'jug ste /
analyzed: zung 'jug ces pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i rim pa bzhi po dag gi mngon par brjod pa'i kun rdzob gyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i da den pa gnyis zung dang zung du de dag 'jug ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúunion‚Äù refers to the union of the two truths: the conventional truth of the expressions of the four stages just explained and the ultimate truth.

original: de dag ro gcig pa nyid du so sor rtog par byed do zhes pa zung 'jug ste /
analyzed: de dag ro gcig pa nyid du so sor rtog par byed do zhes pa zung 'jug ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúunion‚Äù means that the two truths, the conventional truth of the verbal expression of the four stages just explained, and the ultimate truth, are united, and that they are united in the sense that they are individually realized as having a single taste.üîΩTherefore, it is ‚Äúunion.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir zung 'jug rim pa las so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zung 'jug rim pa las so //
translated: Therefore, it is from the stage of union.üîΩ

original: @15a * // rim mtha' shes pa ni rim mtha' dang rim mtha'o //
analyzed: @15a * // rim mtha' shes pa ni rim mtha' dang rim mtha'o //
translated: The end of the stages‚Äù means the end of the stages and the end of the stages.

original: lnga'i bsdus pa'i don ni tshig gi don ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: lnga'i bsdus pa'i don ni tshig gi don ma yin pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the five is not the meaning of the words.

original: spyi'i don nyid kyang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i don nyid kyang ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is also not the general meaning.

original: shes nas ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drin las lhag par rtogs nas so //
analyzed: shes nas ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drin las lhag par rtogs nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving understood‚Äù means having realized the kindness of the spiritual friend.

original: mtha' drug ces bya ba ni tshig gi don drug ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' drug ces bya ba ni tshig gi don drug ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bshad pa'o //
translated: The six parameters are the six topics of the words, the explanation of MahƒÅvajradhara.üîΩ‚Äú

original: 'jug go zhes bya ba ni thos pa rtsom par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: 'jug go zhes bya ba ni thos pa rtsom par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Engages‚Äù means one begins to listen.

original: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i rgya cher bshad pa la 'jug go zhes pa bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i rgya cher bshad pa la 'jug go zhes pa bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the commentary on the Illuminating Lamp will be explained.

original: mtha' drug go zhes pa'i tshig la 'jug ni /
analyzed: mtha' drug go zhes pa'i tshig la 'jug ni /
translated: The six limits is the entry into the words.

original: rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rgyud la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rgyud la ltos pa'o //
translated: It depends on the explanatory tantras such as the Vajra Garland.

original: gzhan du na de rnams la mi ltos par gal te tshig tu 'gyur na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan du na de rnams la mi ltos par gal te tshig tu 'gyur na de'i tshe /
translated: Otherwise, if it were to be a word without depending on those,

original: rgya cher 'grel pa byed pa po de rnams mngon pas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgya cher 'grel pa byed pa po de rnams mngon pas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then the author of the commentary would be guilty of a downfall and would fall into hell.

original: gang gi phyir de rnams nyid kyi bshad par byed pas sgron ma rnams kyi gsal par byed pa'i ched du sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i rgya cher 'grel par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de rnams nyid kyi bshad par byed pas sgron ma rnams kyi gsal par byed pa'i ched du sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i rgya cher 'grel par byed do //
translated: Because it is explained by them, for the purpose of illuminating the lamps, the Illuminating Lamp commentary is composed.

original: de'i tshe bshad pa'i rgyud bkab nas byas pa de srid du nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe bshad pa'i rgyud bkab nas byas pa de srid du nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, by concealing the explanatory tantra, there is no fault.

original: bsod nams kyang chen po 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bsod nams kyang chen po 'byung ngo //
translated: And great merit arises.

original: da ni rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid du 'di'i rigs pas khong du chud par brjod par gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid du 'di'i rigs pas khong du chud par brjod par gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to explain its logic as the king of tantras, it is said:

original: ji srid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji srid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: As long as, etc.

original: ji srid ces pa ni phyis brjod par bya ba 'dir thog mar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: ji srid ces pa ni phyis brjod par bya ba 'dir thog mar bkod pa'o //
translated: As long as is mentioned later, but is placed here at the beginning.

original: de la ka kha gha mtha' zhes pa ni 'dir par du gyur pa'i ga yig bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de la ka kha gha mtha' zhes pa ni 'dir par du gyur pa'i ga yig bsdus pa'o //
translated: Here, ka, kha, and the end of gha means that the letter ga, which is a sibilant, is included.

original: tha mar gha gang yin pa de ni gha mtha' ste /
analyzed: tha mar gha gang yin pa de ni gha mtha' ste /
translated: That which is the end of gha is the end of gha.

original: de'i yon tan yang dag par shes pas 'bru mang po pa'o //
analyzed: de'i yon tan yang dag par shes pas 'bru mang po pa'o //
translated: By knowing its qualities, there are many syllables.

original: ka dang kha dang gha'i mtha' dang ni /
analyzed: ka dang kha dang gha'i mtha' dang ni /
translated: Ka, kha, and the end of gha,üîΩand the letter ka, kha, and the end of gha,

original: ka kha gha mtha' zhes dang / yi ge ni yi ge brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ka kha gha mtha' zhes dang / yi ge ni yi ge brjod pa'o //
translated: the letter is the expression of the letter.

original: de bzhin du dzha'i mtha' gang dang gang tsha dza gang yin pa de dag ni dzha mtha' ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dzha'i mtha' gang dang gang tsha dza gang yin pa de dag ni dzha mtha' ste /
translated: Similarly, whatever is at the end of jha, and whatever is ja, those are the end of jha.

original: tsa dang dzha mtha' dag dang ni tsa dzaha'i mtha' can te /
analyzed: tsa dang dzha mtha' dag dang ni tsa dzaha'i mtha' can te /
translated: And all of ca and jha are at the end of ca and jha,

original: tsa tsha dza dzha rnams so //üîΩta dang dha'i mtha' dag kyang ta dha'i mtha' ste ta tha da dha rnams so //
analyzed: tsa tsha dza dzha rnams so // ta dang dha'i mtha' dag kyang ta dha'i mtha' ste ta tha da dha rnams so //
translated: namely, ca, cha, ja, and jha.üîΩAll of ta and dha are also at the end of ta and dha, namely, ta, tha, da, and dha.

original: ta dang dha'i mtha' dag kyang ta dha'i mtha'i ste ta thad dha rnams so //
analyzed: ta dang dha'i mtha' dag kyang ta dha'i mtha'i ste ta thad dha rnams so //
translated: All of ta and dha are also at the end of ta and dha, namely, ta, tha, da, and dha.

original: pa dang bha'i mtha' dag kyang pa bha'i mtha' ste pa pha ba bha rnams so //
analyzed: pa dang bha'i mtha' dag kyang pa bha'i mtha' ste pa pha ba bha rnams so //
translated: The end of pa and bha is pa, pha, ba, and bha.

original: thams cad du phan tshun zlas dbye ba'i phyogs la mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: thams cad du phan tshun zlas dbye ba'i phyogs la mang po'i tshig go //
translated: Everywhere, in the case of mutual division, there is the word bahu.

original: de'i sgras nga nya na na rnams mchog tu 'dzin @15b no ;üîΩ; ji srid yar la wa rnams dang ha'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: de'i sgras nga nya na na rnams mchog tu 'dzin @15b no ; ; ji srid yar la wa rnams dang ha'i mtha' ste /
translated: The sound of that is held to be supreme.üîΩAs long as there is the end of va and ha,

original: gang gi mtha' mar ha ste sha sha sa rnams te /
analyzed: gang gi mtha' mar ha ste sha sha sa rnams te /
translated: at the end of which there is ha, ≈õa, ·π£a, and sa,

original: de rnams ni ha'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de rnams ni ha'i mtha'o //
translated: those are the end of ha.üîΩThe sound of that is said to be the other vowels.

original: de'i sgra gzhan gyi dbyangs rnams brjod do zhes pa sde tshan dgu'o //
analyzed: de'i sgra gzhan gyi dbyangs rnams brjod do zhes pa sde tshan dgu'o //
translated: Thus, there are nine classes.

original: de la gsal byed rnams kyi ni /
analyzed: de la gsal byed rnams kyi ni /
translated: Among them, the consonants

original: aa tsa la sogs pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba ni dbyangs yang dag par sbyor ba'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: aa tsa la sogs pa dang yang dag par sbyor ba ni dbyangs yang dag par sbyor ba'i dbye bas so //
translated: are combined with a, ca, and so on. The vowels are combined by the division of correct pronunciation.

original: de bzhin du lce rtsa can dang / mchu can gyi dbye ba rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du lce rtsa can dang / mchu can gyi dbye ba rnams kyang ngo //
translated: Similarly, there are the divisions of those with the tip of the tongue and those with the lips.

original: dbyangs rnams kyi'ang p'u ta dang / auda'tta dang / sv'a ri ta la sogs pa rjod par byed pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: dbyangs rnams kyi'ang p'u ta dang / auda'tta dang / sv'a ri ta la sogs pa rjod par byed pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: The vowels are also pronounced by the division of p≈´·π≠a, udƒÅtta, svarita, and so on.

original: dbyangs dang gsal byed 'di rnams kyi dbye ba rnams dbyangs dang gsal la byed nyid kyi nang du 'dus so //
analyzed: dbyangs dang gsal byed 'di rnams kyi dbye ba rnams dbyangs dang gsal la byed nyid kyi nang du 'dus so //
translated: The divisions of these vowels and consonants are included within the vowels and consonants themselves.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: de de'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum ste mi shigs pa las byung ba'i yi ge gsum gyi rgyu can yi ge gsum las nges par skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de de'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum ste mi shigs pa las byung ba'i yi ge gsum gyi rgyu can yi ge gsum las nges par skyes pa'o //
translated: The three syllables are its root, which means that the three syllables arise from the three syllables that arise from the indestructible.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar bu yin pa de'i phyir dbyangs dang gsal byed rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pas bsdus pa'i don chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar bu yin pa de'i phyir dbyangs dang gsal byed rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pas bsdus pa'i don chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: Because it is so, therefore the meaning included by the vowels and consonants with their divisions is the eighty-four thousand aggregates of the Dharma.

original: thub pa chen po ni bcom ldan 'das so //üîΩdpal ldan 'dus pa 'di snod yin te ni /
analyzed: thub pa chen po ni bcom ldan 'das so // dpal ldan 'dus pa 'di snod yin te ni /

original: dpal 'dus pa gang gi za ma tog yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: dpal 'dus pa gang gi za ma tog yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: which means that the glorious Guhyasamaja is the container.

original: nye bar mtshon par byed pa 'di dang des rdo rje theg pa ma lus dang ; 'jig rten pa'i ngag gi rang bzhin gyi yang dpal 'dus pa za ma tog can no //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon par byed pa 'di dang des rdo rje theg pa ma lus dang ; 'jig rten pa'i ngag gi rang bzhin gyi yang dpal 'dus pa za ma tog can no //

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis 'di rnams kun tu gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis 'di rnams kun tu gnas pa'i phyir ro //

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de bas de ni ste 'dus pa ni rgyud kyi rtse ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de bas de ni ste 'dus pa ni rgyud kyi rtse ste /

original: rgyud rnams kyi snod do //
analyzed: rgyud rnams kyi snod do //

original: gshin rje'i dgra'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gshin rje'i dgra'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa /

original: rgyud kyi mthar thug 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: rgyud kyi mthar thug 'dus pa ste /

original: ces pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du /

analyzed: gang gis dgyes rdor mi shes de yis ngal ba don med 'gyur /

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

analyzed: sngags kyi tshul ni kun shes nas //

analyzed: phyi nas kye yi rdo rje brtsam //

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin nam zhe na /

original: gsungs pa ni bden te /
analyzed: gsungs pa ni bden te /

analyzed: 'dir yang dag pa'i don khyad par du mngon par brjod do //

analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin du de srid du thog ma tha ma'i tshig gnyis kyis don gsal lo //

analyzed: rgyud yang dag par bcings pa rim pa lnga'i bsdus pa'i don ston par byed pa'i bshad pa /

original: de bzhin du yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang /

translated: The complete explanation of the seventeen chapters is found in the glorious NƒÅgƒÅrjuna's Seal of the Two Stages of All Buddhas, and the meaning of the five stages is clearly and fully illuminated in those words.

original: rnam pa de lta bu mi shes pas ni brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu mi shes pas ni brjod par nus pa ma yin no //

original: da ni the tshom gyi rgyur brjod pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni the tshom gyi rgyur brjod pa gsungs pa /

original: nyung zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nyung zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: nyung ba nyid ni the tshom gyi rgyu ste don mang ba nyid kyang ngo //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnyed dka' ste sdug bsngal bas blo'i yul du bya ba'o zhes byas nas so //

analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu gzhan yang gsungs pa /

analyzed: rgyan bdun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: blo gros kun du rmongs pa'i dri ma sel bar byed pas rgyan zhes bya'o //

analyzed: de lta bu'i don nyid dang gzhung gi'ang rgyan du byed pa ni rgyan no //

original: ming cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ming cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /

original: sems can gyi 'jig rten dang / snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / rang gzhan gyi sde par yang ming gi tha snyad du byed par mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos la yang de de bzhin no //

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgra'i don nyid kyang 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgra'i don nyid kyang 'chad par 'gyur te /

original: gzhan du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan du yang gsungs pa /

original: rdo rje mi phyed zhes par brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed zhes par brjod //

original: sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid //
analyzed: sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid //

original: shes rab rigs pa 'di yis ni //
analyzed: shes rab rigs pa 'di yis ni //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod do //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod do //

original: zhes so // chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa'i le'u la sogs pa'i tshad gsungs pa'i rim pa 'di nyid kyi nang du gtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes so // chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pa'i le'u la sogs pa'i tshad gsungs pa'i rim pa 'di nyid kyi nang du gtogs pa'i phyir /

original: le'u la sogs @17b pa'i yang 'dir brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: le'u la sogs @17b pa'i yang 'dir brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /

original: tshad dag kyang ni bshad bya ste //
analyzed: tshad dag kyang ni bshad bya ste //

original: zhes te / tshad ni yongs su gzhal bya ste de yang le'u la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: zhes te / tshad ni yongs su gzhal bya ste de yang le'u la sogs pa rnams kyis so //

original: le'u ni yongs su gcod pa ste /
analyzed: le'u ni yongs su gcod pa ste /
translated: Chapter means a complete section.üîΩIt is complete, that is, it is a complete section of all the topics to be evaluated, that is, the expressed and the expresser of this and that.

original: yongs su ste thams cad las gcod pa ni gzhal bya'i khyad par de dang de'i brjod bya dang rjod byed de thos pa dang bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa la rab tu zhugs pas ni 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su ste thams cad las gcod pa ni gzhal bya'i khyad par de dang de'i brjod bya dang rjod byed de thos pa dang bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa la rab tu zhugs pas ni 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: The one who is engaged in listening, reflection, and meditation eliminates attachment, anger, and so on.

original: cho ga de bzhin zhes pa ni rtog par byed pas na rtog pa ste /
analyzed: cho ga de bzhin zhes pa ni rtog par byed pas na rtog pa ste /

original: brtags pa dang rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis kyis bsgrub par byang ba /

analyzed: zhi ba can la sogs pa'i las gang gis phyi'i tshogs pas sgrub par byed pa de ni rtog pa'o //

original: sdom par yang gsungs pa /üîΩrnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: sdom par yang gsungs pa / rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
translated: It is also stated in the Samvara Tantra:üîΩFor the sake of sentient beings,

original: sems can don du yongs rtog phyir //
analyzed: sems can don du yongs rtog phyir //
translated: the conceptualization of phenomena that are without conceptualization

original: des na rtog pa zhes bshad de //
analyzed: des na rtog pa zhes bshad de //

original: rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro //

original: zhes so // dum bu dang zhes pa ni dum bur byed pas dum bu ste /
analyzed: zhes so // dum bu dang zhes pa ni dum bur byed pas dum bu ste /

analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par zhen pa 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: It destroys the attachment to sa·πÉsƒÅra and nirvƒÅ·πáa.

analyzed: de'i rjod par byed pa phyi rol la rnam par 'jug pa ni dum bu'o //

original: rim par phye zhes pa ni 'di'i don rang nyid kyi rgya cher bshad pa'i rnam pas ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim par phye zhes pa ni 'di'i don rang nyid kyi rgya cher bshad pa'i rnam pas ston par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gzhung nyid kyi'ang grangs yin no zhes pa ni /

analyzed: gzhung le'u bcu bdun kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu bcings pa'o //

original: ji srid de'i brgya phrag tu 'gyur pa de ni /
analyzed: ji srid de'i brgya phrag tu 'gyur pa de ni /
translated: As many as that in hundreds is

analyzed: dgos pa yang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bgrangs pa la zhes pa ni yongs su bgrangs pa'o ;

analyzed: / de ci ltar zhen gsungs pa /

analyzed: grub pa brgyad dang ni ril bu la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams so //

analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ces pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do /

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid ces brjod par bya ba la sangs rgyas nyid ces brjod pa'o //

analyzed: sh'akya thub pa'i rnam pa de'i rgyu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa las kyang 'di nyid lam dang bcas pa'i rgyu theg pa gcig gi rim pas 'jug go zhes sgrub par byed pa'i don no //
translated: The form of Sakyamuni is the cause of that, and it is also the cause of the Shravakas, Pratyekabuddhas, and so on. It is the one vehicle, and it is the stage of entry into the cause of that. It is the meaning of the establishment of that.

original: 'di nyid kyis gshegs pa sangs rgyas gang g'a'i dbang bskur ba lta bu @18a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis gshegs pa sangs rgyas gang g'a'i dbang bskur ba lta bu @18a * //

original: zhes zung du 'jug pa'i rim par ro //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mngon par brjod pa mchog yin te dngos grub ma lus pa bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas nyid do //

original: 'das zin te gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'das zin te gsungs pa /
translated: It is said in the past,

original: gleng bslang ba la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: gleng bslang ba la sogs pa rnams so //

analyzed: gsungs pa yang phyag 'tshal gang de gleng bslang ba la sogs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /

analyzed: gnyis pa yang ni bshad bya ste //

analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa 'joms pa'i don du gsungs pa /

analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: rgyud la sogs pa theg pa gsum du mngon par brjod pa 'dis ni /

original: rgyud la sogs pa'i rnam par 'grel pa gsungs pa /üîΩskye bar 'khrungs pa zhes pa ste /üîΩskye ba zhes pa mngal du skye ba yongs su bzung ba'o //

original: 'khrungs pa ni mngal nas phyi rol du byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrungs pa ni mngal nas phyi rol du byung ba'o //

analyzed: mi rnams su zhes rgyu mtshan gyi bdun pa ste / mi spyir btang nas de skal ba mnyam par nye bar ston par byed do zhes pa'i don no //

analyzed: des na sna tshogs pa'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas su skye ba nye bar mtshon par bya'o //

analyzed: nges par 'byung ba ni nges par 'byung bar byed pa ste /

original: ci ltar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa //
analyzed: ci ltar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa //

analyzed: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas ni //

original: sngom pa zhes pa ni sdom par byed pas sdom pa ste /
analyzed: sngom pa zhes pa ni sdom par byed pas sdom pa ste /

original: lus la sogs pa rnams kyis mi dge ba mtha' dag las ldog par byed pa @18b dang ; byang chub yan lag gi dge ba mtha' dag la yang rab tu 'jug par byed pa yang lus la sogs pa rnams kyis sdom pa'o //

translated: The vows are the binding of the body, etc. by turning away from all evil and by engaging in all the good of the limbs of enlightenment.

analyzed: 'dul las bstan pa ni sems can rnams 'dul ba'i ched du gsungs pa ste /

original: mngon par rjod par byed pa'i gzhung du yang /
analyzed: mngon par rjod par byed pa'i gzhung du yang /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyang byang chub kyi dang por rang nyid sdom pas byang chub lhag par rtogs so zhes mngon par brjod do //

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /

original: nges pa'i tshig ces brjod bya ste /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig ces brjod bya ste /

translated: one‚Äôs own, since it shows the universal grasping.

original: 'bras bu 'dod pa zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dod pa zhes pa ni ;
translated: The word phala is

analyzed: 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sogs pa kun du 'dod pa'i ngag tshul gang yin pa de de bzhin no //

analyzed: chos spyod pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa'o //

analyzed: de ni rgyu zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sogs pas kun du 'grogs pa med pas rdzogs par byed pa pho  nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: 'dod chags bral chos kyi ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi'o //

analyzed: tshul ni rigs pa'o //

analyzed: 'dod do zhes pa ni /
