analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga zhes pa la sogs bzhi de'i nges par bstan pa sta /

analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can no //

original: de rnams kyi rigs ni tshogs te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rigs ni tshogs te /

original: de ni rgyud do //
analyzed: de ni rgyud do //

analyzed: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa ni // zhes gsungs pa la ltos nas slar yang zhes pa'i tshig go ;

analyzed: / lnga po rnams drug pa ye shes kyi skur de'i bdag nyid kyis zhugs pa las rigs gcig tu 'gyur ro //

original: rdo rje la sogs bzung ba ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par byed pa sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i tshul bstan pa ni nges pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs bzung ba ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par byed pa sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i tshul bstan pa ni nges pa'i tshig go //

analyzed: phyi rol bstan bcos ni lung du ston pa ste de rig pa'o //
translated: The fifth is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of logic.üîΩThe sixth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the tantras.üîΩThe seventh is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the arts.

original: bstan bcos gzhan rig pa yang gang zhig gang du dam pa ma yin pa de rnams kyang phyi'i bstan bcos rig pa lta bu'o //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: bstan bcos gzhan rig pa yang gang zhig gang du dam pa ma yin pa de rnams kyang phyi'i bstan bcos rig pa lta bu'o // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: The eighth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the bodhisattva.

original: sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba'o //
analyzed: sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba'o //
translated: The ninth is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of medicine.

original: sgra'i mtha' gzings lta bu ma rig nas sgra'i sgo nas don dam pa rtogs par nus pa'o //
analyzed: sgra'i mtha' gzings lta bu ma rig nas sgra'i sgo nas don dam pa rtogs par nus pa'o //
translated: The tenth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the vidyadhara.üîΩThe eleventh is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the world.üîΩThe twelfth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the buddhas.üîΩThe thirteenth is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the bodhisattvas.

original: de'i bkod pa ste de rnams mngon par shes pa sgra dang don dag gi brjod bya dang rjod byed du rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bkod pa ste de rnams mngon par shes pa sgra dang don dag gi brjod bya dang rjod byed du rtogs pa'o //
translated: The fourteenth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the vidyadharas.üîΩThe fifteenth is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the dakinis.üîΩThe sixteenth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the dakinis.

original: de'i rab tu bstan pa ni yi ge'i don te /
analyzed: de'i rab tu bstan pa ni yi ge'i don te /
translated: The seventeenth is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the rakshasas.üîΩThe eighteenth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the rakshasas.üîΩThe nineteenth is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the gods.üîΩThe twentieth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the gods.

original: yi ge las bgrod pa'i don ni yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge las bgrod pa'i don ni yi ge'i don to //
translated: The twenty-first is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the asuras.üîΩThe twenty-second is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the asuras.üîΩThe twenty-third is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the nagas.üîΩThe twenty-fourth is the treatise of the inner science, which is the science of the nagas.üîΩThe twenty-fifth is the treatise of the outer science, which is the science of the yakshas

original: rnam pa gzhan du na de rnams gdul byar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na de rnams gdul byar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, they would not be disciples.

original: 'dod sogs zhes pa sogs kyi sgras 'dul ba dang / rtog pa dang ; byang ba'i rgyud la sogs pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyi 'gyod pa zlog par byed pa ni zhes pa btsun mo'i bha ga rnams su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig mthong ba dang /
analyzed: 'dod sogs zhes pa sogs kyi sgras 'dul ba dang / rtog pa dang ; byang ba'i rgyud la sogs pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyi 'gyod pa zlog par byed pa ni zhes pa btsun mo'i bha ga rnams su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig mthong ba dang /
translated: The words desire, etc. include those who are engaged in the tantras of discipline, imagination, and purification. The removal of their regret is the removal of the regret of those who have seen, heard, or given rise to faith in the vajra words such as the BhagavƒÅn resides in the bhaga of the queens, etc.

original: thos pa dang / dad pa nye bar skyes pa'i 'gro ba'i rgyud dang por bstan pa'i tshul la nges par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa dang / dad pa nye bar skyes pa'i 'gro ba'i rgyud dang por bstan pa'i tshul la nges par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The first method of teaching is to engage in certainty.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni lha'i bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa ni lha'i bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: The stage of generation is the stage of generating the deity.

original: de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One who possesses that.

original: yang dag par 'grel pa de ni yan lag bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par 'grel pa de ni yan lag bsdus pa ste /
translated: That commentary is the summary of the branches.

original: spyi'i don no //
analyzed: spyi'i don no //
translated: It is the general meaning.

original: sbas pa zhes pa la sbas pa can zhes pa thob pa la sbas pa zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: sbas pa zhes pa la sbas pa can zhes pa thob pa la sbas pa zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The hidden is the one who possesses the hidden. The meaning of hidden is attainment.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten du sbrum ma mthong @21a * //
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten du sbrum ma mthong @21a * //
translated: Just as a pregnant woman is seen in the world.

original: nas ; 'di ni 'dod chags chos kyi kun du spyod pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes rtogs so //
analyzed: nas ; 'di ni 'dod chags chos kyi kun du spyod pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes rtogs so //
translated: This is the result of the practice of the Dharma of passion.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang rnam par bshad pa'i 'dod chags chos su mngon par brjod par bya ba snying po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang rnam par bshad pa'i 'dod chags chos su mngon par brjod par bya ba snying po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: In the same way, here also, the Dharma of passion is to be expressed in the explanation, which is endowed with the essence.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: snying po yod pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snying po yod pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Endowed with the essence and so forth.

original: 'di'i zhes pa ni 'di'i'o //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes pa ni 'di'i'o //
translated: Of this is of this.

original: rab tu dbye bas gzhan gnyis pa gsungs pa kun rdzob ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu dbye bas gzhan gnyis pa gsungs pa kun rdzob ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The second division is stated: The conventional and so forth.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni rim pa gsum pa sgyu ma lta bu nyid do //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni rim pa gsum pa sgyu ma lta bu nyid do //
translated: The conventional truth is the third stage, which is like an illusion.

original: de rtogs pa ni de rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rtogs pa ni de rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The realization of that is the illumination of that.

original: ye shes gsum po rnam brtags pa //
analyzed: ye shes gsum po rnam brtags pa //
translated: The three knowledges are imagined.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

original: rim pa gnyis pa 'bras bu'i tshul gyi'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis pa 'bras bu'i tshul gyi'o //
translated: the second stage, which is the manner of the result.

original: rnam brtags pa ni las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed pa dang / thams cad dag cing rnam par dag pa'i rim pa dang / spyod bsdus rnams su gsungs pa'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba la sogs pa ye shes gsum po 'dir sgrub par byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam brtags pa ni las kyi mtha' rnam par 'byed pa dang / thams cad dag cing rnam par dag pa'i rim pa dang / spyod bsdus rnams su gsungs pa'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba la sogs pa ye shes gsum po 'dir sgrub par byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: The analysis is the analysis of the limits of action, the stages of purification of everything, and the Compendium of Practice, which establish these three wisdoms, the appearances of nature and so forth.

original: sbas pa'i bshad pha rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: sbas pa'i bshad pha rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The three hidden explanations.üîΩThe clear light is revealed,

original: 'od gsal ba ni rab ston dang // zhes pa'i dang yig ni /üîΩzung du 'jug pa rtogs pa ste //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni rab ston dang // zhes pa'i dang yig ni / zung du 'jug pa rtogs pa ste //
translated: the word ‚Äúand‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba'i bar 'chad par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar 'chad par blta bar bya'o //
translated: is to be seen as explaining up to ‚Äúrealization of the union.‚Äù

original: rnam pa gzhan du na rnam pa gnyis su bya ba 'dir yang dag par brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na rnam pa gnyis su bya ba 'dir yang dag par brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, this division into two would not be stated.

original: rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'dis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po byas pa'i dbye ba gsung ngo //
analyzed: rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'dis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po byas pa'i dbye ba gsung ngo //
translated: ‚Äú Realization‚Äù here states the causal and resultant states as a division of the accomplished.

original: de bzhin du yi ge'i don dang spyi dang sbas pa dang mthar thug pa'i bshad pa rnams dang / sgra ji bzhin pa la sogs pa'i tshig drug thog mar bkod pa rnams kyi phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bur rtogs pa ni bla ma la rag lus so //
analyzed: de bzhin du yi ge'i don dang spyi dang sbas pa dang mthar thug pa'i bshad pa rnams dang / sgra ji bzhin pa la sogs pa'i tshig drug thog mar bkod pa rnams kyi phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bur rtogs pa ni bla ma la rag lus so //
translated: Likewise, the understanding of the mutual causality of the explanations of the meanings of the syllables, the general, the hidden, and the ultimate, and of the six words such as ‚Äújust as the sound‚Äù depends on the guru.

original: mthar thug gi sgra'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: mthar thug gi sgra'i bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: The explanation of the ultimate sound is stated:

original: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig / ces pa la /
analyzed: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig / ces pa la /
translated: The end is the word of the limit.

original: mu ni yongs su ste dngos po thams cad nas thug pa ni mthar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mu ni yongs su ste dngos po thams cad nas thug pa ni mthar gnas pa'o //
translated: The limit is the end, the limit of all things.

original: thog mar so sor bsgrub pa'i bshad pa rnam pa gsum gyi don dang phung po la sogs pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o zhes pas mur thug pa ste /
analyzed: thog mar so sor bsgrub pa'i bshad pa rnam pa gsum gyi don dang phung po la sogs pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o zhes pas mur thug pa ste /
translated: The end is the limit of the three kinds of explanations of the individual accomplishments at the beginning and of the ultimate of the conventional truths such as the aggregates.

original: ji ltar 'tsho ba ni 'chi ba'i mur thug cing 'chi ba'i mthar thug go zhes so //
analyzed: ji ltar 'tsho ba ni 'chi ba'i mur thug cing 'chi ba'i mthar thug go zhes so //
translated: Just as life ends in death and has death as its limit.

original: de'i rjod byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas mtha' ste der tha snyad du byed de /
analyzed: de'i rjod byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pas mtha' ste der tha snyad du byed de /
translated: The expression of that is the TathƒÅgata‚Äôs symbolic speech, which is not literal, and is therefore the ‚Äúextreme,‚Äù which is conventionally designated as such.

original: mur thug pa'i @21b tshig gi don gsal bar byed pas so zhes pa mthar thug pa'i bshad pa rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: mur thug pa'i @21b tshig gi don gsal bar byed pas so zhes pa mthar thug pa'i bshad pa rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: It is the ‚Äúultimate explanation‚Äù because it clarifies the meaning of the words that reach the end.

original: rgyan lnga pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyan lnga pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: With regard to the five ornaments, it is said:

original: 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩyang ni slar yang gi don to //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste / yang ni slar yang gi don to //
translated: ‚ÄúDesire‚Äù and so forth.üîΩ‚ÄúAgain‚Äù means ‚Äúfurthermore.‚Äù

original: slar yang rgyan gzhan zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: slar yang rgyan gzhan zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúFurther ornaments‚Äù means ‚Äúother ornaments.‚Äù

original: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe division is twofold‚Äù means

original: gdul bya rnam pa gnyis las /
analyzed: gdul bya rnam pa gnyis las /
translated: that there are two types of disciples.

original: tshogs la bshad pa na nyan pa po tshogs lta bu la 'chad pa ste skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong pa'o zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: tshogs la bshad pa na nyan pa po tshogs lta bu la 'chad pa ste skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong pa'o zhes pa'i don no //
translated: When it is explained to an assembly, it is explained to a listener who is like an assembly, which means that it is common to all beings.

original: slob ma la bshad pa ni thun mong ma yin pa ste mchog gi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slob ma la bshad pa ni thun mong ma yin pa ste mchog gi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When it is explained to a disciple, it is uncommon because it is the domain of the supreme.

original: bstan pa 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: bstan pa 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: The extensive explanation of this teaching is stated:

original: ji bzhin sgra dang zhes pa la sogs pa ni go zla'o //
analyzed: ji bzhin sgra dang zhes pa la sogs pa ni go zla'o //
translated: Just as, etc. is a synonym.

original: rgyan lnga pa'i dbye ba gnyis so //
analyzed: rgyan lnga pa'i dbye ba gnyis so //
translated: The five ornaments are divided into two.

original: rim gnyis la zhes pa la sogs pas rgyan 'di'i rim pa gnyis kyis bcings pas ston par byed do //
analyzed: rim gnyis la zhes pa la sogs pas rgyan 'di'i rim pa gnyis kyis bcings pas ston par byed do //
translated: By the two stages, etc. shows that this ornament is bound by the two stages.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas zhes pa ni dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen pos so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas zhes pa ni dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen pos so //
translated: The Tathagata is Great Vajradhara, whose nature is the Tathagatas of the three times.

original: rgyan drug pa'i rab tu dbye ba lnga'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /üîΩ'jig rten zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rgyan drug pa'i rab tu dbye ba lnga'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa / 'jig rten zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The six ornaments are taught from the point of view of five divisions.üîΩThe world, etc.

original: 'jig rten zhes pa sems can snod du brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten zhes pa sems can snod du brjod pa la'o //
translated: The world is said to be the container of sentient beings.

original: nges par 'gyur ba ni las kyi dbang las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: nges par 'gyur ba ni las kyi dbang las skyes pa'o //
translated: The definite transformation is born from the power of karma.

original: rnam pa dpag med ces pa ni lnga nyid kyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa dpag med ces pa ni lnga nyid kyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: The immeasurable aspect is the reason for the five.

original: 'dod do zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: 'dod do zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The desire is the Blessed One, the remainder.

original: rin chen zhes pa la rin chen lta bu ni rin chen te /
analyzed: rin chen zhes pa la rin chen lta bu ni rin chen te /
translated: The jewel-like is the jewel.

original: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' ba yang skye ba 'di nyid la byang chub kyi snod du byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' ba yang skye ba 'di nyid la byang chub kyi snod du byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is difficult to find in the three worlds, because it makes this very birth a vessel for enlightenment.

original: tsandan zhes pa la tsandan lta bu ni tsandan te /
analyzed: tsandan zhes pa la tsandan lta bu ni tsandan te /
translated: Candana means like sandalwood.

original: ji ltar gos la 'dzug pa dang / rnam par rtsol ba dang / 'thag pa'i dus su gnas pa dang / dri shin tu chung ba nyid yin pa de bzhin du 'di yang ngo zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: ji ltar gos la 'dzug pa dang / rnam par rtsol ba dang / 'thag pa'i dus su gnas pa dang / dri shin tu chung ba nyid yin pa de bzhin du 'di yang ngo zhes pa'i don no //
translated: Just as sandalwood is placed on cloth, and in the process of dyeing and weaving, it remains with a very subtle fragrance, so it is here.

original: padma zhes pa la padma lta bu ni padma ste /
analyzed: padma zhes pa la padma lta bu ni padma ste /
translated: Padma means like a lotus.

original: ji ltar padma dga' ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa dang ldan pa yang /
analyzed: ji ltar padma dga' ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa dang ldan pa yang /
translated: Just as a lotus, although endowed with the qualities of joy and so on,

original: yon tan de ring du 'dzin par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang ngo //
analyzed: yon tan de ring du 'dzin par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang ngo //
translated: does not hold those qualities for a long time, so it is here.

original: pang dkar zhes pa la chu skyes dkar po lta bur chags pa rnam par dag pa dkar po'i yon tan 'dzin pas gzhan gyi rgyud la rtogs pa'i yon tan 'dzin par byed nus pa yang dag pa'i don de 'dzin par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: pang dkar zhes pa la chu skyes dkar po lta bur chags pa rnam par dag pa dkar po'i yon tan 'dzin pas gzhan gyi rgyud la rtogs pa'i yon tan 'dzin par byed nus pa yang dag pa'i don de 'dzin par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: The meaning of white lotus is that it is like a white lotus, holding the pure white qualities, and thus is able to hold the qualities of realization in the mindstreams of others, holding the meaning of reality.

original: @22a * // autpala zhes bya ba la autpala lta bu ni autpala te /
analyzed: @22a * // autpala zhes bya ba la autpala lta bu ni autpala te /
translated: The meaning of blue lotus is that it is like a blue lotus,

original: ji ltar autpala dri mang po la sogs pa 'dzin yang ring du mi gnas pa de bzhin du 'dir yang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar autpala dri mang po la sogs pa 'dzin yang ring du mi gnas pa de bzhin du 'dir yang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: just as a blue lotus holds many scents, but does not remain long, so it is here as well.

original: de lta bu 'dis rang bzhin te de rnams kyi chos kyis so //
analyzed: de lta bu 'dis rang bzhin te de rnams kyi chos kyis so //
translated: Thus, this is the nature, that is, the quality of those.

original: tha dad ming gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ;
analyzed: tha dad ming gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ;
translated: The meaning of different names and so on is

original: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brda'i ming 'di dang 'di rnams so //
analyzed: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brda'i ming 'di dang 'di rnams so //
translated: that these are the symbolic names of the Tathagatas.

original: yang na rang bzhin tha dad ming gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang bzhin gyis te dngos po tha dad par 'di rnams kyi ming thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: yang na rang bzhin tha dad ming gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang bzhin gyis te dngos po tha dad par 'di rnams kyi ming thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Or, ‚Äúby their different natures‚Äù and so on.üîΩ

original: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Or else, ‚Äúby the names of different natures‚Äù and so on, by their natures, that is, by their different things, all the names of these are known by the Great Vajradhara.

original: slar yang 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
analyzed: slar yang 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
translated: Again, what is their nature?

original: gsungs pa / de thos nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / de thos nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: He says, ‚Äúhaving heard this‚Äù and so on.

original: mtshan nyid 'di rnams 'khrug pas brjod pa'i tshigs bcad de /
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'di rnams 'khrug pas brjod pa'i tshigs bcad de /
translated: These characteristics are expressed in a verse that is mixed up.

original: brjod pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: brjod pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because they are expressed,

original: bum pa'i ras bal zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bum pa'i ras bal zhes bya ba la /
translated: ‚Äúthe cotton of the vase‚Äù and so on.

original: kha shin tu chung zhing sa las byung ba la sogs pa'i snod ni bum pa'o ;
analyzed: kha shin tu chung zhing sa las byung ba la sogs pa'i snod ni bum pa'o ;
translated: A vessel that is very small and made of earth and so on is a vase.

original: / ras bal bzhin zhes bya ba pa ni ras ba la bcug ba mi thon pa bzhin no //
analyzed: / ras bal bzhin zhes bya ba pa ni ras ba la bcug ba mi thon pa bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúLike cotton‚Äù means that it is like cotton that is not removed from the vase.

original: chos thos pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa de'i'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
analyzed: chos thos pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa de'i'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
translated: The meaning is that it is the one that illuminates the Dharma that is heard.

original: snying rje shes zhes bya ba ni sems can rjes su bzung ba'i dbang du byas nas so //
analyzed: snying rje shes zhes bya ba ni sems can rjes su bzung ba'i dbang du byas nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúCompassionate knowledge‚Äù is with regard to taking sentient beings under one‚Äôs care.

original: blo'i kha 'bye zhes bya ba ni snying gi padma kha bye bar gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: blo'i kha 'bye zhes bya ba ni snying gi padma kha bye bar gyur pa'o ;
translated: The ‚Äúopening of the mind‚Äù is the opening of the lotus of the heart.

original: / thos pa'i zhes bya ba ni nyan pa dang 'brel pa nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: / thos pa'i zhes bya ba ni nyan pa dang 'brel pa nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHearing‚Äù is to be supplied, since it is connected with the ear.

original: bdun pa'i don nyid kyis drug pa'o //
analyzed: bdun pa'i don nyid kyis drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth is by the meaning of the seventh.

original: tshigs med 'od ma bzhin zhes pa ni mdud pa med par 'dzag pa'i 'od ma'i dum bu bzhin du ste /
analyzed: tshigs med 'od ma bzhin zhes pa ni mdud pa med par 'dzag pa'i 'od ma'i dum bu bzhin du ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWithout joints, like bamboo‚Äù means that it is like a piece of bamboo without knots, which is hollow.

original: mdud pa gnyis nges par gnas pa ni tshigs so //
analyzed: mdud pa gnyis nges par gnas pa ni tshigs so //
translated: Two joints definitely remain, which are the joints.

original: tshigs med pa'i 'od ma de bzhin du 'di yang 'dir mtshams las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: tshigs med pa'i 'od ma de bzhin du 'di yang 'dir mtshams las 'das pa'o //
translated: Without joints, like bamboo, it is beyond the range of the senses.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa dang bral ba ngos gnyis ka nas 'dzag pa'i 'od ma'i dum bur bcug pa na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa dang bral ba ngos gnyis ka nas 'dzag pa'i 'od ma'i dum bur bcug pa na /
translated: When a piece of bamboo is split from both sides, free from desire,

original: 'gro la sogs pa ngos gzhan gcig nas ltung bar byed kyi gnas pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: 'gro la sogs pa ngos gzhan gcig nas ltung bar byed kyi gnas pa ci yang med do //
translated: it falls from one side or the other, and does not remain at all.

original: de bzhin du gang zag 'di'i chos thos pa yang so sor 'jug par byed pa dang / nges par 'gro bar byed do zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang zag 'di'i chos thos pa yang so sor 'jug par byed pa dang / nges par 'gro bar byed do zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: In the same way, the Dharma of this person enters and goes out, and is heard.

original: mkhas la ni sbyangs pas shes pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas la ni sbyangs pas shes pa'o //
translated: The wise one is the one who knows through training.

original: rgyud gcig ni grub pa'i mtha' gcig la lhag par mos pa la ste /
analyzed: rgyud gcig ni grub pa'i mtha' gcig la lhag par mos pa la ste /
translated: The one with a single continuum is the one who is devoted to a single philosophical system.

original: gzhan dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' 'di drang bar bya ba dang / the tshom @22b zab ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' 'di drang bar bya ba dang / the tshom @22b zab ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that one should lead others to other philosophical systems.

original: thams cad du yang chos thos pas bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: thams cad du yang chos thos pas bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par sbyor bar byed do //
translated: And everywhere, through hearing the Dharma, one should apply the two truths as nondual.

original: rim pa gsum par yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: rim pa gsum par yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said in the Trikrama:

original: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i lhag mar mos pas /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i lhag mar mos pas /
translated: By the devotion to the remainder of the nondual two truths,

original: thos pa 'dzin pa zhes so //
analyzed: thos pa 'dzin pa zhes so //
translated: one is called one who holds what is heard.

original: gang zag lnga po 'di rnams sngar gsungs pa'i bshad pa rnam pa gnyis kyis 'brel par bstan pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang zag lnga po 'di rnams sngar gsungs pa'i bshad pa rnam pa gnyis kyis 'brel par bstan pa gsungs pa /
translated: These five persons are taught to be connected with the two previously mentioned explanations.

original: pad dkar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: pad dkar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, lotus, etc.

original: bshad pa rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni khyad par gyi 'chad pas na rnam par bshad pa ste man ngag 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ni khyad par gyi 'chad pas na rnam par bshad pa ste man ngag 'chad pa'o //
translated: The two explanations are the special explanation, which is the explanation of the intimate instructions.

original: gang zag gang man ngag gi rim pa gang gi snod yin pa de'i ched du man ngag gi rim pa de brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag gang man ngag gi rim pa gang gi snod yin pa de'i ched du man ngag gi rim pa de brjod par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of which person, which stage of instruction, that stage of instruction should be stated.

original: rin po che'i gang zag las gzhan pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi don drug gsal bar mi bya ba ma yin nam zhe na 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rin po che'i gang zag las gzhan pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi don drug gsal bar mi bya ba ma yin nam zhe na 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: Is it not the case that the other persons, other than the precious person, do not clarify the six topics? It is explained:

original: gang gi phyir rgyud kyi gzhung ma lus pa thos nas kyang mtha' drug gi tshig rnam par dbye bas rgyud kyi don la kun du yangs pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pa tsam don la sogs pa rnams thos pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩda ni gsungs pa'i rgyan drug po rnams kyi bden pa gnyis sgrub par byed pa rgyan bdun pa gsungs pa de rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩde rnams kyis zhes pa ni sngar brjod pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyud kyi gzhung ma lus pa thos nas kyang mtha' drug gi tshig rnam par dbye bas rgyud kyi don la kun du yangs pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pa tsam don la sogs pa rnams thos pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o // da ni gsungs pa'i rgyan drug po rnams kyi bden pa gnyis sgrub par byed pa rgyan bdun pa gsungs pa de rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste / de rnams kyis zhes pa ni sngar brjod pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Because, even having heard the entire text of the tantra, the delusion that is not completely vast in the meaning of the tantra by the analysis of the words of the six limits, the mere delusion of the meaning, and so on, is heard.üîΩNow, having stated the six ornaments, the seventh ornament, which establishes the two truths, is stated:

original: bden gnyis rnam par nges byas pa ni rnam par gtan la phab pa ste /
analyzed: bden gnyis rnam par nges byas pa ni rnam par gtan la phab pa ste /
translated: Those by that, the two truths, having ascertained, the tantra, the meaning, the ornament, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the supreme, the

original: de yang thos pa las byung ba dang / bla ma rim pa las 'ongs pas so //
analyzed: de yang thos pa las byung ba dang / bla ma rim pa las 'ongs pas so //
translated: and that is from hearing and from the teacher's instruction.

original: bdun pa zhes pa ni rnam par nges pa de'o //
analyzed: bdun pa zhes pa ni rnam par nges pa de'o //
translated: The seventh is the ascertainment.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The perfection stage is the practice.

original: rdzogs pa ni rab tu sbyor ba nyid mtha' med pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa ni rab tu sbyor ba nyid mtha' med pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The perfection is the endless application.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdzogs pa'i dngos po la gnas pa dang 'jig pa yang rdzogs pa la med do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdzogs pa'i dngos po la gnas pa dang 'jig pa yang rdzogs pa la med do //
translated: Therefore, perfection is neither abiding in nor destroying the perfected.

original: rim pa ni rang bzhin te 'di dag byas nas 'di dag bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa ni rang bzhin te 'di dag byas nas 'di dag bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The stage is the nature, because there is no having done this, one should do that and so on.

original: sgrub pa'o zhes pa ni bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas skyed pa dang / 'gog pa dang de so sor brtags nas /
analyzed: sgrub pa'o zhes pa ni bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas skyed pa dang / 'gog pa dang de so sor brtags nas /
translated: The practice is the generation and cessation by the stages of the teacher's lineage, and having examined that,

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can de'i so sor rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can de'i so sor rtogs par byed do //
translated: one should realize the nature of the two truths.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: bha ba au ae ktya aa kha aa hi ni mdzdza aa be bi bi badzdzi aa ka hi au aadzdza aa /
analyzed: bha ba au ae ktya aa kha aa hi ni mdzdza aa be bi bi badzdzi aa ka hi au aadzdza aa /
translated: Bhava u ekatya a kha a hi ni m dz dz a a ve vi b dz ji a ka hu u dz dz a a.

original: be bi bi badzdzi aa dzo ta aadza aa aatsatshadha si ri gu ru na hi ka hidzdza aa zhes so //
analyzed: be bi bi badzdzi aa dzo ta aadza aa aatsatshadha si ri gu ru na hi ka hidzdza aa zhes so //
translated: bƒ´bƒ´bhajra·πÉ jƒÅjvajja·∏•, a·π≠·π≠ahƒÅsas·πõki, guru·πáƒÅhi kahi, jƒÅjja·∏•.

original: zhes pa ni chung ngu'i rang bzhin la rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub par @23a * //üîΩbyed par mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni chung ngu'i rang bzhin la rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub par @23a * // byed par mngon par brjod do //
translated: This is the statement of the perfection stage in the nature of the small.

original: bar ma la ni so sor slar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: bar ma la ni so sor slar yang gsungs pa /
translated: In the medium, it is stated individually:

original: gang dang gang zhig lta dang nyan par byed //
analyzed: gang dang gang zhig lta dang nyan par byed //
translated: Whatever is seen and heard,

original: snom byed myong byed kun du reg par byed //
analyzed: snom byed myong byed kun du reg par byed //
translated: smelled, tasted, and touched,

original: zab cing rgya che de yi de dang ni /
analyzed: zab cing rgya che de yi de dang ni /
translated: that is profound and vast,

original: 'dir ni kun du bzang por snang ba yin //
analyzed: 'dir ni kun du bzang por snang ba yin //
translated: and here it appears as Samantabhadra.

original: zab cing rgya che de yis zhes pa'i gsungs las bden pa gnyis kyi bya ba 'dir de'i bdag nyid kyis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: zab cing rgya che de yis zhes pa'i gsungs las bden pa gnyis kyi bya ba 'dir de'i bdag nyid kyis rig par bya'o //
translated: From the statement that is profound and vast, the activity of the two truths should be understood here by its nature.

original: de nas 'dis /
analyzed: de nas 'dis /
translated: Then, by this,

original: slar yang sngar bzhin rab tu 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: slar yang sngar bzhin rab tu 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it does not engage again as before.

original: lhag pa tsam las so sor zab pa dang rgya che ba de yis dran pa'am dran pa med pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lhag pa tsam las so sor zab pa dang rgya che ba de yis dran pa'am dran pa med pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: From just the remainder, the individual profound and vast mindfulness or non-mindfulness does not exist.

original: rang gi rang nyid las bden pa gnyis ro gcig pas rtag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi rang nyid las bden pa gnyis ro gcig pas rtag tu byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the single taste of the two truths in one's own self, it is always occurring.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i rim par yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i rim par yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said in the stage of union:

original: dran dang dran min las grol zhing //
analyzed: dran dang dran min las grol zhing //
translated: Free from memory and non-memory,

original: rtag tu 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: rtag tu 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can //
translated: Always having the characteristic of occurrence.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so forth.

original: rab tu byed pa gsum par yang zung 'jug gi lam du bden pa gnyis kyi sgrub thabs nyid 'dir rgyu nyid du yod do //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa gsum par yang zung 'jug gi lam du bden pa gnyis kyi sgrub thabs nyid 'dir rgyu nyid du yod do //
translated: In the third chapter, the method of the two truths in the path of union is also present here as the cause.

original: rgyan bdun gyi bshad pa la rgyud kyi rang dbang ma yin pa nyid du bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud ces pa la 'dis don khyad par gyi bshad par byed pas na rnam bshad do //
analyzed: rgyan bdun gyi bshad pa la rgyud kyi rang dbang ma yin pa nyid du bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud ces pa la 'dis don khyad par gyi bshad par byed pas na rnam bshad do //
translated: In the explanation of the seven ornaments, wishing to show the non-independence of the tantra, it is said: The explanatory tantra - it is an explanation because it explains the special meaning by this.

original: rgyud ni rang dbang ste gang 'ga' zhig tu 'ga' zhig gi don no //üîΩ'dus pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa byed kyi /
analyzed: rgyud ni rang dbang ste gang 'ga' zhig tu 'ga' zhig gi don no // 'dus pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa byed kyi /
translated: The tantra is independent, meaning that it is the meaning of some in some places.üîΩIt is the explanation of the Guhyasamaja, not of all the tantras.

original: kun du 'dod pa ji snyed pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: kun du 'dod pa ji snyed pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the explanation of the Guhyasamaja, not of all the tantras.

original: bshad pa'i tshul gyi rgyud ni bshad pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: bshad pa'i tshul gyi rgyud ni bshad pa'i rgyud do //
translated: The explanatory tantra is the explanatory tantra.

original: bshad pa ni yang dag par grags pa'i yul du 'jog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa ni yang dag par grags pa'i yul du 'jog par byed pa'o //
translated: The explanation is the one that establishes the object of correct renown.

original: rnal 'byor rgyud rnams zhes mang tshig tu 'brel bar gsungs ba ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud rnams zhes mang tshig tu 'brel bar gsungs ba ni /
translated: The yogatantras are the ones that are related in the plural.

original: 'dus pa'i rgyud nyid 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i rgyud nyid 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The Guhyasamaja Tantra itself is the essence of the result.

original: rdo rje bla ma zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir dang / rdo rje lta bu'i lam ston par byed pa po nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o /
analyzed: rdo rje bla ma zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir dang / rdo rje lta bu'i lam ston par byed pa po nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o /
translated: The vajra guru is the vajra because of being the nature of the two truths and because of being the one who teaches the vajra-like path.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po nyid kyi phyir bla ma'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po nyid kyi phyir bla ma'o //
translated: He is the guru because of being the teacher of the three worlds.

original: de bas rnal 'byor rgyud rnams ni rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bshad pa'i rgyud rnams so //
analyzed: de bas rnal 'byor rgyud rnams ni rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bshad pa'i rgyud rnams so //
translated: Therefore, the yogatantras are the explanatory tantras of the Guhyasamaja yoga, such as the Vajra Garland.

original: bzung ngo ni don dang gsung yid la bya'o //
analyzed: bzung ngo ni don dang gsung yid la bya'o //
translated: One should hold them in mind in terms of their meaning and words.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can la ltos nas glegs bam gyi tshul gyis kyang gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can la ltos nas glegs bam gyi tshul gyis kyang gzung bar bya'o //
translated: With regard to future sentient beings, one should also hold them in the form of books.

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /üîΩgleng gzhi rim pa'i sbyor bar @23b bcas //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa / gleng gzhi rim pa'i sbyor bar @23b bcas //
translated: How is that? It is stated:üîΩIn the context of the stages of the introduction.

original: zhes te gsungs pa'i rgyud dang / bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag las so //
analyzed: zhes te gsungs pa'i rgyud dang / bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag las so //
translated: From the tantras and from the generation and completion stages.

original: bla ma ji ltar gyur ba las zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: bla ma ji ltar gyur ba las zhen gsungs pa /
translated: It is stated from the guru, as it is.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa las te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa las te /
translated: From the one who is skilled in the explanatory tantras.

original: rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rgyud la shin tu byang ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rgyud la shin tu byang ba ste /
translated: From the one who is very skilled in the explanatory tantras, such as the Vajra Garland.

original: tho tshom za ba las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tho tshom za ba las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not from the one who has doubts.

original: bshad pa ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: The explanation is the statement.

original: rig pa ni rim pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa ni rim pa'o //
translated: The knowledge is the stage.

original: da ni rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'brel ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'brel ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: Now, the connection of the various tantras will be stated.

original: 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa /
translated: In the Later GuhyasamƒÅja, it is stated:

original: rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji lta bu zhes so //
analyzed: rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji lta bu zhes so //
translated: What is the connection of the tantras?

original: de yang so sor bstan par bya ba'i don gyi sgo can dum bu'i mthar thug pa rtogs pa mngon par brjod pa de las de la le'ur gyur pa de snyed du 'brel ba bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang so sor bstan par bya ba'i don gyi sgo can dum bu'i mthar thug pa rtogs pa mngon par brjod pa de las de la le'ur gyur pa de snyed du 'brel ba bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, the ultimate section of the topic of the individual teachings is the clear expression of the realization. In that, the desire to teach the connection of the chapters is stated:

original: da ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, etc.

original: le'u bcu bdun po rnams kyis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: le'u bcu bdun po rnams kyis zhes pa ni /
translated: The seventeen chapters, etc.

original: le'u bco brgyad pa ni shin tu sbas pa'i tshig gis bshad pa'i rgyud yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: le'u bco brgyad pa ni shin tu sbas pa'i tshig gis bshad pa'i rgyud yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The eighteenth chapter is the explanatory tantra of the very hidden words.

original: bsdus pa'i don ni bsdus pa can du byas pa'i don te bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i don ni bsdus pa can du byas pa'i don te bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: The collected meaning is the meaning that is made into a collection, the collected meaning.

original: don mang po rnams re re ra mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don mang po rnams re re ra mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because many meanings are expressed in each one.

original: de la zhes pa ni le'u bcu bdun po rnams su'o //
analyzed: de la zhes pa ni le'u bcu bdun po rnams su'o //
translated: There, in the seventeen chapters,

original: rjod par byed pa dang zhes pa ni gzhung gi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa dang zhes pa ni gzhung gi bdag nyid do //
translated: the expression is the one that has the nature of the text.

original: brjod par bya ba zhes pa ni lus kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba zhes pa ni lus kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The object of expression is the one that has the nature of the body.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni drug pa ste gtso bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni drug pa ste gtso bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Great Vajradhara is the sixth, because he is the principal one.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Akshobhya, etc., are the emanations of Great Vajradhara.

original: de rnams kyis rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba nyid du brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyis rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba nyid du brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Those are not to be expressed as the expressing and the expressed.

original: le'u 'di nyid du gsungs par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: le'u 'di nyid du gsungs par 'gyur ba /
translated: It will be said in this very chapter:

original: rgyud 'dir sems gtso bo yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyud 'dir sems gtso bo yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because mind is primary in this tantra,

original: mi bskyod pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir zhes pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir zhes pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: is it not taught for the sake of manifesting the mandala that gathers Akshobhya?

original: de ltar gsungs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa la ltos nas /
analyzed: de ltar gsungs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa la ltos nas /
translated: That is said in dependence on Vairochana and so forth,

original: sems gtso bo yin pa'i phyir zhes gsungs pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: sems gtso bo yin pa'i phyir zhes gsungs pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //
translated: because it is said that mind is primary.

original: le'u bzhi ba'i rnam par bshad par yang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog ces pa ni /
analyzed: le'u bzhi ba'i rnam par bshad par yang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog ces pa ni /
translated: Also, in the explanation of the fourth chapter, it says:üîΩThe supreme mandala of mind

original: sems gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: sems gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: is the mandala in which mind is primary.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
translated: It is supreme because it is the chief of the vajra family.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di dang por gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di dang por gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, it is taught first.

original: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta @24a * //
analyzed: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta @24a * //
translated: The ‚Äúmandala of emanations‚Äù is the concise mandala.üîΩ

original: bar gnas su bkod pa'i shing la sogs pa las sprul ba bzung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩrig ma spyan ma la sogs pa de rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bar gnas su bkod pa'i shing la sogs pa las sprul ba bzung ba nyid kyi phyir ro // rig ma spyan ma la sogs pa de rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur bar byed pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúemanation ma·πá·∏çala‚Äù is so called because it is the emanation of the condensed ma·πá·∏çala, which is arranged in the places of the trees, etc.üîΩThe ‚Äúempowerment‚Äù is the empowerment conferred by those Vairocanƒ´ consorts, etc.

original: brtags pa'i sgrub thabs zhes pa sa bon dang mtshan ma la sogs par rtog par byed pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i sgrub thabs yin pa'i phyir /üîΩbrtags pa'i sgrub thabs zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: brtags pa'i sgrub thabs zhes pa sa bon dang mtshan ma la sogs par rtog par byed pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i sgrub thabs yin pa'i phyir / brtags pa'i sgrub thabs zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: The ‚Äúimagined means of accomplishment‚Äù is so called because it is the means of accomplishment generated by those who imagine the seed, sign, etc.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs zhes pa ni sngar bshad do //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs zhes pa ni sngar bshad do //
translated: The ‚Äúmeans of accomplishment of the perfection stage‚Äù was explained above.üîΩThe result of the means of accomplishment of these two stages is stated:

original: rim pa gnyis po 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi 'bras pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis po 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi 'bras pa gsungs pa /
translated: The result of the means of accomplishment of the two stagesüîΩis the attainment of the three bodies,üîΩthe attainment of the four activities,

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
translated: and the attainment of the supreme.üîΩThe ‚Äúresult of the means of accomplishment of the two stages‚Äù is the attainment of the three bodies, the attainment of the four activities, and the attainment of the supreme.üîΩThe ‚Äúattainment of the three bodies‚Äù is the attainment of the three bodies of the BhagavƒÅn.

original: le'u bcu drug po yi'ang zhes pa'i yang gi sgras le'u'i phyogs gcig la sogs pa yang dag par sdud par byed do //
analyzed: le'u bcu drug po yi'ang zhes pa'i yang gi sgras le'u'i phyogs gcig la sogs pa yang dag par sdud par byed do //
translated: The ‚Äúattainment of the four activities‚Äù is the attainment of the four activities of pacifying, increasing, controlling, and destroying.üîΩThe ‚Äúattainment of the supreme‚Äù is the attainment of the supreme, which is the attainment of the state of Vajradhara.üîΩThe ‚Äúattainment of the supreme‚Äù is the attainment of the supreme, which is the attainment of the state of Vajradhara.

original: don gzhan rnyed ces pa ni brtags pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs las gzhan pa'i don ni don gzhan te /
analyzed: don gzhan rnyed ces pa ni brtags pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub thabs las gzhan pa'i don ni don gzhan te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúother‚Äù is that there is no other meaning than the means of achievement of the creation and perfection stages.

original: de bshad par byed pas skabs su bab pa zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: de bshad par byed pas skabs su bab pa zhes pa'i don no //
translated: Since it is explained, it is the meaning of ‚Äúin the proper place.‚Äù

original: lha'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis po nyid ces pa ni /
analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis po nyid ces pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúJust the two kinds of divine yoga‚Äù means

original: rim pa gnyis po med par don gzhan bskyed par bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis po med par don gzhan bskyed par bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: that there is no other meaning to be generated than the two stages.

original: rnam par bshad pa'i don du gzhan gyi dbang du byed pa can gyi bdag nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa'i don du gzhan gyi dbang du byed pa can gyi bdag nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of the explanation is stated in terms of the other-dependent nature.

original: rim pa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The two stages, etc.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhes pa ni mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhes pa ni mang po'i tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúThe Buddhas‚Äù is a plural word.

original: dus gsum du bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan par mtshungs pa nyid du bstan pa'i don to //
analyzed: dus gsum du bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan par mtshungs pa nyid du bstan pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the perfect Buddhas who dwell in the three times are taught to be the same.

original: kha cig tu rdo rje can rnams kyi zhes klog ste 'dir yang mang po'i tshig ni sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: kha cig tu rdo rje can rnams kyi zhes klog ste 'dir yang mang po'i tshig ni sngar bzhin no //
translated: Some read ‚Äúof the Vajra-holders,‚Äù and here also the plural word is as before.

original: yang na gcig nyid kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po'am /
analyzed: yang na gcig nyid kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po'am /
translated: Or, it is one, because it is the nature of Great Vajradhara,

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir mang po'i tshig tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir mang po'i tshig tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: or it is many, because it is the nature of Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, Vajraholders, Vajra dakinis, and so on.

original: 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa'i lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud kyi 'brel pa gzhan du brjod pa ma yin nam zhe na 'di ni bden te /
analyzed: 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa'i lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud kyi 'brel pa gzhan du brjod pa ma yin nam zhe na 'di ni bden te /
translated: But is it not said in the Later Guhyasamaja Tantra that the fifth chapter and so on are related to other tantras?

original: de ltar ni 'dus pa phyi mar le'u dang po la rgyud kyi 'brel pha mngon du brjod pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'dus pa phyi mar le'u dang po la rgyud kyi 'brel pha mngon du brjod pa med do //
translated: This is true, but it is not the case that the first chapter of the Later Guhyasamaja Tantra does not explicitly state the relationship of the tantra.

original: le'u lnga pa dang / bcu bdun pa dang / bcu gsum pa rnams kyis sgrub pa chen po bstan no //
analyzed: le'u lnga pa dang / bcu bdun pa dang / bcu gsum pa rnams kyis sgrub pa chen po bstan no //
translated: The fifth, seventeenth, and thirteenth chapters teach the great practice.

original: bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa //
analyzed: bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa //
translated: The fourth and sixteenth

original: brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa'i le'us /
analyzed: brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa'i le'us /
translated: and the eighth and twelfth chaptersüîΩteach the general activities of the master

original: slob dpon spyi yi @24b las rnams dang // dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin //
analyzed: slob dpon spyi yi @24b las rnams dang // dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin //
translated: and the vows of spiritual deportment for spiritual powers.

original: zhes rgyud kyi 'brel pa ma ngon par rjod par byed do //
analyzed: zhes rgyud kyi 'brel pa ma ngon par rjod par byed do //
translated: Thus, he explains the connection with the tantra.

original: gzhan du yang rim pa 'dis rgyud kyi 'brel pa mngon par gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan du yang rim pa 'dis rgyud kyi 'brel pa mngon par gsungs so //
translated: And elsewhere, he explains the connection with the tantra by this method.

original: de yang 'dus pa phyi mar le'u bcu bdun pa nyid kyi nang du gtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang 'dus pa phyi mar le'u bcu bdun pa nyid kyi nang du gtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, since the eighteenth chapter is included in the seventeenth chapter of the Later GuhyasamƒÅja Tantra,üîΩthe explanation of the tantra is also the explanation of the eighteenth chapter. Therefore,

original: rgyud kyi bshad pa la le'u bco brgyad pa'i yang rnam par bshad pa nyid kyi phyir rgyud kyi nang du son pa rgyud kyi 'brel pa yang rgya cher 'grel gyi rnam pas rnam par bshad de de'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyud kyi bshad pa la le'u bco brgyad pa'i yang rnam par bshad pa nyid kyi phyir rgyud kyi nang du son pa rgyud kyi 'brel pa yang rgya cher 'grel gyi rnam pas rnam par bshad de de'i phyir /
translated: the connection with the tantra is explained by the method of the extensive commentary. Thus,

original: rgyud kyi rnam bshad gzhan brjod pa dang / rgyud kyi 'brel pa gzhan nyid bsdus pa'i don gyis bshad par brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rnam bshad gzhan brjod pa dang / rgyud kyi 'brel pa gzhan nyid bsdus pa'i don gyis bshad par brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: he does not explain the other statements of the explanation of the tantra and the other connections with the tantra by the meaning of the summary.

original: gal te yang bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis po nyid kyi de kho na nyid ma lus pa las rab 'byam la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te yang bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis po nyid kyi de kho na nyid ma lus pa las rab 'byam la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu bstan par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the entire reality of the two stages of generation and completion should be taught together with the Vajra≈õekhara Tantra.

original: de bzhin du yang de ma yin pa kha cig tu rim pa gnyis dang / kha cig tu gnyis ka'i cha shas dang kha cig tu phyed ma dang / kha cig tu yan lag dang / kha cig tu gcig nyid kho na'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang de ma yin pa kha cig tu rim pa gnyis dang / kha cig tu gnyis ka'i cha shas dang kha cig tu phyed ma dang / kha cig tu yan lag dang / kha cig tu gcig nyid kho na'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: Similarly, some say that it is two stages, some that it is a part of both, some that it is half, some that it is a limb, some that it is one alone, and so on.

original: le'u gnyis pa la ni 'ba' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa la ni 'ba' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the second chapter, it is said, ‚Äúonly‚Äù and so on.

original: yongs su dag pa zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúPure‚Äù means that it is pure suchness itself.

original: de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa ma yin no//
analyzed: de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa ma yin no//
translated: Suchness is not pure.

original: dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni /
translated: The ‚Äúmandala of consecration‚Äù

original: dbang bskur ba'i ched du ste /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i ched du ste /
translated: is for the sake of consecration.

original: dri ma 'khrud par byed pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: dri ma 'khrud par byed pa'i ched du'o //
translated: It is for the sake of washing away stains.

original: dkyil 'khor ni rngul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni rngul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The ‚Äúmandala‚Äù is a mandala of colored powders.

original: rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa zhes pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe conduct of yoga‚Äù

original: shes rab dang thabs rdzogs par brtag pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs rdzogs par brtag pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
translated: is the yoga of the perfection of wisdom and method.

original: de'i gong ma las kyang ches gong ma'i rim pas 'phel bar byed pa'i don du yul la sogs pa nyams su myong ba'i bya ba'i tshogs ni spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gong ma las kyang ches gong ma'i rim pas 'phel bar byed pa'i don du yul la sogs pa nyams su myong ba'i bya ba'i tshogs ni spyod pa'o //
translated: Conduct is the collection of actions of experiencing objects and so forth in order to increase even more than that, in higher and higher stages.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i yul 'di rnams la ni //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i yul 'di rnams la ni //
translated: In these objects of desire,

original: spyod pa de ni spyod pas 'phel bar byed //
analyzed: spyod pa de ni spyod pas 'phel bar byed //
translated: conduct increases through conduct.

original: yam shing rnams ni sreg byed min pa nyid //
analyzed: yam shing rnams ni sreg byed min pa nyid //
translated: Fuel is not burned,

original: shin tu lhag par gnas pa sreg byed yin //
analyzed: shin tu lhag par gnas pa sreg byed yin //
translated: but the very abiding of fire is burning.

original: zhes so // sku gsung thugs zhes ba ni sgrub pa po'i lus la sogs pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: zhes so // sku gsung thugs zhes ba ni sgrub pa po'i lus la sogs pa gang yin pa de /
translated: Body, speech, and mind are the body and so forth of the practitioner.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyis de'i sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyis de'i sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: Those are blessed by Vairocana and so forth, with the nature of their body and so forth.

original: byin gyis rlob pa ni de la gnas par byed pa'o //üîΩspros pa zhes @25a * //
analyzed: byin gyis rlob pa ni de la gnas par byed pa'o // spros pa zhes @25a * //
translated: Blessing is abiding in that.üîΩElaboration is

original: pa ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: pa ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: clarification.

original: gsang ba zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs dag gi longs spyod pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems dag go //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs dag gi longs spyod pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems dag go //
translated: Secret is the bodhicitta that arises from the enjoyment of wisdom and method.

original: des dbang bskur ba ni ngag gi dri ma 'khrud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: des dbang bskur ba ni ngag gi dri ma 'khrud par byed pa'o //
translated: The empowerment conferred by that purifies the taints of speech.

original: rmad du byung ba lung bstan pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rmad du byung ba lung bstan pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The marvelous prophecy is

original: mi bskyod pa'i lag tu gnas pa'i rdo rjes phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad phye mar byed do zhes pa la sogs pa rjod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i lag tu gnas pa'i rdo rjes phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad phye mar byed do zhes pa la sogs pa rjod par byed pa'o //
translated: the declaration that the vajra in the hand of Ak·π£obhya pulverizes all the buddhas dwelling in the ten directions.

original: snying po skul bar byed pa ni rab tu rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: snying po skul bar byed pa ni rab tu rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The inciting of the essence is the complete realization.

original: sngags kyi sku bshed pa ni /
analyzed: sngags kyi sku bshed pa ni /
translated: The arrangement of the mantra body is

original: yi ge gsum la sogs pa'i sngags kyi rim pas bskyed pa'i sku ni sngags kyi sku'o //
analyzed: yi ge gsum la sogs pa'i sngags kyi rim pas bskyed pa'i sku ni sngags kyi sku'o //
translated: the body generated by the stages of the mantra such as the three syllables is the mantra body.

original: bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The generation is the stage of the generated.

original: de bzhin du ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the generation of the gnosis body.

original: gnyis po 'di dag gtso bor brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis po 'di dag gtso bor brjod par bya'o //
translated: These two should be stated as the main [topics].

original: 'dir gzhan yang gzhal bar bya ba mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: 'dir gzhan yang gzhal bar bya ba mngon par brjod do //
translated: Here, moreover, the topics to be evaluated are expressed.

original: de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams su yang bsdus pa'i don du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams su yang bsdus pa'i don du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, in the explanations to come, they should be stated as the summarized meaning.

original: phyag rgya chen po yongs su gyur pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po yongs su gyur pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The transformation of the great seal is as follows.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i lha'i sku ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i lha'i sku ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The body of the deity Akshobhya and so forth is the great seal.

original: de le'u gcig gnyis pa las gsung ba'i rim pas rdo rje'i rig pa la sogs pa nyid kyis bskyed pa ni yongs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de le'u gcig gnyis pa las gsung ba'i rim pas rdo rje'i rig pa la sogs pa nyid kyis bskyed pa ni yongs su gyur pa'o //
translated: Its generation by the process taught in the second chapter, by the vajra knowledge and so forth, is the transformation.

original: las rab 'byam zhes pa ni /
analyzed: las rab 'byam zhes pa ni /
translated: The extensive ritual actions are as follows.

original: las rnams ni bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: las rnams ni bya ba rnams so //
translated: Ritual actions are activities.

original: rab 'byam ni rgyas pa'o //üîΩde kho na nyid lhag par rtogs pa nyid kyis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byam ni rgyas pa'o // de kho na nyid lhag par rtogs pa nyid kyis zhes pa ni /
translated: Extensive means elaborate.

original: bla ma'i drin las so //
analyzed: bla ma'i drin las so //
translated: By the realization of reality itself is by the grace of the guru.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The illusion-like meditative stabilization is the meditative stabilization of union.

original: dam tshig dang sdom pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: dam tshig dang sdom pa zhes pa la /
translated: The pledges and vows are as follows.

original: dam tshig ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa bsrung bar bya ba bzhi po dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa bsrung bar bya ba bzhi po dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
translated: Pledges are the four to be guarded, such as not killing, and the one to be consumed.

original: sdom pa zhes pa ni yang dag par bsdam par bya gzung bar bya /üîΩyongs su bskyang bar bya'o zhes pas sdom pa'o //
analyzed: sdom pa zhes pa ni yang dag par bsdam par bya gzung bar bya /üîΩyongs su bskyang bar bya'o zhes pas sdom pa'o //
translated: Vows are to be bound, to be taken up, and to be protected.

original: da ni tshig gi don drug dang bshad pa rnam pa bzhi'i 'brel pa bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni tshig gi don drug dang bshad pa rnam pa bzhi'i 'brel pa bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
translated: Now, wishing to teach the connection between the six topics and the four kinds of explanation, he says:

original: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Now, etc.

original: tshig rnam par dbye bzhes pa ni tshig gi don rnam par 'byed pas tshig rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: tshig rnam par dbye bzhes pa ni tshig gi don rnam par 'byed pas tshig rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: The analysis of the words is the analysis of the topics of the words.

original: bshad pa rnam par dbye ba bzhi'i rnam par dbye ba bya ste ni tshig gi don rnam par bshad pa la kun du rmongs pa bsal ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: bshad pa rnam par dbye ba bzhi'i rnam par dbye ba bya ste ni tshig gi don rnam par bshad pa la kun du rmongs pa bsal ba'i don du'o //
translated: The analysis of the four kinds of explanation is the analysis of the explanation of the topics of the words, in order to remove confusion.

original: de ltar ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa lhag par ma rtogs nas /
analyzed: de ltar ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa lhag par ma rtogs nas /
translated: Thus, not understanding the intention of the Lord,

original: tshig @25b gi don rnam pa gzhan yang de kho na nyid las gzhan du 'chad par phyed pa da lta yang dag par dmigs so //
analyzed: tshig @25b gi don rnam pa gzhan yang de kho na nyid las gzhan du 'chad par phyed pa da lta yang dag par dmigs so //
translated: one sees that the topics of the words are explained in a way that is different from reality.

original: ci don drug bzhin du bshad pa rnam pa bzhi tshig gi don mtshungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ci don drug bzhin du bshad pa rnam pa bzhi tshig gi don mtshungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Are the four kinds of explanation the same as the six topics?

original: gal te tshig gi don yin na de'i tshe tshig gi don bcu tham par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te tshig gi don yin na de'i tshe tshig gi don bcu tham par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are topics of the words, then there will be ten topics of the words.

original: rnam par bshad pa dang bshad pa'i dbye bas brjod na yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa dang bshad pa'i dbye bas brjod na yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is said that the explanation is distinguished by the explanation, then that is contradictory.

original: ci ste tshig gi don ma yin na de'i tshe 'dus pa'i don rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pas bshad par bya ba ni /
analyzed: ci ste tshig gi don ma yin na de'i tshe 'dus pa'i don rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pas bshad par bya ba ni /
translated: If it is not the meaning of the words, then how can it be ascertained that the explanation is to be explained by the fourfold meaning of the collection?

original: gzhan ma yin no zhes pa'i nges pa 'di ci ltar yin zhe na brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin no zhes pa'i nges pa 'di ci ltar yin zhe na brjod par bya ste /
translated: This should be stated.

original: gal te yang gnyig tshig gi don yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te yang gnyig tshig gi don yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even if both are the meaning of the words,

original: rnam par bshad bya gcig gzhan du rnam par bshad par byed pa zhes pa'i nyes pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par bshad bya gcig gzhan du rnam par bshad par byed pa zhes pa'i nyes pa med do //
translated: there is no fault in saying that the single object of explanation is explained differently.

original: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bzhugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa ni /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bzhugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa ni /
translated: From Thus have I heard up to was dwelling,üîΩthe explanation of the six meanings such as intentional explanation, the object of expression, the speaker, the means of expression, the object of expression, and the object of expression,üîΩthe means of expression is the one who utters the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the meaning that is to be expressed.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa la sogs pa don drug gi rnam par bshad pa dang / mngon par bya ba can dang / smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa la sogs pa don drug gi rnam par bshad pa dang / mngon par bya ba can dang / smra bar bya'o //
translated: The object of expression is the one who is to be taught.üîΩThe speaker is the one who teaches.üîΩThe means of expression is the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the one who is to be taught.üîΩThe speaker is the one who teaches.üîΩThe means of expression is the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the meaning that is to be expressed.üîΩThe object of expression is the one who is to be taught.üîΩThe speaker is the one who teaches.üîΩThe means of expression is the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the meaning that is to be expressed.üîΩThe object of expression is the one who is to be taught.üîΩThe speaker is the one who teaches.üîΩThe means of expression is the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the meaning that is to be expressed.üîΩThe object of expression is the one who is to be taught.üîΩThe speaker is the one who teaches.üîΩThe means of expression is the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the meaning that is to be expressed.üîΩThe object of expression is the one who is to be taught.üîΩThe speaker is the one who teaches.üîΩThe means of expression is the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the meaning that is to be expressed.üîΩThe object of expression is the one who is to be taught.üîΩThe speaker is the one who teaches.üîΩThe means of expression is the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the meaning that is to be expressed.üîΩThe object of expression is the one who is to be taught.üîΩThe speaker is the one who teaches.

original: mngon par rjod par byed pa ni gzhung dum bu len pa can no //
analyzed: mngon par rjod par byed pa ni gzhung dum bu len pa can no //
translated: The means of expression is the text.üîΩThe object of expression is the meaning that

original: rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pa ni bshad par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pa ni bshad par bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the four kinds is the subject matter.

original: 'dis don drug ces bya ba bshad do //
analyzed: 'dis don drug ces bya ba bshad do //
translated: This explains the six topics.

original: 'dir tshig gi don ma bris pa ni rnam pa bzhi'i bshad par bris pa nyid kyi de'i 'brel ba yang so sor rtogs so //
analyzed: 'dir tshig gi don ma bris pa ni rnam pa bzhi'i bshad par bris pa nyid kyi de'i 'brel ba yang so sor rtogs so //
translated: Here, the word meanings are not written, but they are written in the explanation of the four kinds, and their connection is understood individually.

original: de bzhin du gang gi tshig gi don bri bar bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin du gang gi tshig gi don bri bar bya ba la /
translated: Similarly, where the word meanings are to be written,

original: bshad pa med pa der yang tshig gi don bris pa nyid kyis bshad pa'i 'brel pa rtogs so //
analyzed: bshad pa med pa der yang tshig gi don bris pa nyid kyis bshad pa'i 'brel pa rtogs so //
translated: but there is no explanation, there the connection with the explanation is understood by the writing of the word meanings themselves.

original: de ltar na brjod du med pa'i yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bzhugs so zhes pa'i mthar thug pa ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar na brjod du med pa'i yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bzhugs so zhes pa'i mthar thug pa ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus, inexpressible and so on up to abides are said to be of provisional and definitive meaning.

original: 'dir ni bshad par byed pa ma bris so //
analyzed: 'dir ni bshad par byed pa ma bris so //
translated: Here, the explainer is not written.

original: de la drang ba'i don ni spyi'i don no //
analyzed: de la drang ba'i don ni spyi'i don no //
translated: There, the provisional meaning is the general meaning.

original: nges pa'i don ni sbas pa ste /
analyzed: nges pa'i don ni sbas pa ste /
translated: The definitive meaning is the hidden.

original: 'dir kun rdzob bden pa rtogs pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: 'dir kun rdzob bden pa rtogs pa'i tshul lo //
translated: Here is the way to understand the conventional truth.

original: de bzhin du kha cig tu rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba las spyi'i don dang / kha cig tu ni ye shes gsum brda sprod pa'i tshul gyis sbas par rang nyid mngon par brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du kha cig tu rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba las spyi'i don dang / kha cig tu ni ye shes gsum brda sprod pa'i tshul gyis sbas par rang nyid mngon par brtag par bya ste /
translated: Likewise, in some places, the general meaning is from the yoga of the completion stage, and in some places, it is hidden by the method of the symbolic designation of the three exalted wisdoms, one should investigate oneself.

original: rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pa sbyar bar bya ba'i yan lag gi don du bshad par byed pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas so //üîΩthams cad ces pa la sogs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gsum du byin pa de dag @26a * //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pa sbyar bar bya ba'i yan lag gi don du bshad par byed pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas so // thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gsum du byin pa de dag @26a * //
translated: Following the explanation that the four modes are applied as the meaning of the branch of application,üîΩall, etc.

original: la kun tu gnas pa don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir gcig tu bstan no //
analyzed: la kun tu gnas pa don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir gcig tu bstan no //
translated: The three meditative stabilizations that are given are taught as one because they are of the same meaning, abiding everywhere.

original: de bzhin du 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig gnyis dang / kha cig tu bcu gcig dang / kha cig tu bcur blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig gnyis dang / kha cig tu bcu gcig dang / kha cig tu bcur blta bar bya ste /
translated: Likewise, one should view the meditative stabilizations called the method of great passion, etc. as one, two, eleven, and ten in some places.

original: de dang ldan pa'i yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa bcu gnyis po nyid kyis rnam par bshad pa nyid kyi phyir dang / drang ba dang nges pa'i don nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa bcu gnyis po nyid kyis rnam par bshad pa nyid kyi phyir dang / drang ba dang nges pa'i don nyid kyis so //
translated: because it is explained by the very twelve topics that are its branches, and because it has both a provisional and definitive meaning.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams thams cad kyi 'jug pa bsdus pa'i don du tshig gi don gyi 'brel ba yang rnam par bshad par 'brel te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams thams cad kyi 'jug pa bsdus pa'i don du tshig gi don gyi 'brel ba yang rnam par bshad par 'brel te /
translated: The connection of the topics is also explained in order to summarize the engagement of all these meditative stabilizations.

original: de la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi don gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi don gyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the topic of the meditative stabilization of engagement.

original: sku dang gsung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig la 'di dag gang gi de dang de la gnas pa de'i gcig tu rjes su mtshungs par brjod de /
analyzed: sku dang gsung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig la 'di dag gang gi de dang de la gnas pa de'i gcig tu rjes su mtshungs par brjod de /
translated: In the phrase body, speech, and so on, they are called his because they abide in that and that.

original: rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pas bshad par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pas bshad par bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because they are to be explained by the fourfold explanation.

original: gzhan du na tshig so so la rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pa can no zhes tshig gis 'jug pa med pa'i phyir gzhung mang por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na tshig so so la rnam pa bzhi'i bshad pa can no zhes tshig gis 'jug pa med pa'i phyir gzhung mang por 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, since there would be no engagement of the phrase in the individual words, there would be an abundance of text, since each word has a fourfold explanation.

original: de bzhin du rang bzhin can rnam par bshad par bya ba rnams 'dir mang por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang bzhin can rnam par bshad par bya ba rnams 'dir mang por 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the ones having a nature that are to be explained will be many here.
