original: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis dgongs pas zhes bya ba ni spyi'i don no //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis dgongs pas zhes bya ba ni spyi'i don no //
translated: The general meaning is from Amazing! and so forth, and by the intention is the general meaning.

original: rtsa bar de nas zhes bya ba nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / yang dag par mchod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar ni sgra ji bzhin pas so //
analyzed: rtsa bar de nas zhes bya ba nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / yang dag par mchod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar ni sgra ji bzhin pas so //
translated: The literal meaning is from Then in the root text up to vajra of enlightenment mind, and from having made offerings and so forth up to said this.

original: bstan du gsol zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa yang bsdus pa'i don du drang ba dang / nges pa'i don gyi sbyor bar byed pa rnams la /
analyzed: bstan du gsol zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa yang bsdus pa'i don du drang ba dang / nges pa'i don gyi sbyor bar byed pa rnams la /
translated: The meaning of the condensed is from Please teach up to all tathƒÅgatas, which is to be interpreted as the condensed meaning, and the meaning of the application is the definitive meaning.

original: bsdus pa'i don byas pa'i yan lag gi don dag phun tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du so sor rtogs pa'i don no //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i don byas pa'i yan lag gi don dag phun tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du so sor rtogs pa'i don no //
translated: The meaning of the individual is the meaning of the parts that have the function of the condensed meaning, which are mutually dependent.

original: le'u dang po'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: le'u dang po'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The words in the first chapter and so forth refer to the following passage in the first chapter of the Bodhicaryiivatiira:üîΩ

original: le'u gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams su yang mtha' drug gi tshig rnam par dbye ba zhes bstan pa'i don te /
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams su yang mtha' drug gi tshig rnam par dbye ba zhes bstan pa'i don te /
translated: The phrase in the first chapter and so forth is a reference to the second chapter, and so on, and the meaning of the teaching is the analysis of the words of the six parameters.

original: gzhan du le'u rdzogs pa'i mthar mngon par brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du le'u rdzogs pa'i mthar mngon par brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, at the end of the chapters, there would be no expression.

original: dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u zhes bya ba 'di nges pa'i don nyid kyi rnam par phye ba'i yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa blta bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u zhes bya ba 'di nges pa'i don nyid kyi rnam par phye ba'i yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa blta bar mi bya ste /
translated: The chapter called The Empowerment of the Mandala should not be seen as an explanation of the meaning of the auxiliary topics of the analysis of the definitive meaning itself.

original: de bsdus pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas kha cig tu kha cig gis bcug par @26b blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bsdus pa'i rjes su 'brangs pas kha cig tu kha cig gis bcug par @26b blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be seen as inserted by someone somewhere, following the compilation.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgya che 'grol du bag med ba ste /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgya che 'grol du bag med ba ste /
translated: Then, the phrase thereupon the Blessed One and so on is an expansion of carelessness.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dris pa dang / rab tu stong pa nyid la rtsa bar drang ba dang nges pa'i don du nyid kyi yan lag gi don du rnam par phye ba med do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dris pa dang / rab tu stong pa nyid la rtsa bar drang ba dang nges pa'i don du nyid kyi yan lag gi don du rnam par phye ba med do //
translated: Then, the BhagavƒÅn, etc., is the question of the TathƒÅgatas, and the root of the very empty is drawn out, and the meaning of the branches is distinguished in the definitive meaning.

original: de yang le'u gsum par bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas bshad par bya'o //üîΩskyed cig ces bya ba la sogs pa nas tshig tu brjod pa'i rnam pas so zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba ni bag med par klog pa ste /
analyzed: de yang le'u gsum par bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas bshad par bya'o // skyed cig ces bya ba la sogs pa nas tshig tu brjod pa'i rnam pas so zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don to zhes bya ba ni bag med par klog pa ste /
translated: Moreover, that should be explained following the explanation in the third chapter.üîΩ Generate, etc., up to expressed by the mode of verbal expression, is the interpretable and definitive meanings, is a careless reading.üîΩ Generate, etc., up to expressed by the mode of verbal expression, is the interpretable and definitive meanings, is explained as the meaning of the branches.üîΩ Amazing, etc., up to the ultimate, is the interpretable and definitive meanings, is a careless reading.

original: skyed cig ces bya ba la sogs pa nas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod do zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don to zhes bya pa yan lag gi don du rnam par bshad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: skyed cig ces bya ba la sogs pa nas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod do zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don to zhes bya pa yan lag gi don du rnam par bshad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: Amazing, etc., up to the ultimate, is the interpretable and definitive meanings, is explained as the meaning of the branches.

original: skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags //
analyzed: skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags //
translated: This birth is proclaimed.

original: zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni dgongs pa ma yin pas so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni dgongs pa ma yin pas so zhes pa ni /
translated: The conclusion of this is not the intended meaning.üîΩIf it is not the summarized meaning, then the time when this bodhicitta is explained is the conclusion of the intended meaning.

original: gal te bsdus pa'i don ma gtogs pa de'i tshe byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so zhes pa'i mthar thug pa dgongs pa min pas so zhes yan lag gi don rnam par phye nas bshad pa de'i bsdus pa'i don du bsdus pas dgongs pa min pa nyid kyisüîΩ'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te bsdus pa'i don ma gtogs pa de'i tshe byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so zhes pa'i mthar thug pa dgongs pa min pas so zhes yan lag gi don rnam par phye nas bshad pa de'i bsdus pa'i don du bsdus pas dgongs pa min pa nyid kyis 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Having explained the meaning of the branches, since it is summarized in the summarized meaning, it is not the intended meaning.üîΩThe meaning of the fifth chapter is explained here in the commentary,

original: le'u lnga pa ru rnam par mi rtog ces bya ba la sogs pa dgongs pa ma yin pas so zhes 'dir don gzhan dgongs pa lung ston par byed pa ni /
analyzed: le'u lnga pa ru rnam par mi rtog ces bya ba la sogs pa dgongs pa ma yin pas so zhes 'dir don gzhan dgongs pa lung ston par byed pa ni /
translated: as the other meaning of the intended meaning is revealed.üîΩThe characteristic of the engagement of anger

original: rnam par mi rtog don las 'byung //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog don las 'byung //
translated: is the arising from the meaning of nonconceptuality.

original: zhe sdang rab 'jug mtshan nyid do //üîΩrmongs pa rang bzhin med par gnas //
analyzed: zhe sdang rab 'jug mtshan nyid do // rmongs pa rang bzhin med par gnas //
translated: The characteristic of the engagement of desireüîΩis the arising from the meaning of nonconceptuality.

original: 'dod chags ldang ba'i ming can no //
analyzed: 'dod chags ldang ba'i ming can no //
translated: The characteristic of the engagement of prideüîΩis the arising from the meaning of nonconceptuality.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bcas //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bcas //
translated: The characteristic of the engagement of jealousyüîΩis the arising from the meaning of nonconceptuality.

original: rigs 'di rnams ni mnyam par bshad //
analyzed: rigs 'di rnams ni mnyam par bshad //
translated: These families are explained as equal.üîΩHere, they are the supreme attainment,

original: de rnams 'dir ni dngos grub mchog / theg pa'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur //üîΩzhes so // rigs ngan zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: de rnams 'dir ni dngos grub mchog / theg pa'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur // zhes so // rigs ngan zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: the supreme vehicle is accomplished.

original: bsgrub kyang 'grub par zhes bya ba'i bar ni sgra ji bzhin pa'i zhes te /
analyzed: bsgrub kyang 'grub par zhes bya ba'i bar ni sgra ji bzhin pa'i zhes te /
translated: The passage beginning with ‚Äúlow families‚Äù and ending with ‚Äúeven if practiced, they are not accomplished‚Äù is the literal reading.

original: 'dir yang drang ba dang nges pa'i don ni sbyor bar bya ste 'di nyid kyi bshad pa'i rgyud du //
analyzed: 'dir yang drang ba dang nges pa'i don ni sbyor bar bya ste 'di nyid kyi bshad pa'i rgyud du //
translated: Here, the provisional and definitive meanings should be applied. In this very explanatory tantra, it is said:

original: rigs ngan myur bar shes bya ste //
analyzed: rigs ngan myur bar shes bya ste //
translated: Know the low families to be quick,

original: smyig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin //
analyzed: smyig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin //
translated: the bamboo workers are slow.

original: mtshams med byed pa gnyis kar bshad //
analyzed: mtshams med byed pa gnyis kar bshad //
translated: The one who commits the five heinous acts is explained as both.

original: gsod don don gnyer sems dpa' ste //
analyzed: gsod don don gnyer sems dpa' ste //
translated: The one who kills for the sake of profit is the one who aspires for profit.

original: @27a * // theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: @27a * // theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: They will be accomplished in this supreme vehicle.

original: theg chen 'di ni bla na med //
analyzed: theg chen 'di ni bla na med //
translated: This MahƒÅyƒÅna is unsurpassed.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mthar thug par ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mthar thug par ro //
translated: And so on up to the end.

original: dang por phyi rol blangs nas rgyud kyi rdo rje'i tshig thams cad bshad pa'i rgyud du khyad par gyi don du mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang por phyi rol blangs nas rgyud kyi rdo rje'i tshig thams cad bshad pa'i rgyud du khyad par gyi don du mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: First, having taken up the external, all the vajra words of the tantra are explained as explanatory tantras, because they are the expression of the special meaning.üîΩIn the seventh chapter, from ‚ÄúThen‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on up to ‚Äúwill quickly be accomplished‚Äù is literal.

original: le'u bdun par de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes pa ni dgongs pa lung du ston par yang /
analyzed: le'u bdun par de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes pa ni dgongs pa lung du ston par yang /
translated: In the SandhivyƒÅkara·πáa, it is said:

original: dam tshig bzhi yi de nyid gang //
analyzed: dam tshig bzhi yi de nyid gang //
translated: The reality of the four commitments

original: 'dod pa kun zhes de brjod bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa kun zhes de brjod bya //
translated: is called ‚Äúall desires.‚Äù

original: de rnams ldan pas longs spyod pa //
analyzed: de rnams ldan pas longs spyod pa //
translated: By possessing them, one enjoys

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa'i don du gsungs so //üîΩde bzhin du slong mo za zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas nges pa'i don du gsungs so // de bzhin du slong mo za zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: and so on, which is stated in the definitive meaning.

original: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod byed //üîΩces bya ba'i mthar thug par drang ba dang nges ba dang nges pa'i don to zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod byed // ces bya ba'i mthar thug par drang ba dang nges ba dang nges pa'i don to zhes pa ni /
translated: Similarly, from ‚Äúeating alms‚Äù and so on up to ‚Äúenjoying all desires‚Äù is interpretable, definitive, and definitive in the definitive meaning.

original: rtsa bar lus dang zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: rtsa bar lus dang zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: In the root text, from ‚Äúbody‚Äù and so on up to ‚Äúthe four commitments‚Äù is interpretable, definitive, and definitive in the definitive meaning.

original: rtag tu zhes pa'i mthar thug pa sngon can nyid kyis de'i phan yon ston par byed do //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes pa'i mthar thug pa sngon can nyid kyis de'i phan yon ston par byed do //
translated: The word always shows the benefit of that by means of the prior possession.

original: yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa la ni 'di la 'ang drang ba'i don nyid du bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don du 'dir yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa la ni 'di la 'ang drang ba'i don nyid du bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don du 'dir yang sbyar ro //
translated: In the explanation of the branch meanings, this is also applied here as the meaning of the tantra to be explained as having an interpretable meaning.

original: rtsa bar brtan zhes bya ba nas byang chub nyi ma zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i tshig rnam par dbye ba med de /
analyzed: rtsa bar brtan zhes bya ba nas byang chub nyi ma zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i tshig rnam par dbye ba med de /
translated: The phrase firm in the root up to the end of the sun of enlightenment is not divided into words.

original: tshig drug rnam par dbye ba 'di yang drang ba'i don nyid de /
analyzed: tshig drug rnam par dbye ba 'di yang drang ba'i don nyid de /
translated: This division of six words is also interpretable in meaning.

original: 'on kyang yan lag gi don du yang rnam par bshad pa med par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang yan lag gi don du yang rnam par bshad pa med par khong du chud par bya'o //

original: de la ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /üîΩkhams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med //
analyzed: de la ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas / khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med //

analyzed: ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni dgongs pa min pas so //
translated: no elements and no origination is not the intended meaning.

original: yan lag gi don gyi rnam par bshad pa la 'od gsal la 'dir bstan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag gi don gyi rnam par bshad pa la 'od gsal la 'dir bstan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: In the explanation of the branch meanings, it is because clear light is to be taught here.

original: shin tu dri ma med ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa yang dgongs pa min pas so zhes bsdus pa'i don gyi rnam par bshad pa 'dir zung 'jug bstan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu dri ma med ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa yang dgongs pa min pas so zhes bsdus pa'i don gyi rnam par bshad pa 'dir zung 'jug bstan par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The ultimate, called ‚Äúextremely stainless,‚Äù is not the intended meaning, because this is the explanation of the summarized meaning, which is to be taught here as the state of union.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su dran pa dang ; zung 'jug rjes su dran pa gnyis ka yang dgongs pa min pa nyid tshig gi don no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su dran pa dang ; zung 'jug rjes su dran pa gnyis ka yang dgongs pa min pa nyid tshig gi don no //
translated: The meaning of the words is that both the recollection of the perfection of wisdom and the recollection of the state of union are not the intended meaning.

original: yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa ni skye ba med par rjes su dran pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i dgongs pas gsungs pa'o zhes pa ni bag med par klog pa ste bsdus pa'i don dang 'gal pa'i phyir @27b dang ; dgongs pas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ni mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa ni skye ba med par rjes su dran pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i dgongs pas gsungs pa'o zhes pa ni bag med par klog pa ste bsdus pa'i don dang 'gal pa'i phyir @27b dang ; dgongs pas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ni mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The explanation of the branch meanings is stated with the intention of explaining the recollection of nonarising. This is a careless reading, because it contradicts the summarized meaning and because it is not endowed with the characteristics of an intentional explanation.

original: le'u brgyad par mchod pa zhes bya la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: le'u brgyad par mchod pa zhes bya la sogs pa nas /
translated: In the eighth chapter, beginning with ‚Äúworship‚Äù and so on,

original: rab tu brtag ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes pa ni 'dir mtha' ma nyid dgongs pas bshad pa'i phyir 'di bris pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu brtag ces bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes pa ni 'dir mtha' ma nyid dgongs pas bshad pa'i phyir 'di bris pa'o //

original: yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa ni /
analyzed: yan lag gi don rnam par bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the subsidiary topics is

translated: This is because the explanation of the two situations

analyzed: zhes bya ba'i mthar thug par sgra ji bzhin pa'o zhes pa gnyis pa'o //

analyzed: de la da ltar ni bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bya ba'i sgo nas so //

translated: up to

analyzed: ba ni sgra'i don tsam mo //

original: yul rnams la chags pa'i sems can zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la shin tu zhen pa'o //
analyzed: yul rnams la chags pa'i sems can zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la shin tu zhen pa'o //

original: 'gal ba dang rmad du byung ba'i bya ba zhes pa ni 'chang par 'gyur ba'i 'gal ba ni 'jig rten gnyis dang 'gal pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba dang rmad du byung ba'i bya ba zhes pa ni 'chang par 'gyur ba'i 'gal ba ni 'jig rten gnyis dang 'gal pa'o //
translated: The phrase actions that are contradictory and marvelous means that the contradiction of taking up is contradictory to the two worlds.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rmad du byung ba ni 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rmad du byung ba ni 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is marvelous because it completely transcends all worlds.

original: ma la sogs pa len pa dang // pha la sogs pa gsod pa dang // chom rkun la sogs pa byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi las so //
analyzed: ma la sogs pa len pa dang // pha la sogs pa gsod pa dang // chom rkun la sogs pa byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi las so //
translated: Taking up a mother and so forth, killing a father and so forth, and committing the actions characterized by banditry and so forth.

original: las kyi dbang du 'gyur ro ni brjod ba'i las la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi dbang du 'gyur ro ni brjod ba'i las la ltos pa'o //
translated: The phrase one comes under the power of karma means that one relies on the action of expression.

original: 'dis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gal ba yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dis 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gal ba yang gsungs pa /
translated: This also states the contradiction with the next world.

original: 'di ni zhes pa las sogs pa ste /üîΩtshul mchog ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i gzhung gi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa las sogs pa ste / tshul mchog ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i gzhung gi bdag nyid can no //
translated: The phrase this and that and so forth.üîΩThe phrase supreme method refers to the essence of the GuhyasamƒÅja Tantra.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje la 'bod pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes pa ni phyag na rdo rje la 'bod pa'o //
translated: The phrase Lord of Secrets is an address to VajrapƒÅ·πái.

original: mi shes pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'i don las gzhan pa'i tshig gi don mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: mi shes pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'i don las gzhan pa'i tshig gi don mi shes pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is the non-understanding of the meaning of the words other than the literal meaning.

original: rgyas pa zhes pa rnam par bshad pa pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa zhes pa rnam par bshad pa pa'o //

original: ji bzhin don ni lhag par rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: ji bzhin don ni lhag par rtogs par bya ste /
translated: The meaning as it is should be understood.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'i don tsam 'ba' zhig bstan par bya'i cang mi smra bar gnas par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'i don tsam 'ba' zhig bstan par bya'i cang mi smra bar gnas par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the mere literal meaning alone should be taught, but that one should remain silent.

original: yang nges par gzung ba'i don du byas so //
analyzed: yang nges par gzung ba'i don du byas so //
translated: It is also done for the sake of ascertainment.

original: de rnams kyang lam ngan du ste lam dman par ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyang lam ngan du ste lam dman par ro //
translated: Those who go to a bad path, that is, a lower path,

original: ltung bar byed ni der 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ltung bar byed ni der 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: are made to fall means they will go there,

original: dmyal ba la sogs pa don med pa'i grong du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dmyal ba la sogs pa don med pa'i grong du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they go to the city of the useless, such as hell, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni bdag ces bya ba la dman pa'i rnam pa ston te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni bdag ces bya ba la dman pa'i rnam pa ston te /
translated: The yogi shows the inferior aspect of the self, saying I.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnal 'byor mi shes par rnal 'byor pa nga'o zhes nga rgyal ba ni dmyal ba'i rgyu ltung ba'i gnas nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnal 'byor mi shes par rnal 'byor pa nga'o zhes nga rgyal ba ni dmyal ba'i rgyu ltung ba'i gnas nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One who is not skilled in the yoga of the characteristics of meditative concentration and wisdom, but who is proud, thinking I am a yogi, is said to be a cause of hell, a basis of downfall.

original: 'di'i yid rab tu dga' dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: 'di'i yid rab tu dga' dang ldan pa ste /

original: sems can 'jug pa'i bsam pa med pa nyid kyis myos pa ma yin pa nyid du yang smra bar byed do //
analyzed: sems can 'jug pa'i bsam pa med pa nyid kyis myos pa ma yin pa nyid du yang smra bar byed do //
translated: and one is not intoxicated by the absence of the intention to engage sentient beings.

original: 'di dag ltung ba'i gnas ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'ga' zhig kho nas smra bar byed pa ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di dag ltung ba'i gnas ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'ga' zhig kho nas smra bar byed pa ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it that only some speak of this as not being a basis of downfall? It is said:

original: mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtags dga' bas ni gang ring du bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas pa de ni las lci bar 'gyur ro zhes rab tu gsungs ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtags dga' bas ni gang ring du bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas pa de ni las lci bar 'gyur ro zhes rab tu gsungs ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Whatever is attended to, cultivated, and made much of through the joy of manifest pride becomes a heavy action.

original: sgyu'i shes pa ni brdzun pa nyid kyis byed pa zhes @28b pa ni sprul pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu'i shes pa ni brdzun pa nyid kyis byed pa zhes @28b pa ni sprul pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of deception is said to be done through falsehood, meaning through emanation.

original: chos ni gang gis bsten par gyur pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: chos ni gang gis bsten par gyur pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa de de bzhin no //
translated: Dharma is the morality, etc. , which is relied upon.

original: rnam pa gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: Another aspect is stated:

original: 'dus pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: 'dus pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
translated: ‚Äúassembly‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'dus pa ni /
analyzed: 'dus pa ni /
translated: Assembly is

analyzed: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par mngon par brjod pa'o //

original: de zhes pa ni don rgyas pa la gzhol ba'o /
analyzed: de zhes pa ni don rgyas pa la gzhol ba'o /
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the extensive meaning.

original: dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
translated: Vow is that which is to be guarded and that which is to be eaten.

original: la sogs kyi sgras bsrung bar bya ba dang / bza' bar bya ba rnams las gzhan yang bsten pa'i yul ston par byed do //
analyzed: la sogs kyi sgras bsrung bar bya ba dang / bza' bar bya ba rnams las gzhan yang bsten pa'i yul ston par byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúand so forth‚Äù indicates the objects of reliance other than that which is to be guarded and that which is to be eaten.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is stated:

analyzed: srung bar mi byed ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te / thams cad du ni rab tu ston//
translated: ‚Äúnot guarded‚Äù and so forth.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúEverywhere‚Äù isüîΩ‚Äúnot to proclaim the secret to the unripe‚Äù is a point of downfall.

original: ma smin gsang ba sgrogs pa dang / zhes pa ltung ba'i gnas so zhes pa bsrung ba'i dam tshig rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: ma smin gsang ba sgrogs pa dang / zhes pa ltung ba'i gnas so zhes pa bsrung ba'i dam tshig rab tu phye ba'o //

original: mngon sum zhes pa ni brgyud pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum zhes pa ni brgyud pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDirectly‚Äù is not indirectly.

original: sangs rgyas 'dra zhes rdo rje 'chang chen po 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'dra zhes rdo rje 'chang chen po 'dra ba'o //
translated: Like a Buddha means like Great Vajradhara.

original: de ltar ni de nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar ni de nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because he is a Buddha.

original: 'dir sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i slob dpon yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dir sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i slob dpon yang ngo //
translated: Here, the master is also a Buddha and a Great Vajradhara.

original: ring zhing ring du chos kyi smin pa'i ched du spyod par byed do zhes pas slob dpon gzhan du yang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun du spyod pa ston par byed do zhes pas kyang slob dpon no //

analyzed: de bkur ba ni nyan pa po la sogs pa'i don du'o // phyis smos par byed de //
translated: He is to be revered for the sake of the listeners and so forth.

original: slob dpon de nyid dam /
analyzed: slob dpon de nyid dam /

analyzed: rdo rje spun la sogs pa rnams la'o //

original: skad cig gis ni zhe sdang zhes pa la /üîΩbgrod min la yang 'gro bar byed //

analyzed: ces pa'i yang yig ni lam dman pa'i rnam pa kun bsdus par 'gro bar byed do //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur na skye ba med pa gang yin pa da 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes so //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes 'byung ba zhes pa'i tshig ni /

analyzed: 'di nyid gsungs pa / de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs par 'dogs pa ma yin no //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de bzhin nyid du 'dogs pa ma yin no //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: don dam pa ni dngos po med pa de bzhin no //

analyzed: dngos po med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes so //

analyzed: dbu mar yang / stong pa zhes @29b kyang brjod byas nas /

analyzed: de bzhin nyid ces bya ba'i tshig gi don du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de /

analyzed: sngags pas 'di dag thams cad so sor sngar gsungs te /

original: lam dan pa'i rnam pa gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: lam dan pa'i rnam pa gzhan gsungs pa /

analyzed: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par sgrub par byed pa'i gzhung spel ba ni phyi rol bstan bcos so //

analyzed: de la dga' ba zhes pa la sogs pas gnyes su med pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed pa'i gzhung mchod 'dzin pa yang de rnams la med do zhes ba'o //
translated: There, the one who is pleased with that and so on has the treatise that sets forth the gnosis of nonapprehending.

original: rang gi dam tshig ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i bslab pa'i cha shas so //
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i bslab pa'i cha shas so //

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /üîΩlcags @30a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa / lcags @30a * //
translated: Therefore it is said:

translated: ‚ÄúWithout the hook‚Äù means without one‚Äôs desire.

original: 'di nyid nye bar ston pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di nyid nye bar ston pa'i ched du gsungs pa /

analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste sngags ni sprul la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mantra‚Äù and so on. The mantra is Noose and so on.

original: phyag rgya ni lha'i sku'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni lha'i sku'o //
translated: The seal is the deity‚Äôs body.

original: de dag rab tu ldan pas ni rab sbyor gyis te sngags bzlas pa dang / lha la dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / sbyin sreg la sogs pa byed pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag rab tu ldan pas ni rab sbyor gyis te sngags bzlas pa dang / lha la dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / sbyin sreg la sogs pa byed pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By their being well-endowed, one is well-endowed with the mantra recitation, the drawing of the ma·πá·∏çala that is the object of meditation on the deity, and the performance of the fire sacrifice, and so on.

original: sems can gyi don du bkag pa rnams kyang ga nang ba ma yin nam zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi don du bkag pa rnams kyang ga nang ba ma yin nam zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Are the prohibitions for the sake of sentient beings not also for one‚Äôs own sake?üîΩIt is said:

original: 'tsho zhes pa la sogs pa ste bdag nyid kyi lto ba 'gengs pa dang / gso ba'i cho gar sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: 'tsho zhes pa la sogs pa ste bdag nyid kyi lto ba 'gengs pa dang / gso ba'i cho gar sgrub par byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should not eat,‚Äù and so on. One should not practice for the sake of filling one‚Äôs own belly and for the sake of living.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'chad pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should not speak,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di rnams bkag pa gzhan byed pa la 'jug pa spong ba ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di rnams bkag pa gzhan byed pa la 'jug pa spong ba ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If one is prohibited from doing these, what is one to do? It is said:

original: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne should not engage,‚Äù and so on.

original: bzung ba ni ji ltar skal pa dang ldan pa'i nang du gtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bzung ba ni ji ltar skal pa dang ldan pa'i nang du gtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: One should not engage in the activities of others.

original: gsang ba ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: gsang ba ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Secret means the path and result of the GuhyasamƒÅja.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa yin zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa la pa dang 'gal ba'i tshig gis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa yin zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa la pa dang 'gal ba'i tshig gis bstan pa'o //
translated: The phrase explained with an intention refers to the teaching with words that are in contradiction with the world.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa mang pas don rgyas pa tsam la sems kyi rgyud rab tu zhen par gyur pas gal te 'gal ba'i tshig gis chos ston par byed na nyan par mi byed 'dir rab tu 'jug par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa mang pas don rgyas pa tsam la sems kyi rgyud rab tu zhen par gyur pas gal te 'gal ba'i tshig gis chos ston par byed na nyan par mi byed 'dir rab tu 'jug par mi byed do //
translated: If the Dharma is taught with words that are in contradiction with the world, those who are attached to the stream of mind that is merely the extensive meaning of desire and so forth will not listen, will not engage in this.

original: rab tu mi 'jug pas kyang de lam bskyed nas 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa mchog gi mchog skye ba'i snod du gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rab tu mi 'jug pas kyang de lam bskyed nas 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa mchog gi mchog skye ba'i snod du gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: And because they do not engage, they are not vessels for generating the path and giving rise to the supreme result.

original: rnam pa 'dis de rnams rjes su gzung ngo zhes mngon par dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa 'dis de rnams rjes su gzung ngo zhes mngon par dgongs pa'o //
translated: With this method, they are to be accepted, so it is intended.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgyud 'di nyid du mngon par brjod pa 'dis 'gugs par byed de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rgyud 'di nyid du mngon par brjod pa 'dis 'gugs par byed de /
translated: For that very reason, in this very tantra, it is said, They are summoned by this expression.

original: thams cad dam tshig so so la 'jug go zhes so //
analyzed: thams cad dam tshig so so la 'jug go zhes so //
translated: All enter into their individual commitments.

original: mdo sde la sogs pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can du ma rjes su gzung ba'i don du sgra ji bzhin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gsang ba 'dus pa gsungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mdo sde la sogs pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can du ma rjes su gzung ba'i don du sgra ji bzhin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gsang ba 'dus pa gsungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the Guhyasamaja was taught by the literal and so forth for the sake of guiding many beings who are engaged in the sutra collection and so forth?üîΩWhat is the cause of this distinction?

original: khyad par 'di'i rgyud gang zhe na bden te 'on kyang gtso bor dgongs pas nye bar bkod pa'am /
analyzed: khyad par 'di'i rgyud gang zhe na bden te 'on kyang gtso bor dgongs pas nye bar bkod pa'am /

original: dgongs pas gsungs pa nyid 'dus pa'i don 'chad par byed kyi /
analyzed: dgongs pas gsungs pa nyid 'dus pa'i don 'chad par byed kyi /
translated: or it is taught by the intention of the teacher that explains the meaning of the Guhyasamaja,

analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'i don la sogs pa rnams kyi ma yin no //
translated: but not by the literal meaning and so forth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
analyzed: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //

original: sbyor ba ni yi ge gnyis kyi mthar nges par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni yi ge gnyis kyi mthar nges par sbyar ba'o //
translated: The union is the definite application of the two syllables at the end.

original: sbyor de shin tu rmad du byung ba ni gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor de shin tu rmad du byung ba ni gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That union is marvelous because of the nature of both.

original: rab tu byed pa gzhan gyis 'di dga' 'chad par byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa gzhan gyis 'di dga' 'chad par byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: The other chapter explains this delight:

original: ae yig ces pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩpadma lta bu'i ni padma ste tshim par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ae yig ces pa la sogs pa ste / padma lta bu'i ni padma ste tshim par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The e vowel, etc.üîΩThe lotus is like a lotus because of the nature of satisfaction.

original: cung zad kha bye ba padma'i rnam pa lta bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: cung zad kha bye ba padma'i rnam pa lta bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is slightly open because of the form of a lotus.

original: wa yig rdo rje zhes pa ni srab nyid phyir dang / rdo rje'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dbye bar dka' ba byed pa po nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: wa yig rdo rje zhes pa ni srab nyid phyir dang / rdo rje'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dbye bar dka' ba byed pa po nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The syllable va is the vajra, because it is thin, because it has the form of a vajra, and because it is difficult to divide, being the agent.

original: sa bon ni de las nges par 'dzag pa'i sbrang rtsi'o //üîΩ'gro ba gsum po ni lus la sogs pa la dbang bskur ba dang / @34a * //
analyzed: sa bon ni de las nges par 'dzag pa'i sbrang rtsi'o // 'gro ba gsum po ni lus la sogs pa la dbang bskur ba dang / @34a * //
translated: The seed is the honey that definitely drips from it.üîΩThe three worlds are the body, etc., and the consecration is in the generation of the world.

original: 'jig rten skyed par byed pa la'o / btu ba'i gzhi gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten skyed par byed pa la'o / btu ba'i gzhi gsungs pa /
translated: The basis of the extraction is stated:

original: ae yig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ae yig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The syllable ai, etc.

original: phul du byung ba'i ye shes ni shes rab brjod du med pa'i ye shes skye ba'i zhing nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phul du byung ba'i ye shes ni shes rab brjod du med pa'i ye shes skye ba'i zhing nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme intuition is the field of the arising of inexpressible intuitive wisdom.

original: rab dga'i bdag po ni rdo rjes dpa' ste /
analyzed: rab dga'i bdag po ni rdo rjes dpa' ste /
translated: The lord of supreme joy is the hero of the vajra,

original: yongs su shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par bskyed pa'i thabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par bskyed pa'i thabs nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the means of generating the special state of the yogin who has complete knowledge.

original: mi shigs pa zhes pa ni rnam par rtog pa kun nas ma mya ngan pa ste /
analyzed: mi shigs pa zhes pa ni rnam par rtog pa kun nas ma mya ngan pa ste /
translated: The indestructible is the complete pacification of all discursive thought,

original: de nyid las de'i brdar byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid las de'i brdar byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is just the convention of that.

original: de las yi ge nyid kyang skye ba ni yi ge gsum pa ste /
analyzed: de las yi ge nyid kyang skye ba ni yi ge gsum pa ste /
translated: The arising of the syllable itself from that is the third syllable,

original: mi shigs par byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi shigs par byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it arises as indestructible.

original: de bzhin du gsungs pa'i dgos pa gang gis shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gsungs pa'i dgos pa gang gis shes te /
translated: How is that known?

original: yi ge gnyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i bdag nyid du'o //
analyzed: yi ge gnyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i bdag nyid du'o //
translated: The two syllables are the nature of the dharma mudra.

original: chos ni ston par byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: chos ni ston par byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Dharma is the nature of teaching.

original: de'i don yang lam dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de'i don yang lam dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Its meaning is the nature of the path and result.

original: 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya ni brda ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya ni brda ste /
translated: Their mudra is a symbol,

original: ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pa bsdus pa'i ngo bo a'a li k'a li'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pa bsdus pa'i ngo bo a'a li k'a li'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of ali kali, which is the essence that includes all of the nature of speech.

original: de nyid shes zhes pa ni lam gyi gnas skas so //
analyzed: de nyid shes zhes pa ni lam gyi gnas skas so //
translated: Knowing that is the ladder of the path.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed 'gyur zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed 'gyur zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs so //
translated: Turning the wheel of dharma is the occasion of the result.

original: yi ge gnyis zhes pa ni yi ge gnyis kyi don rjod par byed pa ste /üîΩgzhan rnams kyi ched du nye bar ston par byed pa'am /
analyzed: yi ge gnyis zhes pa ni yi ge gnyis kyi don rjod par byed pa ste / gzhan rnams kyi ched du nye bar ston par byed pa'am /
translated: The two syllables are the expression of the meaning of the two syllables.üîΩThey are revealed for the sake of others

original: 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: or they are engaged.

original: sangs rgyas chos rnams las kyi phyi rol zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa rnams las so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos rnams las kyi phyi rol zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa rnams las so //
translated: The words ‚Äúoutside of the Buddha‚Äôs teachings‚Äù refer to what was said above.

original: chos kyi nor 'di la yod do zhes pas nor can no //
analyzed: chos kyi nor 'di la yod do zhes pas nor can no //
translated: He is the ‚Äúwealthy one‚Äù because this wealth of Dharma is in him.

original: longs spyod spangs zhes pa ni longs spyod ni chos kyi ro nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: longs spyod spangs zhes pa ni longs spyod ni chos kyi ro nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Abandoning enjoyment‚Äù means that enjoyment is the experience of the taste of Dharma.

original: spangs pa ni bor ba'o //
analyzed: spangs pa ni bor ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Abandoning‚Äù means casting it aside.

original: ae wam zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i don dran par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ae wam zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i don dran par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú E-VAM‚Äù is a reminder of the meaning that was previously taught.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa ni sangs rgyas rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa ni sangs rgyas rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: ‚Äú Omniscient‚Äù refers to the two kinds of buddhas.

original: bzhugs pa zhes pa ni gsungs pa'i rim pas yi ge gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: bzhugs pa zhes pa ni gsungs pa'i rim pas yi ge gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Abiding‚Äù refers to the two syllables, which are the sequence of the teachings.

original: de'i don gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i don gsungs pa /
translated: The meaning of that is stated:

original: mngon par brjod par bya ba yi ge gnyis so //
analyzed: mngon par brjod par bya ba yi ge gnyis so //
translated: ‚Äú The two syllables are the expressed.

original: gang gi phyir ae wam yi ge gnyis yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ae wam yi ge gnyis yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the two syllables E-VAM,

original: dran bya ste gsungs pa'i don yid la gzhag pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: dran bya ste gsungs pa'i don yid la gzhag pa'i don du'o //
translated: they are to be remembered, in order to keep the meaning of the teachings in mind.

original: lha'i bdag ces pa ni lha'i bdag po nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: lha'i bdag ces pa ni lha'i bdag po nyid kyi phyir /
translated: ‚Äú Lord of the gods‚Äù is because he is the lord of the gods.

original: lha rnams kyi dbang du byas nas chos bstan pa la'o //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi dbang du byas nas chos bstan pa la'o //
translated: He teaches the Dharma for the sake of the gods.

original: gal te 'dod na ni gal te khyod 'dod par byed na'o //
analyzed: gal te 'dod na ni gal te khyod 'dod par byed na'o //
translated: If you wish, if you wish to do so.

original: rtag pa ste skyes pa dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir @34b ro ;
analyzed: rtag pa ste skyes pa dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir @34b ro ;
translated: Eternal, because of being free from arising, abiding, and destruction.

original: gnas ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: gnas ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid can no //

original: gzhan rnams kyi'ang bla mar gyis te /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyi'ang bla mar gyis te /

original: sgrub pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya'o //

original: bdag gis thos pa zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnams ma lus pa'o //üîΩ'khor los sgyur ba'i ngo bo la zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bdag gis thos pa zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnams ma lus pa'o // 'khor los sgyur ba'i ngo bo la zhes pa ni /
translated: What I have heard is the Bhagavans without exception.üîΩThe nature of a wheel-turning king is

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshul 'dzin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshul 'dzin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: holding the manner of a wheel-turning king.

original: ci thos she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci thos she na gsungs pa /
translated: What was heard? It is said:

original: sa bon ngo bo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sa bon ngo bo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: sa bon gyi ngo bos 'dzag pa'i bdag nyid can /
analyzed: sa bon gyi ngo bos 'dzag pa'i bdag nyid can /

original: aom yig la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi bdag nyi do //
analyzed: aom yig la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi bdag nyi do //
translated: The nature of the seed is the nature of the syllable Om, etc.

original: sprul pa ni phyung ba ste /
analyzed: sprul pa ni phyung ba ste /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes pa lhag ma'o //

original: lha rnams kyi ni 'khor lo mchog ni bla na med pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi ni 'khor lo mchog ni bla na med pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /

original: mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äúsupreme joy,‚Äù and so forth.

original: gcig ni gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: gcig ni gnyis su med pa'o //

original: dus ni phung po la sogs pa rnams 'dir nye bar byed do //
analyzed: dus ni phung po la sogs pa rnams 'dir nye bar byed do //
translated: Time is the aggregates, and so forth, which are gathered here.

original: thim par byed do zhes bya bas ma sa ya ste lus kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: thim par byed do zhes bya bas ma sa ya ste lus kyi khyad par ro //

original: dbang byug brgyad ces pa ni sku'i dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: dbang byug brgyad ces pa ni sku'i dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams so //

original: rtag pa zhes pa ni ma bcos pa nyid kyi phyir bde bde ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa zhes pa ni ma bcos pa nyid kyi phyir bde bde ba'o //
translated: The eternal is bliss because it is unfabricated.

original: rgyal ba zhes pa ni dus gsum gyi rgyal ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba zhes pa ni dus gsum gyi rgyal ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: The victor is MahƒÅvajradhara because he is the nature of the victors of the three times.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mang po'i tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mang po'i tshig go //

original: rdo rje snying zhes pa ni snying po rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rdo rje snying zhes pa ni snying po rdo rje ste /

original: bde chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: bde chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' chen po'o //

original: bha ga ni padma'o //
analyzed: bha ga ni padma'o //

analyzed: legs sbyangs ni sgrub pa'i thabs las gsungs pa'i rim pas so //

original: thig le'i don gyi bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: thig le'i don gyi bshad pa gsungs pa /

original: cha zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: cha zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: cha zhes pa ni aa yig ste sgra ji bzhin pa min pas so //

original: 'di'i gnyis pa ni aa yig ste /
analyzed: 'di'i gnyis pa ni aa yig ste /

original: klog pa'i rim pas so / gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: klog pa'i rim pas so / gsungs pa yang /

analyzed: shes bya zhes bya dang dang po bar du brjod //

original: mthar gnas pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: mthar gnas pa gsungs pa /

original: dgug pa zhes pa sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dgug pa zhes pa sogs pa ste /

analyzed: dgu pa nyid kyis dgu pa'i yi ge ha yig gi dgu pa'o //

original: 'di ji ltar dgu pa yin zhes na /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar dgu pa yin zhes na /

original: gsungs pa / sum cu pa zhes sum cu yang yin @35a * //
analyzed: gsungs pa / sum cu pa zhes sum cu yang yin @35a * //
translated: The thirty is also thirty,

original: bcu yang yin no zhes pa sum cu bcu pa ste /
analyzed: bcu yang yin no zhes pa sum cu bcu pa ste /
translated: and also ten, thus the thirty-ten.üîΩBy the rule of etymology.üîΩThe ten groups of four are the four groups of the expressed.

original: nges pa'i tshig gi cho gas so // bzhi phrag bcu par mngon par brjod par brjod pa'i sde tshan bzhi po 'di nyid kyi dman pa'i a'a li k'a li lnga bcu'i yi ge rnams kyi lhag ma'i yi ge dgu rnams kyi mtha' ma ha yig des kyang brjod
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig gi cho gas so // bzhi phrag bcu par mngon par brjod par brjod pa'i sde tshan bzhi po 'di nyid kyi dman pa'i a'a li k'a li lnga bcu'i yi ge rnams kyi lhag ma'i yi ge dgu rnams kyi mtha' ma ha yig des kyang brjod
translated: The remaining nine letters of the fifty letters of the inferior ƒÅlikƒÅli are expressed by the final letter ha.

original: do zhes pa'i don to ;
analyzed: do zhes pa'i don to ;
translated: The meaning is that it is expressed by that.

original: / ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: / ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /

original: lnga zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lnga zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: lnga pa ni lnga pa'i bdag nyid can no //

analyzed: sa bon ni de skyed bar byed pa'o //

original: / au yig gi dang po las te /
analyzed: / au yig gi dang po las te /
translated: From the first of the letter u,

analyzed: drug pas phye zhes pa a'u yig go //

original: des ha yig phye bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: des ha yig phye bar byas pa'o //

analyzed: phyi nas rjes su nga ro dang / ring po dang bcas pa dang / yon tan dang yang dag par sbyor ba dang / dbye ba rnams ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du bya'o //

original: gnas gsum du'o //
analyzed: gnas gsum du'o //

analyzed: byung ba ni shes rab dang / thabs dag gi sbyor ba las phyir rol du byung ba'o //

analyzed: 'di ni ste 'di lta bu ni thig le yin zhes bshad ces pa ni //

analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po'o zhes lha mo bzhis zhus par gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa'o //

original: spyi'i don no //
analyzed: spyi'i don no //

analyzed: ni dgongs pa ma yin pa dang drang ba'i don no 'dir tshig gi don no //

analyzed: dam pa zhes pa la sogs pa la de lta bu'i cho ga'i yul 'chad ba la yang rtogs par bya'o zhes slob par byed pa'i don du gsungs so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda rnams bskyed pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /

original: gcig dang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gcig dang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: shes rab ni snang ba'i ye shes dang sems byung las skyes pas sems dang zla ba'i snang ba bzhin du gsal ba dang chu zla lta bu'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni snang ba'i ye shes dang sems byung las skyes pas sems dang zla ba'i snang ba bzhin du gsal ba dang chu zla lta bu'o //
translated: Wisdom is the wisdom of appearance and is born from the mind and mental factors, so it is clear like the mind and the appearance of the moon, and like the reflection of the moon in water.

original: 'dod chags bral sogs skad cig bdag ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa de la bsten nas 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags bral sogs skad cig bdag ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa de la bsten nas 'byung ba'o //
translated: Free from attachment and so forth means free from attachment and so forth arise in dependence on that.

original: 'di kun rdzob tu dngos su bud med kyi tshul dang / bha dang dang padma'i brdas lha mo'i tshogs pa dang / shes rab ye shes skye ba'i phyir rang gi rdo rje rkyen dang rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'di kun rdzob tu dngos su bud med kyi tshul dang / bha dang dang padma'i brdas lha mo'i tshogs pa dang / shes rab ye shes skye ba'i phyir rang gi rdo rje rkyen dang rgyu'o //
translated: All of these are the assembly of goddesses, directly in the manner of women, and by the symbols of bhaga, and lotus, and are the condition and cause of one's vajra, for the arising of the wisdom of the wisdom consort.

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs @35b pa la 'di ni zhes snang ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs @35b pa la 'di ni zhes snang ba'i ye shes so //
translated: This is the wisdom of appearance.

original: rtsa ba ni rgyur gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba ni rgyur gsungs pa'o //
translated: The root is said to be the cause.

original: yongs su ste thams cad las shes pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su ste thams cad las shes pa'o //
translated: It is entirely from all.

original: gang ni srid pa gsum ste 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang ni srid pa gsum ste 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'o //
translated: That is, the three existences, the desire realm, and so on.

original: de'i bdag nyid can nam ma lus la sogs par ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can nam ma lus la sogs par ro //
translated: It is of their nature, or in their entirety, and so on.

original: 'od ma 'greng ba ni 'od ma'i lo ma'o //
analyzed: 'od ma 'greng ba ni 'od ma'i lo ma'o //
translated: The bamboo is the leaf of the bamboo.

original: mdzes pa ni yid la so sor mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa ni yid la so sor mdzes pa'o //
translated: It is beautiful, pleasing to the mind.

original: 'dod chags la sogs ni 'dod chags la sogs rang bzhin bzhi bcu tham pa rab tu bskyed pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //'di'i rang bzhin rnams gsungs pa yang 'dod chags dang / rangs pa dang / smin pa dang / dga' ba dang /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs ni 'dod chags la sogs rang bzhin bzhi bcu tham pa rab tu bskyed pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //'di'i rang bzhin rnams gsungs pa yang 'dod chags dang / rangs pa dang / smin pa dang / dga' ba dang /
translated: and so on.

original: drag po la sogs pa rnams so // kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes bu dang / lha'i tshogs pa dang / rtags dang rdo rje can gyi brda'o //
analyzed: drag po la sogs pa rnams so // kun rdzob tu mngon sum du skyes bu dang / lha'i tshogs pa dang / rtags dang rdo rje can gyi brda'o //
translated: Conventionally, they are the signs of the assembly of men, gods, and the one with the vajra.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: ming ni thabs zhes bya ba yin zhes so //
analyzed: ming ni thabs zhes bya ba yin zhes so //
translated: Name is called the means.

original: rig pa chen po rang nyid dang lhan cig tu bya ba yin gyi gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig pa chen po rang nyid dang lhan cig tu bya ba yin gyi gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The great knowledge is to be done together with itself, because it is independent of anything else.

original: rtsa ba ni rgyu'o//
analyzed: rtsa ba ni rgyu'o//
translated: The root is the cause.

original: ma rig pa ni rgyu nyid dang / kun du 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni rgyu nyid dang / kun du 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
translated: Ignorance is the cause and the cause of the engagement, because it is the attainment of light.

original: lugs las bzlog pa ni rnam ldang ba las so //
analyzed: lugs las bzlog pa ni rnam ldang ba las so //
translated: The reverse order is from the arising.

original: 'di'i rang bzhin ni de yang 'khrul pa dang / skyo ba dang brjed ngas pa dang / le lo dang / mi smra ba dang the tshom zhes so //
analyzed: 'di'i rang bzhin ni de yang 'khrul pa dang / skyo ba dang brjed ngas pa dang / le lo dang / mi smra ba dang the tshom zhes so //
translated: Its nature is delusion, weariness, forgetfulness, laziness, silence, and doubt.

original: ma rig pa zhes pa la sogs pas sngar gsungs pa dag gi go rims kyi 'brel ba ston par byed do //
analyzed: ma rig pa zhes pa la sogs pas sngar gsungs pa dag gi go rims kyi 'brel ba ston par byed do //
translated: Ignorance, etc. indicate the connection of the sequence of the previously mentioned ones.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir rang bzhin rnams ma gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir rang bzhin rnams ma gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, the natures are not mentioned here.

original: sngar bzhin kho nar gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar bzhin kho nar gsungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mentioned just as before.

original: 'gog pa ston par 'dod nas gsungs pa /üîΩ'gro zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gog pa ston par 'dod nas gsungs pa / 'gro zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Desiring to teach cessation, he says:

original: phung po lnga rnams dang mas bzhir thim /
analyzed: phung po lnga rnams dang mas bzhir thim /
translated: The five aggregates go into the four,

original: khams rnams dang po snang ba'i ye shes su 'gro'o //
analyzed: khams rnams dang po snang ba'i ye shes su 'gro'o //
translated: the elements go into the pristine consciousness of appearance,

original: rnam shes ni snang ba'i ye shes su bshad do //
analyzed: rnam shes ni snang ba'i ye shes su bshad do //
translated: and consciousness is explained as the pristine consciousness of appearance.

original: snang ba gsal ba de ni stong pa chen po snang ba nye bar thob par ro //
analyzed: snang ba gsal ba de ni stong pa chen po snang ba nye bar thob par ro //
translated: That appearance, which is clarity, goes into the great emptiness, which is the attainment of appearance.

original: de yang zhes pa ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes pa ma rig pa'o //
translated: That also means ignorance.

original: 'od gsal bar 'gro'o ni don dam pa'i bden par ro ;
analyzed: 'od gsal bar 'gro'o ni don dam pa'i bden par ro ;
translated: Going into luminosity is into ultimate truth.

original: ; thos pa zhes pa la sogs pas sngar brjod pa'i rjes su gsungs pa /
analyzed: ; thos pa zhes pa la sogs pas sngar brjod pa'i rjes su gsungs pa /
translated: The statement hearing, etc. is a continuation of the above.

original: snang ba gsum gyis mtshan nyid can zhes pa ni /
analyzed: snang ba gsum gyis mtshan nyid can zhes pa ni /
translated: The statement characterized by the three appearances

original: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: is a continuation of the statement one, etc.

original: ming zhes pa mthar thug pas rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid brjod par gsungs so //
analyzed: ming zhes pa mthar thug pas rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid brjod par gsungs so //
translated: The statement name is a continuation of the statement ultimate. Thus, the characteristic of its own nature is stated.

original: 'gro'o zhes pa la sogs pa nas @36a * //
analyzed: 'gro'o zhes pa la sogs pa nas @36a * //
translated: The statement goes, etc. is a continuation of the statement the cause of the cessation of the three appearances.

original: 'od gsal ba zhes pa 'dis kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po sngar gsungs pa'i 'gog pa brjod do //üîΩda ni rang bzhin gyi rgyu nyid sems can gyi khams kyi'ang rgyur yin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba zhes pa 'dis kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po sngar gsungs pa'i 'gog pa brjod do // da ni rang bzhin gyi rgyu nyid sems can gyi khams kyi'ang rgyur yin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: The statement clear light is a continuation of the statement the result of the cessation of the three appearances. Thus, the cessation of the result and cause is stated.üîΩ Now, the statement the cause of the natural is also the cause of the element of sentient beings is stated.

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement natural root is a continuation of the statement the cause of the natural.

original: rang bzhin rtsa ba ji ltar yin zhe na /üîΩsems can khams zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin rtsa ba ji ltar yin zhe na / sems can khams zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: How is it the natural root?üîΩ The statement element of sentient beings is a continuation of the statement natural root.

original: ta ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la don zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar gsungs pa la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: ta ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la don zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar gsungs pa la ltos pa'o //
translated: The statement tamas, etc., is a continuation of the statement element of sentient beings. The statement up to artha is a continuation of the statement tamas, etc.

original: 'dzin byed de ni chu dang 'o ma bzhin gcig pa can du gyur nas 'dzin par byed pa'i bdag nyid rjod par byed do //
analyzed: 'dzin byed de ni chu dang 'o ma bzhin gcig pa can du gyur nas 'dzin par byed pa'i bdag nyid rjod par byed do //
translated: That which apprehends is said to be of the nature of an apprehender, having become one with the water and milk.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rlung dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rlung dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is said to be ‚Äúendowed with wind,‚Äù etc.

original: rnam shes zhes bya ba ni snang ba gsum mo //
analyzed: rnam shes zhes bya ba ni snang ba gsum mo //
translated: ‚ÄúConsciousness‚Äù refers to the three appearances.

original: rtag tu ni bar ma chad par ro //
analyzed: rtag tu ni bar ma chad par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù means uninterruptedly.

original: gang gi phyir rlung ni gzhan la rag las te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rlung ni gzhan la rag las te /
translated: Because the wind is dependent on another,

original: nam du yang 'gog pa med do //
analyzed: nam du yang 'gog pa med do //
translated: it is never obstructed.

original: ldang ba na yang lus gnyis kyis de rag las so //
analyzed: ldang ba na yang lus gnyis kyis de rag las so //
translated: Even when arising, it is dependent on the two bodies.

original: 'gro la ni khams gsum pa la'o //
analyzed: 'gro la ni khams gsum pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the world‚Äù refers to the three realms.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

original: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù and so on.

original: bzhon pa yin zhes pa ni rnam shes dang 'dres par gyur nas shin tu myur ba nyid las kyis 'phangs pa'i yul thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhon pa yin zhes pa ni rnam shes dang 'dres par gyur nas shin tu myur ba nyid las kyis 'phangs pa'i yul thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúVehicle‚Äù means that, having become mixed with consciousness, it quickly attains the object projected by karma.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, the sequence of presentations is stated:

original: rta zhon pa bzhin pa rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams kyi bzhon pa la zhon nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rta zhon pa bzhin pa rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams kyi bzhon pa la zhon nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That consciousness which is like a rider, mounted on the vehicle of the wind element, etc.

original: de yis ni snang ba gsum gyi thogs ma'i nyid du gsungs pa'i snang ba rnams so //
analyzed: de yis ni snang ba gsum gyi thogs ma'i nyid du gsungs pa'i snang ba rnams so //
translated: By that, the appearances that were taught as the first of the three appearances are the appearances.

original: da ni de rnams kyi nges par 'byin pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de rnams kyi nges par 'byin pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the definitive release of those is taught:

original: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The nature, etc.

original: ji lta ji ltar zhes pa ni snang ba gang yin pa de nges par 'gro bar 'gyur zhes pa mngon par dgongs so //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar zhes pa ni snang ba gang yin pa de nges par 'gro bar 'gyur zhes pa mngon par dgongs so //
translated: As it is, as it is‚Äîwhatever appearance there is, that will definitely go‚Äîis the intention.

original: sra ba zhes pa la sogs pas snang ba gsum rlung dang bcas lhan cig spyod pa'i spyod dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: sra ba zhes pa la sogs pas snang ba gsum rlung dang bcas lhan cig spyod pa'i spyod dbang du byas nas /
translated: By the solidity, etc., the three appearances together with the wind, taking the conduct of the retinue into consideration,

original: sems can khams ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: sems can khams ni ma lus pa //
translated: the realm of sentient beings without exception,

original: zhes gsungs pa de rgyas par ston par byed do //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa de rgyas par ston par byed do //
translated: is taught extensively.

original: de la 'di go rims bzhin du 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'di go rims bzhin du 'dus pa ste /
translated: There, this is the order:

original: 'chi ba'i 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam par gzung bar bya ba 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam par gzung bar bya ba 'dzin par byed do //
translated: The consciousness that is the appropriator of death is the consciousness that is to be appropriated by another life.

original: de la gang 'gog bzhin pa de 'gog par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la gang 'gog bzhin pa de 'gog par brjod par bya'o //
translated: In this regard, it should be said that the consciousness that is ceasing is the consciousness that is being appropriated.

original: 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam pa la brten nas skye ba'i cha shas can bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam pa la brten nas skye ba'i cha shas can bskyed par bya ste /
translated: The consciousness that is arising is the consciousness that is being generated, based on the aspect of another life.

original: srang mda'i mtho dman bzhin no //
analyzed: srang mda'i mtho dman bzhin no //
translated: It is like the rising and falling of a scale.

original: srid pa 'pho ba'i mdo las @36b gsungs pa /
analyzed: srid pa 'pho ba'i mdo las @36b gsungs pa /
translated: The S≈´tra on Transference of Existence says:

original: srog gi 'phen pa'i las zad nas rnam shes phyi ma 'gag bzhin pa la de'i las mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog gi 'phen pa'i las zad nas rnam shes phyi ma 'gag bzhin pa la de'i las mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: When the karma that impels life is exhausted, the consciousness of the next life arises, and the karma of that life becomes manifest.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: gnyid sad pa nas ljongs kyi bud med bzang mo zhes te /
analyzed: gnyid sad pa nas ljongs kyi bud med bzang mo zhes te /
translated: When you wake up from sleep, you think of a beautiful woman in the land.

original: gang phyi ma'i rnam shes 'gag par bya ba dang / dang po'i rnam shes skye ba'i cha shas can bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: gang phyi ma'i rnam shes 'gag par bya ba dang / dang po'i rnam shes skye ba'i cha shas can bskyed par bya'o //
translated: The consciousness that is ceasing is the consciousness of the previous life, and the consciousness that is arising is the consciousness that is being generated, based on the aspect of the next life.

original: gal te yang dbang po la sogs pa'i lha de rnams la /
analyzed: gal te yang dbang po la sogs pa'i lha de rnams la /
translated: If the gods of the sense and form realms

original: kha cig chos kyi dman pas 'jig rten 'di las 'jig rten pha rol du 'pho bar byed pa dang rnam par rig par bya'o zhes rab tu shes so zhes so //
analyzed: kha cig chos kyi dman pas 'jig rten 'di las 'jig rten pha rol du 'pho bar byed pa dang rnam par rig par bya'o zhes rab tu shes so zhes so //
translated: Some, because of the inferiority of their Dharma, pass from this world to the next world, and are reborn in the world of the living.

original: de la gang phyir ma'i rnam shes 'gog pa de 'chi 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: de la gang phyir ma'i rnam shes 'gog pa de 'chi 'pho bar byed do //
translated: In this regard, the cessation of the final consciousness is death.

original: gang dang po'i rnam shes rab tu 'byung ba de skye bar byed do //
analyzed: gang dang po'i rnam shes rab tu 'byung ba de skye bar byed do //
translated: The arising of the first consciousness is birth.

original: de la phyi ma'i rnam shes bzhin 'gag bzhin zhig pa ni 'gro zhig tu ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de la phyi ma'i rnam shes bzhin 'gag bzhin zhig pa ni 'gro zhig tu ba ma yin no //
translated: The cessation of the final consciousness is not the going of anything anywhere.

original: dang po'i rnam shes skye ba'i cha shas can skye bzhin pa ni gang las kyang 'ong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dang po'i rnam shes skye ba'i cha shas can skye bzhin pa ni gang las kyang 'ong ba ma yin no //
translated: The arising of the first consciousness is not the coming of anything from anywhere.

original: de la phyi ma'i rnam shes kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de la phyi ma'i rnam shes kyis stong ngo //
translated: In this regard, the final consciousness is empty of the final consciousness.

original: 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho bas stong ngo //
analyzed: 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho bas stong ngo //
translated: Death is empty of death.

original: dang po'i rnam shes ni dang po'i rnam shes ni dang po'i rnam shes kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dang po'i rnam shes ni dang po'i rnam shes ni dang po'i rnam shes kyis stong ngo //
translated: The first consciousness is empty of the first consciousness.

original: skye ba ni skye bas stong ngo //
analyzed: skye ba ni skye bas stong ngo //
translated: Birth is empty of birth.

original: chos rnams kyang nyams pa dang bral ba'am /
analyzed: chos rnams kyang nyams pa dang bral ba'am /
translated: Nor are phenomena devoid of deterioration and absence.

original: rab tu nyams par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rab tu nyams par rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the complete degeneration.

original: de la 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam pa dang lhan cig 'gag pa de'i rnam pas ldang bar gyur pa de bar do'i srid pa'i ming thob ste /
analyzed: de la 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam pa dang lhan cig 'gag pa de'i rnam pas ldang bar gyur pa de bar do'i srid pa'i ming thob ste /
translated: In that, the arising together with the aspect of another world, by that aspect, is the attainment of the name of the intermediate state existence.

original: 'chi ba'i srid pa dang / skye ba'i srid pa dag gi bar du thob par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i srid pa dang / skye ba'i srid pa dag gi bar du thob par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is attained in between the death existence and the birth existence.

original: de yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'gog pa ni rig pa chen po ste bar do'i srid pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'gog pa ni rig pa chen po ste bar do'i srid pa'o //
translated: The cessation of those who possess complete knowledge is the great knowledge, the intermediate state existence.

original: ma rig pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa 'od gsal ba nyid las langs par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi rnam pa 'od gsal ba nyid las langs par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because ignorance arises from the aspect of Vajradhara, the clear light.

original: 'di'i skye ba'i cha dang mthun pa dang bcas par sems kyi rgyud rab tu mi 'jug pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid du rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i skye ba'i cha dang mthun pa dang bcas par sems kyi rgyud rab tu mi 'jug pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid du rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The continuum of mind, together with that which is favorable to birth, does not function. It should be posited as the enjoyment body.

original: gzhan yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'di rnam gzhag par bya'o // skye ba'i dbang las sems can yongs su smin pa dang grol ba'i don du bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'di rnam gzhag par bya'o // skye ba'i dbang las sems can yongs su smin pa dang grol ba'i don du bskyed par bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva should generate the thought of enlightenment for the sake of the complete maturation and liberation of sentient beings, by the power of birth.

original: gang yang skye ba med pa nyid do /
analyzed: gang yang skye ba med pa nyid do /
translated: And that is non-production itself.

original: gdul bya rnams skye ba la sogs pa nyid du so sor snang ste /
analyzed: gdul bya rnams skye ba la sogs pa nyid du so sor snang ste /
translated: The disciples appear individually as having birth, etc.

original: sh'akya seng ge bzhin no //
analyzed: sh'akya seng ge bzhin no //
translated: Like the Lion of the Shakyas.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gi nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag gi bag chags gnyis yod @37a * //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gi nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag gi bag chags gnyis yod @37a * //
translated: The disciples and the hermit buddhas have two habitual propensities, of the afflictive obstructions and of the obstructions to omniscience.

original: kyang ; 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis 'gro ba gzhan la mi ltos kyang sems kyi rgyud mi 'jug go //
analyzed: kyang ; 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis 'gro ba gzhan la mi ltos kyang sems kyi rgyud mi 'jug go //
translated: But even though they do not depend on another person, because of the power of the concentration of cessation, their mental processes do not operate.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pas gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, the noble ones say:

original: ji srid sangs rgyas kyis ma bskul //
analyzed: ji srid sangs rgyas kyis ma bskul //
translated: As long as they are not urged by the Buddha,

original: de srid ye shes lus dngos can //
analyzed: de srid ye shes lus dngos can //
translated: those whose bodies are of the nature of intuitionüîΩremain in the state of the disciples,

original: ting nge 'dzin myong pas brgyal gyur ba'i //üîΩnyan thos de dag gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin myong pas brgyal gyur ba'i //üîΩnyan thos de dag gnas par 'gyur //
translated: stupefied by the experience of concentration.

original: bskul nas sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni //
analyzed: bskul nas sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni //
translated: Having been urged, by various forms,

original: sems can don la chags gyur cing //
analyzed: sems can don la chags gyur cing //
translated: having become attached to the welfare of sentient beings,

original: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags nas //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags nas //
translated: having accumulated the collections of merit and wisdom,

original: slar yang sangs rgyas byang chub thob //
analyzed: slar yang sangs rgyas byang chub thob //
translated: again, one attains the enlightenment of a buddha.

original: gnyis kyi bag chags yod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gnyis kyi bag chags yod pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the latent tendencies of the two are present,

original: bag chags sa bon brjod bya ste //
analyzed: bag chags sa bon brjod bya ste //
translated: the latent tendencies are called seeds.

original: sa bon de dngos tshogs pa las //
analyzed: sa bon de dngos tshogs pa las //
translated: From the collection of those seeds,

original: srid pa'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: srid pa'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur //
translated: the sprout of existence arises.

original: zhes so // de bzhin du phung po'i lus yod pa de srid du 'chi 'pho ba'i rab tu dbye ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin du phung po'i lus yod pa de srid du 'chi 'pho ba'i rab tu dbye ba gsungs so //
translated: Similarly, as long as the body of the aggregates exists, the classifications of death and transmigration are taught.

original: da ni de'i 'gro ba gzhan du so sor mtshams sbyor ba'i rim pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni de'i 'gro ba gzhan du so sor mtshams sbyor ba'i rim pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, the stages of connecting to other migrations are taught.

original: bar do'i srid pa de'i ming gzhan ma rig pa ste ;
analyzed: bar do'i srid pa de'i ming gzhan ma rig pa ste ;
translated: The other name of that intermediate state existence is ignorance.

original: 'gro ba gang du dang / rigs gang du skye ba de dang de'i cha dang mthun pa slar yang 'dod pa nye bar len pa'i mtshan nyid sems kyi rgyud rab tu 'jug ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba gang du dang / rigs gang du skye ba de dang de'i cha dang mthun pa slar yang 'dod pa nye bar len pa'i mtshan nyid sems kyi rgyud rab tu 'jug ste /
translated: The mind-stream, which has the characteristic of again appropriating the desired, engages in accordance with the portion of whatever migration and whatever type one will be born in.

original: de la gal te skyes pa'i bar do'i srid pa yin na bud med la'o //
analyzed: de la gal te skyes pa'i bar do'i srid pa yin na bud med la'o //
translated: If it is the intermediate existence of a male who is to be born, it is in the womb of a woman.

original: 'on te bud med kyi yin na de'i tshe skyes pa la'o //
analyzed: 'on te bud med kyi yin na de'i tshe skyes pa la'o //
translated: If it is a female who is to be born, it is in the womb of a man.üîΩThis is my woman.

original: bdag gi bud med 'di /
analyzed: bdag gi bud med 'di /
translated: This is my man.

original: bdag gi skyes pa 'di zhes phrag dog pa las de dag bud med dang skyes pa dag gi rnam par so sor zhugs pa'i 'dod pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar 'dod pas 'jug go //
analyzed: bdag gi skyes pa 'di zhes phrag dog pa las de dag bud med dang skyes pa dag gi rnam par so sor zhugs pa'i 'dod pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar 'dod pas 'jug go //
translated: But they enter there, desiring to experience the pleasure of sexual union, which is the cause of the desire to grasp the male and female organs.

original: 'dod pa nye bar len pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis so //
analyzed: 'dod pa nye bar len pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis so //
translated: The grasping of desire is the grasping of the two organs.

original: bde ba chen po'i le'ur gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i le'ur gsungs pa yang /

original: gang zhig 'od gsal mchog 'byung ba'i /
analyzed: gang zhig 'od gsal mchog 'byung ba'i /

original: rnam shes de nyid sems dang ldan //
analyzed: rnam shes de nyid sems dang ldan //
