original: zhes so // de ni chos kun rtsa ba ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de ni chos kun rtsa ba ste /
translated: That is the root of all phenomena,üîΩthe nature of the afflicted and the pure.

original: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang bdag / de de rtogs pas gnyis su 'gyur //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang bdag / de de rtogs pas gnyis su 'gyur //
translated: By realizing that, there are two:

original: rang gi bdag dang gzhan pa zhes //
analyzed: rang gi bdag dang gzhan pa zhes //
translated: one‚Äôs own self and the other.

original: rnam shes rlung la zhon pa ni //
analyzed: rnam shes rlung la zhon pa ni //
translated: Consciousness rides on the wind.

original: rlung ni me la me chu la //
analyzed: rlung ni me la me chu la //
translated: The wind rides on fire. Fire rides on water.

original: de nas nur nur rnam par dang // mar mer nar nar gor gor po //
analyzed: de nas nur nur rnam par dang // mar mer nar nar gor gor po //
translated: Then, the kalala, arbuda, pe≈õin, ghana, pra≈õƒÅkhƒÅ,

original: zhes te / sa ni 'dod chags snang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes te / sa ni 'dod chags snang ba'o //
translated: The earth is the appearance of passion.

original: de'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba las khrag gi gong bu dang yid ces so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba las khrag gi gong bu dang yid ces so //
translated: Therefore, from the appearance of passion, the mass of blood and mind.

original: khrag dang khu ba 'di dag las skye'o //
analyzed: khrag dang khu ba 'di dag las skye'o //
translated: From these two, blood and semen, it is born.

original: de'i phyir dbang po gnyis snyoms par sbyor ba las @37b 'dod chags /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po gnyis snyoms par sbyor ba las @37b 'dod chags /
translated: Therefore, from the union of the two organs, passion.

original: 'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
analyzed: 'dod chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba /

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba las 'dod chags bar ma rab tu skye'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba las 'dod chags bar ma rab tu skye'o //

original: des rnam shes gsum por brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: des rnam shes gsum por brjod par bya'o //
translated: By that, the three consciousnesses should be stated.

original: de ltar ye shes gsum gyi rgyu can sras ba zhes pa la sogs pas khams bzhi po gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar ye shes gsum gyi rgyu can sras ba zhes pa la sogs pas khams bzhi po gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the four elements are stated by the three wisdoms, the cause of the embryo, and so on.

original: blangs nas zhes pa la sogs pas brjod pa'i khams bzhi po nye bar len pas de dang lhan cig tu bya ba'i nye bar byed pa'i rnam par shes pa gsungs so //
analyzed: blangs nas zhes pa la sogs pas brjod pa'i khams bzhi po nye bar len pas de dang lhan cig tu bya ba'i nye bar byed pa'i rnam par shes pa gsungs so //
translated: Having taken up, and so on, the four elements that are expressed, the consciousness that is the appropriator of those, together with them, is stated.

original: srid gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur ba ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa can gyi snod gsum bskyed nas /
analyzed: srid gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur ba ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa can gyi snod gsum bskyed nas /

original: bar ma chad par 'dod pa kun du spyod pa dang / gzugs kun du spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa can gyi kun du spyod pa rnams su skye'o //
analyzed: bar ma chad par 'dod pa kun du spyod pa dang / gzugs kun du spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa can gyi kun du spyod pa rnams su skye'o //
translated: Without interruption, one is born in the realms of desire, form, and formlessness.

original: khams kyi dbye ba las kyang /
analyzed: khams kyi dbye ba las kyang /
translated: Also, from the classification of the elements,

original: sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams kyi'ang mtshon par bya ba mthar thug par bya la /
analyzed: sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams kyi'ang mtshon par bya ba mthar thug par bya la /
translated: the earth and so on are to be illustrated as the ultimate.

original: sra ba zhes pa la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed pas mi la sogs pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas so zhes nye bar mtshon no //üîΩ'dir zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: sra ba zhes pa la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed pas mi la sogs pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas so zhes nye bar mtshon no // 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The expression ‚Äúhardness‚Äù and so on is expressed in terms of humans and so on.

original: 'dir zhes pa rnams par shes pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i khams bzhi po rnams so //
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa rnams par shes pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i khams bzhi po rnams so //
translated: Here, the four elements that are empowered by consciousness are

original: 'dus byas mtshan nyid de zhes pa yongs su ma dag pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dus byas mtshan nyid de zhes pa yongs su ma dag pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the characteristics of the conditioned, which means ‚Äúnot pure.‚Äù

original: gzhan yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: kye bcom ldan 'das phung po rnams ci'i phyir 'byung ba chen po las 'byung ba lags /
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das phung po rnams ci'i phyir 'byung ba chen po las 'byung ba lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied:

original: reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni //
analyzed: reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni //

original: de las sa ni skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de las sa ni skye bar 'gyur //

original: byang sems gsher ba'i rnam pa las //
analyzed: byang sems gsher ba'i rnam pa las //

original: chu yi khams kyang yang dag byung /
analyzed: chu yi khams kyang yang dag byung /

original: bskyod las me ni skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bskyod las me ni skye bar 'gyur //

original: 'gro las rlung du rab tu grags //
analyzed: 'gro las rlung du rab tu grags //

original: bde ba rnams mkha'i yin te //
analyzed: bde ba rnams mkha'i yin te //

analyzed: lnga po rnams kyi yongs su bcings //

analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin du bo la ka ko la sbyor bas // reg pa sra ba'i bag chag nyid //

original: gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las //

analyzed: rtag tu drod ni skye bar 'gyur //

analyzed: ka ko lar ni gang zhig sems //

original: de las dge ba dbang mi dge ba'i las yang dag par 'byung zhing /
analyzed: de las dge ba dbang mi dge ba'i las yang dag par 'byung zhing /

original: rnal 'byor bas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bas rtogs par bya'o //

original: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Because of that, the one who is called ‚ÄúBuddha,‚Äù and so on,üîΩis the one who desires thatness.

original: gang de kho na 'dod pa'o // thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi sku 'di 'gro ba'i rgyud nyid skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gang de kho na 'dod pa'o // thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi sku 'di 'gro ba'i rgyud nyid skyes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù and so on refers to the body of all those tathƒÅgatas, Ak·π£hobhya, and so on, which is born in the continuum of migrating beings.

original: phyag rgya bzhi ni dam tshig sems dpa'i sku 'di nyid dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi ni dam tshig sems dpa'i sku 'di nyid dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The four seals are as follows: This very body of the pledge being is the pledge seal.

original: phung po'i zam tog gi nang du son pa'i ye shes sems dpa' ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: phung po'i zam tog gi nang du son pa'i ye shes sems dpa' ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The gnosis being who is within the casket of the aggregates is the great seal.

original: mi shigs par byung ba'i yi ge ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mi shigs par byung ba'i yi ge ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The concentration being, the syllable arisen from the indestructible, is the doctrine seal.

original: bya ba thams cad las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: All activities are the action seal.

original: rang snang gi rang gi bud med de yang lha mo thams cad la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rang snang gi rang gi bud med de yang lha mo thams cad la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: One‚Äôs own woman, who is one‚Äôs own appearance, is also the pledge seal, because she is the nature of all goddesses and so forth.

original: de bzhin du yang na gang zhig spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang na gang zhig spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin /
translated: Similarly, that which is the nature of LocanƒÅ and so forth

original: sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi pos bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi pos bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: is also the four seals, because it is generated by the four elements, earth and so forth.

original: phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: It is sealed with the four seals.

original: sbas pa'i bshad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sbas pa'i bshad pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is this not a hidden explanation?

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs 'chad ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs 'chad ba ci zhe na /
translated: What is the explanation of the creation stage?

original: gang bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la ltos nas snang ba 'byung ngo //üîΩ'di yang snang ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la ltos nas snang ba 'byung ngo // 'di yang snang ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: which arises in dependence on the side of the creation stage.

original: 'dir brtsad par bya ba ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: 'dir brtsad par bya ba ma yin no zhes so //
translated: And this is not to be disputed here, because it has the nature of the three appearances.

original: thams cad dag cing rnam par dag pa'i rim par yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: thams cad dag cing rnam par dag pa'i rim par yang gsungs pa /
translated: And it is also said in the stage of complete purity of everything:

original: shes rab ngo bo nyid 'di ni //
analyzed: shes rab ngo bo nyid 'di ni //
translated: This essence of wisdom

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rtog par byed //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rtog par byed //
translated: is imagined as a moon mandala.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid ni de 'di rang bzhin gyis so // de la zhes pa sku la'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid ni de 'di rang bzhin gyis so // de la zhes pa sku la'o //
translated: And so forth. The nature of the eye and so forth is its intrinsic nature. There, in the body,üîΩand for that very reason, from the word ‚Äúbody,‚Äù Maitreya and Samantabhadra, who are the body sense base, should be understood.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sku zhes pa'i tshig las lus kyi skye mched du gyur pa'i byams pa dang kun du bzang po dag khong du chud par bya'o //'dul ba zhes pa la sogs pa la thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩaartha sartha kharth zhes pa la @39a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sku zhes pa'i tshig las lus kyi skye mched du gyur pa'i byams pa dang kun du bzang po dag khong du chud par bya'o //'dul ba zhes pa la sogs pa la thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩaartha sartha kharth zhes pa la @39a * //
translated: In ‚Äútaming‚Äù and so forth, ‚Äúeverything‚Äù and so forth.

original: sogs pa la rgyun chags pa'i dbyings ni 'gro ba la 'jug ste /
analyzed: sogs pa la rgyun chags pa'i dbyings ni 'gro ba la 'jug ste /
translated: The continuum of the realm of the world is entered by the world.

original: 'tshe ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'tshe ba la yang ngo //
translated: And also by the world of harm.

original: ma rungs pa'i bgegs kyi bdag po rnams phyogs kyi mthar 'dren par byed pa 'am 'tsho ba'i mthar byed pas 'dul bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma rungs pa'i bgegs kyi bdag po rnams phyogs kyi mthar 'dren par byed pa 'am 'tsho ba'i mthar byed pas 'dul bar byed pa'o //
translated: The lords of the unruly obstructors are led to the end of the directions or are brought to the end of life, thus they are disciplined.

original: sos so skye bo'i lag pa la sogs pa'i yan lag gis kyang sdang bzlog par byed pa mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sos so skye bo'i lag pa la sogs pa'i yan lag gis kyang sdang bzlog par byed pa mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because one sees that even the limbs of ordinary people‚Äôs hands and so on are able to ward off enemies.

original: rnal 'byor ba'i lag pa la sogs pa rnams khro bo'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba'i lag pa la sogs pa rnams khro bo'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the hands and so on of the yogin are of the nature of wrathfulness,

original: shin tu drag pa'i gdug pa zlog par byed de zhes gsum du sbyar ro //üîΩde bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi sgo nas brtags pa'am /
analyzed: shin tu drag pa'i gdug pa zlog par byed de zhes gsum du sbyar ro // de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi sgo nas brtags pa'am /
translated: they are able to ward off very fierce evil.

original: rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas bskyed pa'i rim pa mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas bskyed pa'i rim pa mngon par brjod do //
translated: In the same way, one should examine from the perspective of the continuum of the world or from the perspective of the yoga of the creation stage.

original: da ni de dag la mngon par zhen par zhen pa sel ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de dag la mngon par zhen par zhen pa sel ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to remove attachment to those, it is said:

original: de de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: That, that, and so on.

original: lha zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: lha zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The gods are Akshobhya and so forth.

original: lha mo ni spyan ma la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: lha mo ni spyan ma la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The goddesses are Lochana and so forth.

original: ci'i don du slar yang bstan zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i don du slar yang bstan zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why are they taught again? It is said:

original: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings who are not yogis, and so forth.

original: de lha mod kyi lha la dmigs pas thob par nus pa ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de lha mod kyi lha la dmigs pas thob par nus pa ci ltar zhe na /
translated: If they are gods, how can they be attained by means of the observation of gods?

original: gzhag par bya ste dang po'i yul la yang gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa nyid kyis bzhags nas shes pa lhag ma'o / gang gi phyir lha'i rgyud med pa de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: gzhag par bya ste dang po'i yul la yang gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa nyid kyis bzhags nas shes pa lhag ma'o / gang gi phyir lha'i rgyud med pa de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: They should be placed, and so forth. The remaining consciousnesses should be placed in the objects of the first, that is, in RupavajrƒÅ and so forth. Because there is no divine continuum, therefore, this yogi,

original: sems tsam gyi rnal 'byor 'di la yod do zhes pa rnal 'byor pa'o // gnyis med ces pa ni shes bya dang shes pa gnyis ka sems tsam gyi ngo bos gnyis su med par mthong ba gang la yod pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: sems tsam gyi rnal 'byor 'di la yod do zhes pa rnal 'byor pa'o // gnyis med ces pa ni shes bya dang shes pa gnyis ka sems tsam gyi ngo bos gnyis su med par mthong ba gang la yod pa de de bzhin no //
translated: who has the yoga of mind only, exists. Nondual means that which has the vision of the nonduality of both the object of cognition and the cognition, by means of the nature of mind only.

original: dman dan zhes pa la sogs pas yul rnam pa gsum bstan pa ci yin pa de rnam rig tsam yin no zhes gsungs pa yi shes gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa //
analyzed: dman dan zhes pa la sogs pas yul rnam pa gsum bstan pa ci yin pa de rnam rig tsam yin no zhes gsungs pa yi shes gsum zhes pa la sogs pa'o //'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa //
translated: The commentary on this is:

original: 'gro'o zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro'o zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt goes, etc.‚Äù

original: 'gro bar byed do zhes pa thob par bya ba'i dbang po rnams so zhes rang gi sde pa kha cig rnams 'dod do //
analyzed: 'gro bar byed do zhes pa thob par bya ba'i dbang po rnams so zhes rang gi sde pa kha cig rnams 'dod do //
translated: Some of our own schools assert that the word ‚Äúgoes‚Äù refers to the sense faculties that are to be attained.

original: de dang de zhes pa ni //
analyzed: de dang de zhes pa ni //
translated: The words ‚Äúthat and that‚ÄùüîΩare a repetition because the sense faculties such as the eyes are many.

original: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams du ma nyid kyi phyir zlos pa'o // rang nyid ces pa ni rang bzhin 'di rnams so //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams du ma nyid kyi phyir zlos pa'o // rang nyid ces pa ni rang bzhin 'di rnams so //
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù refers to these natures.

original: snang ba tsam zhes pa ni shes bya'i dbang gis shes pa rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba tsam zhes pa ni shes bya'i dbang gis shes pa rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúmere appearance‚Äù mean that consciousness is posited by the power of the object of consciousness.

original: dgongs pa cis de ltar rnam rig tsam du rnam par bshad par bya /
analyzed: dgongs pa cis de ltar rnam rig tsam du rnam par bshad par bya /
translated: Why is it so? It is because it is explained as mere representation.

original: shes pa dang shes bya brdzun pa nyid du sgrub pa'i don du gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya brdzun pa nyid du sgrub pa'i don du gsungs pa yang /
translated: The following is stated to prove that consciousness and objects of consciousness are false:

original: shes @39b bya yod ltar shes pa ste //
analyzed: shes @39b bya yod ltar shes pa ste //
translated: Consciousness is like the object of consciousness.

original: shes dang shes bya de bzhin yod //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya de bzhin yod //
translated: And the knower and the known exist in the same way.

original: gang tshe gnyis ka skye ba med //
analyzed: gang tshe gnyis ka skye ba med //
translated: When neither of the two arises,

original: sangs rgyas de tshe yod pa ci //üîΩshes pa med bzhin shes bya med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de tshe yod pa ci // shes pa med bzhin shes bya med //
translated: How can there be a Buddha?üîΩWithout a knower, there is no known.

original: rnam shes de dag med pa'ang med //
analyzed: rnam shes de dag med pa'ang med //
translated: Without the known, there is no consciousness.

original: de phyir rang bzhin de ma rnyed //
analyzed: de phyir rang bzhin de ma rnyed //
translated: Therefore, the nature of these is not found.

original: shes dang shes bya nyid du brjod //
analyzed: shes dang shes bya nyid du brjod //
translated: The knower and the known are said to exist.

original: ces pa ma yin nam zhe na //
analyzed: ces pa ma yin nam zhe na //
translated: But is this not so?

original: shes pa dang shes bya dag ltos pa med par grub pa nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya dag ltos pa med par grub pa nyid kyi phyir //
translated: Because the knower and the known are established without mutual dependence,

original: brdzun pa nyid du gsungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: brdzun pa nyid du gsungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: are they not said to be false?

original: tsam gyi sgra la dgos pa ci yod /
analyzed: tsam gyi sgra la dgos pa ci yod /
translated: What is the purpose of the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù?

original: tsam gyi sgra'i don tshig tu brtags pa don dam pa nyid kyi don du dgag par bya'o //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgra'i don tshig tu brtags pa don dam pa nyid kyi don du dgag par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù should be negated as the ultimate meaning.

original: yang na rnam shes la ltos pa med par thob pa'i lus kyi rmi las nye bar dmigs pa'i don nyid kyi don du bkag go //
analyzed: yang na rnam shes la ltos pa med par thob pa'i lus kyi rmi las nye bar dmigs pa'i don nyid kyi don du bkag go //
translated: Or, it is negated for the purpose of the object that is observed as the body‚Äôs dream activity that is obtained without depending on consciousness.

original: yang ni rmi lam dang bral lam du mthong zhing dmigs bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang ni rmi lam dang bral lam du mthong zhing dmigs bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Or, it is because of seeing and observing the path free from dreams.

original: yang na par shes pa nyi so sor rtog par bya'o //'di dag ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: yang na par shes pa nyi so sor rtog par bya'o //'di dag ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: How are they to be established?

original: don byed nus pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: don byed nus pa gang yin pa //
translated: Whatever is able to perform a functionüîΩThat is said to be ultimately existent here.

original: de 'dir don dam yod pa yin // zhes don dam pa yod pa'i don gyi mtshan nyid du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de 'dir don dam yod pa yin // zhes don dam pa yod pa'i don gyi mtshan nyid du brjod par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of ultimate existence should be expressed as the definition of an object.üîΩBecause a dream also exists, it performs a function.

original: rmi lam yang yod pa'i phyir 'dis don byed do // bsregs pa dang smin par dang / yan lag mchog la reg pa dmigs nas /
analyzed: rmi lam yang yod pa'i phyir 'dis don byed do // bsregs pa dang smin par dang / yan lag mchog la reg pa dmigs nas /
translated: Having observed burning, cooking, and the contact of supreme limbs,

original: bde ba la sogs pa rmi lam du mthong zhing dmigs bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rmi lam du mthong zhing dmigs bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because happiness and so on are seen and observed in a dream.

original: yang na byang chub sems kyi rnam par bshad par 'phags pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang na byang chub sems kyi rnam par bshad par 'phags pas gsungs pa /
translated: Or else, as it was said by the noble one in the Explanation of the Mind of Enlightenment:

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to reverse the conception of a self,

original: phung po khams sogs bstan pa yin //
analyzed: phung po khams sogs bstan pa yin //
translated: The aggregates, constituents, and so on are taught.

original: sems tsam rnam par gzhag pa gang //
analyzed: sems tsam rnam par gzhag pa gang //
translated: Whatever is posited as mind only

original: de yang bdag nyid chen po spangs //
analyzed: de yang bdag nyid chen po spangs //
translated: Is also abandoned by the great being.üîΩAnd:

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / stong nyid bdag nyid tshul chen gyis /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / stong nyid bdag nyid tshul chen gyis /
translated: By the great way of the emptiness of self,

original: sems 'di nyid 'di kun brtags dang // gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub pa //
analyzed: sems 'di nyid 'di kun brtags dang // gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub pa //
translated: This mind itself is imagined,üîΩdependent, and thoroughly established.

original: nyid du yang ni brtags pa yin //
analyzed: nyid du yang ni brtags pa yin //
translated: It is imagined to be the three natures.

original: zhes so // sun 'byin pas brjod pa /
analyzed: zhes so // sun 'byin pas brjod pa /
translated: The opponent says:

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes par smra ba 'di lta bu nyid /üîΩ'phags pas bzhed do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes par smra ba 'di lta bu nyid / 'phags pas bzhed do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, this kind of consciousness is accepted by the ƒÄryas.

original: gzhan gyi phyogs rjes su brjod nas sun 'byin pa brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs rjes su brjod nas sun 'byin pa brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: No, it is not, because the refutation is stated after stating the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: bdag nyid ma rig tsam du ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bdag nyid ma rig tsam du ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is not merely ignorance itself.

original: de dang gzhan nyid du brtags pa'i rang bzhin med pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu dang / rtag pa dang / rtag pa ma yin la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba kun rdzob bden ba'i ngo bor gsungs so //
analyzed: de dang gzhan nyid du brtags pa'i rang bzhin med pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu dang / rtag pa dang / rtag pa ma yin la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba kun rdzob bden ba'i ngo bor gsungs so //
translated: The nature of illusion, which is the absence of a nature that is the same or different, and the nature of conventional truth, which is free from the nature of permanence and impermanence, and so on, are stated.

original: 'dir dbu @40a * //
analyzed: 'dir dbu @40a * //
translated: Here, the Madhyamaka

original: mar yang / gzugs la sogs pa rgya cher ni //
analyzed: mar yang / gzugs la sogs pa rgya cher ni //
translated: says extensively about form and so on:

original: ldog pas rnam rig 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ldog pas rnam rig 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: The arising of consciousness does not occur through negation.

original: bsgrub bya dbang po la sogs rtogs //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dbang po la sogs rtogs //
translated: The object of affirmation is understood by the sense faculties and so on.

original: rnam rig tsam nyid ma gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam rig tsam nyid ma gsungs so //
translated: He did not teach mere awareness.

original: zhes dang / klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis kyang /
analyzed: zhes dang / klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis kyang /
translated: And NƒÅgƒÅrjuna‚Äôs disciple NƒÅgabodhi says:

original: gal te slar yang gzhan gyi brjod pa'i rnam par shes pa smra bar mngon par rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te slar yang gzhan gyi brjod pa'i rnam par shes pa smra bar mngon par rtogs par bya ste /
translated: If you say that the consciousness that is the object of another‚Äôs expression is to be realized,

original: de'i tshe nyes ba cir 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i tshe nyes ba cir 'gyur /
translated: then what is the problem?

original: de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, it would be a nonthing.

original: dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid 'phags pas bzhed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid 'phags pas bzhed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And the reality of a nonthing is not accepted by the noble ones.

original: gsungs pa yang 'di'i /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang 'di'i /
translated: And this is said:

original: dngos po nyid dang dngos med kyang //
analyzed: dngos po nyid dang dngos med kyang //
translated: Neither a thing nor a nonthing

original: myang 'das gyur pa yod ma yin /
analyzed: myang 'das gyur pa yod ma yin /
translated: is nirvana.

original: dngos dang dngos med gsal ba la //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med gsal ba la //
translated: That which is clear as a thing or a nonthing

original: de ni mya ngan 'das par brjod //
analyzed: de ni mya ngan 'das par brjod //
translated: is said to be nirvana.

original: ces so // theg pa chen po rnam pa gnyis 'jug par byed pa bsgrub pa'i don du mu stegs don smra ba rnams kyis sun phyung ba'o //
analyzed: ces so // theg pa chen po rnam pa gnyis 'jug par byed pa bsgrub pa'i don du mu stegs don smra ba rnams kyis sun phyung ba'o //
translated: This is a refutation of the non-Buddhist proponents of objects who assert that the two types of MahƒÅyƒÅna are to be engaged and accomplished.

original: de yang rnam par shes pa smra ba rnams kyis rnam par shes pa yang dbu ma rnams kyis sun phyung ba'i zhes pa mi rigs so //
analyzed: de yang rnam par shes pa smra ba rnams kyis rnam par shes pa yang dbu ma rnams kyis sun phyung ba'i zhes pa mi rigs so //
translated: Also, the Proponents of Consciousness say that even consciousness is refuted by the Followers of the Middle Way.

original: don la sogs pa rnams kyis dngos po med par bya ba'am rang bzhin gzhan gyis 'grub pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: don la sogs pa rnams kyis dngos po med par bya ba'am rang bzhin gzhan gyis 'grub pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is illogical to say that things are established by objects and so on, or that they are established by something else that is not their nature.

original: de'i phyir de rnams tshad ma'i gzhal bar byed pa'i dngos po 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par rnam par gzhag par shes par byed pa ma yin pa na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams tshad ma'i gzhal bar byed pa'i dngos po 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par rnam par gzhag par shes par byed pa ma yin pa na'o //
translated: Therefore, those who do not understand that the objects of investigation by valid cognition are established as things in the contexts of both samsara and nirvana are not suitable to be MƒÅdhyamikas.üîΩAt that time, the words of the master NƒÅgƒÅrjuna are:

original: de'i tshe tshig dag nyid ni slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyi lam las ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe tshig dag nyid ni slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyi lam las ni /
translated: Those who are outside of the path of the master NƒÅgƒÅrjuna

original: phyi rol gyur la zhi la zhi ba'i thabs med do //
analyzed: phyi rol gyur la zhi la zhi ba'i thabs med do //
translated: Have no means to attain peace.

original: de dag kun rdzob de nyid bden las nyams //
analyzed: de dag kun rdzob de nyid bden las nyams //
translated: They fall from the truths of the relative and suchness.

original: de las nyams pa mthar grub yod pa min /üîΩzhes dang / gang zhig tha snyad bden pa thabs su gyur ;
analyzed: de las nyams pa mthar grub yod pa min / zhes dang / gang zhig tha snyad bden pa thabs su gyur ;
translated: Those who fall from those two will not attain the final.üîΩAnd:üîΩThe conventional truth is the means,

original: / don dam bden pa thabs byung gyur ba ste //
analyzed: / don dam bden pa thabs byung gyur ba ste //
translated: And the ultimate truth is the result of the means.

original: de dag rnam dbye gang gis mi shes pa //
analyzed: de dag rnam dbye gang gis mi shes pa //
translated: By what distinction is that not known?

original: de ni rnam log pas lam ngan zhugs //
analyzed: de ni rnam log pas lam ngan zhugs //
translated: By that reversal, one enters a bad path.

original: zhes so // spros pas chog go //
analyzed: zhes so // spros pas chog go //
translated: Enough with the elaboration!

original: skabs su babs nyid brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: skabs su babs nyid brjod par bya ste /
translated: The present occasion itself should be stated.

original: de de'i zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid sa'i snying po la sogs pa dbang po'i lam kyis so //
analyzed: de de'i zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid sa'i snying po la sogs pa dbang po'i lam kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is the nature of the eye, etc. , in form, etc. , the nature of K·π£hitigarbha, etc. , by the path of the sense organs.

original: yul ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: yul ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The object is the nature of R≈´pavajrƒÅ, etc.

original: thob pa ni yul can du byas nas so //
analyzed: thob pa ni yul can du byas nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúAttained‚Äù is having made the object into the subject.

original: sgrub pa po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid bsgrub par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid bsgrub par 'dod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe practitioner‚Äù is one who desires to accomplish Great Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de bzhin @40b gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can sgrub pa po'o //üîΩma lus pa ni gzugs la sogs pa lnga po dman pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de bzhin @40b gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can sgrub pa po'o // ma lus pa ni gzugs la sogs pa lnga po dman pa'am /
translated: ‚ÄúThe TathƒÅgatas‚Äù are the practitioner who has the nature of all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: bar ma dang mchog rnams bsdus pa'o //üîΩtshim par bya phyir ni tshim pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: bar ma dang mchog rnams bsdus pa'o // tshim par bya phyir ni tshim pa'i ched du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout exception‚Äù includes the five, form, etc. , the inferior, the middling, and the superior.üîΩ‚ÄúFor the sake of satisfaction‚Äù is for the sake of satisfaction.

original: dbul bar bya ba ni nye bar dbul bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbul bar bya ba ni nye bar dbul bar bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúTo be offered‚Äù is to be offered.

original: snang ba gsum po nyid kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba gsum po nyid kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya ba'o //
translated: One should understand the nature of the three appearances.üîΩThis is the worship of all the Tathagatas.

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa ste gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa ste gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: gzugs mthong dga' ston chen po ste //
analyzed: gzugs mthong dga' ston chen po ste //
translated: The sight of form is a great festival,

original: thos ldan 'dod pas myos par byed //
analyzed: thos ldan 'dod pas myos par byed //
translated: The hearing of it intoxicates with desire.

original: sngags kyi tshig ni dri yin no //
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig ni dri yin no //
translated: The words of the mantra are the scent,

original: rang dbang chu nyid chu sbrang rtsi //
analyzed: rang dbang chu nyid chu sbrang rtsi //
translated: The water of self-mastery is the water, the honey.

original: lhan cig skyes pa myang bar 'dod //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa myang bar 'dod //
translated: The innate is the desire to taste.

original: chags pa lus kun bde ba zhes //
analyzed: chags pa lus kun bde ba zhes //
translated: Attachment is the bliss of the whole body.

original: dpe med sna tshogs de 'dod pa //
analyzed: dpe med sna tshogs de 'dod pa //
translated: The incomparable variety is the desire for that.

original: 'bras bu 'khyud pa khyod la sbyin //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'khyud pa khyod la sbyin //
translated: I give you the fruit, the embrace.

original: lha mo lhag ma'i yul rnams la //
analyzed: lha mo lhag ma'i yul rnams la //
translated: O Goddess, in the realm of the remainder,

original: gtso bo don med rdo rje chen //
analyzed: gtso bo don med rdo rje chen //
translated: The chief, the great meaningless vajra,

original: zhes so // sku gsum gyi rgyu can sku bzhi pa gsungs pa //üîΩsku zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so // sku gsum gyi rgyu can sku bzhi pa gsungs pa // sku zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The four bodies, which have the three bodies as their cause, are taught.

original: sku gsum ni sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsum ni sprul pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The three bodies are the emanation body, etc.

original: de la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa'i sprul ba'i sku ni //üîΩming dang skal pa mnyam pa gang du gnas nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa'i sprul ba'i sku ni // ming dang skal pa mnyam pa gang du gnas nas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: The emanation body of the Tathagata who is free from passion and who is not free from passion is the body by which he manifests in the desire realm and the form realm.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa ni 'og min du lha dang skal pa mnyam pas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed pa ste /
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa ni 'og min du lha dang skal pa mnyam pas chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du byed pa ste /
translated: The enjoyment body is the body by means of which he manifests in the Akanistha realm, having attained a likeness to the gods there, and by which he manifests the reality realm.

original: sprul pa'i sku bzhin du sha dang rus pa la sogs pa mi 'dzin pa me longs gsal ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku bzhin du sha dang rus pa la sogs pa mi 'dzin pa me longs gsal ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the emanation body, but it is not composed of flesh and bone, etc., but is like a reflection, being a clear form.

original: chos kyi skur ni sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dag gi dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi skur ni sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dag gi dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The reality body is the nature of the non-existence of the emanation body and the enjoyment body.

original: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsum par gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsum par gsungs te /
translated: The Lord has also declared a third body,

original: yid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshig gi rnam par rig par byed nus pa sems can gyi don skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug par bden pa gnyis po'i yang rang bzhin du med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshig gi rnam par rig par byed nus pa sems can gyi don skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug par bden pa gnyis po'i yang rang bzhin du med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The inconceivable mental activity is able to make known the verbal activity, and it acts for the sake of sentient beings in accordance with their fortune.  It is in accord with the world, because it is the nature of the two truths.

original: gsungs pa yang /üîΩsems can don ni gcig bu mdzad pa dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams ye shes che ba dag las pa'i //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang / sems can don ni gcig bu mdzad pa dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams ye shes che ba dag las pa'i //
translated: It is also said:üîΩThe Sugatas‚Äô three bodies, which are free from the path of mind and speech,

original: yid dang ngag gi lam dang so sor bral bar gyur ba'i bde gshegs rnams kyi sku ni gsum po rnams //
analyzed: yid dang ngag gi lam dang so sor bral bar gyur ba'i bde gshegs rnams kyi sku ni gsum po rnams //
translated: are the result of immeasurable merit and wisdom, which acts for the sake of sentient beings alone.

original: zhes so // rdo rje theg par ni sku gsum yang rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo zhes tha dad par gyur pas skyob pa yi zhes pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos so @41a * //
analyzed: zhes so // rdo rje theg par ni sku gsum yang rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo zhes tha dad par gyur pas skyob pa yi zhes pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos so @41a * //
translated: In the Vajra Vehicle, the three bodies are the essence of Vajradhara, and they are distinct.  The ‚Äúprotector‚Äù is the great Vajradhara.

original: gsum po de ni gcig tu gyur pa ni gcig gi ngo bor ro //
analyzed: gsum po de ni gcig tu gyur pa ni gcig gi ngo bor ro //
translated: Those three become one, in the essence of one.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni zung 'jug gi ngo bor sbyor ba ni de la dmigs pa des so //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni zung 'jug gi ngo bor sbyor ba ni de la dmigs pa des so //
translated: The completion stage is the union, and the application is in that, which is the focus.

original: slar yang 'di ci ltar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang 'di ci ltar 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: kun rdzob ste mi la sogs par rab tu grub pa'i phung po la sogs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: kun rdzob ste mi la sogs par rab tu grub pa'i phung po la sogs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: By the very aggregates, etc. , which are well established as humans, etc. , in the relative.

original: gang zhig bden par ni rnal 'byor pa'i so sor sgyu ma lta bu nyid do zhes pa 'di so //
analyzed: gang zhig bden par ni rnal 'byor pa'i so sor sgyu ma lta bu nyid do zhes pa 'di so //
translated: That which is true is the illusion-like nature of the yogi.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan nyid //
translated: The nature of the Buddhas

original: ces pa ni sbrul ba dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dag gi phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can 'di bdag nyid can du gsungs so //
analyzed: ces pa ni sbrul ba dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dag gi phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can 'di bdag nyid can du gsungs so //
translated: is said to be the nature of the emanation body and the enjoyment body, which are external and internal.

original: gsungs pa yang //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang //
translated: It is also said:

original: ji ltar shin tu ches gsal me long la gzugs brnyan yan lag kun ldan gzugs snang ba //
analyzed: ji ltar shin tu ches gsal me long la gzugs brnyan yan lag kun ldan gzugs snang ba //
translated: Just as a very clear reflection of a form appears in a mirror with all its limbs,

original: dpe byad brgyad cu sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
analyzed: dpe byad brgyad cu sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
translated: the eighty minor marks and thirty-two major marks

original: rdo rje 'chang lus rtag tu de bzhin no //üîΩzhes so // de nyid ces ba ni yongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang lus rtag tu de bzhin no // zhes so // de nyid ces ba ni yongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: are always present in the body of Vajradhara.üîΩThe ‚Äúsuchness‚Äù is the enjoyment body.

original: de nyid ces ba ni yongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces ba ni yongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The ‚Äúsuchness‚Äù is the enjoyment body.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir yang sku gsum yongs su dag ces pa longs spyod pa'i skus lhan cig pa de'i bdag nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //üîΩtshig gi lam gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir yang sku gsum yongs su dag ces pa longs spyod pa'i skus lhan cig pa de'i bdag nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro // tshig gi lam gyi phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, here also, ‚Äúthe three bodies are completely pure‚Äù means that the enjoyment body is completely known by the nature of that which is simultaneous with it.

original: tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid ni dpe gcig gnyis kyis bla ma las sgrub par nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid ni dpe gcig gnyis kyis bla ma las sgrub par nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The path of words is the object of this very path of words, because it is possible to establish it from the guru through one or two examples.

original: ye shes rang bzhin ni snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir yang do //
analyzed: ye shes rang bzhin ni snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyis bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir yang do //
translated: The nature of pristine consciousness is generated by the pristine consciousness of appearance and so on and generated by the pristine consciousness of clear light.

original: gtso bo ni khams gsum pa'i dbang phyug nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo ni khams gsum pa'i dbang phyug nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The principal one is the lord of the three realms.

original: snang ba yin ni sku gnyis dang de 'gog pas so //
analyzed: snang ba yin ni sku gnyis dang de 'gog pas so //
translated: The appearance is the two bodies and the cessation of those.

original: 'ja' tshon bzhin du sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa 'od zer lnga bskyed pa nam mkha'i khongs su 'jug pa dbang po'i gzhu lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'ja' tshon bzhin du sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa 'od zer lnga bskyed pa nam mkha'i khongs su 'jug pa dbang po'i gzhu lta bu'o //
translated: Like a rainbow, the five lights that illuminate the virtue and nonvirtue of sentient beings are generated, and like the bow of Indra, they enter the realm of space.

original: phyi nas rim gyis mthar nam mkha' nyid du thim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi nas rim gyis mthar nam mkha' nyid du thim par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, gradually, it dissolves into space itself.

original: 'dir yang dag par gsal bar byed pa tsam //
analyzed: 'dir yang dag par gsal bar byed pa tsam //
translated: Here, it is merely a correct illumination.

original: bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi don mdzad pa nam mkha'i khongs las bzhengs nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi don mdzad pa nam mkha'i khongs las bzhengs nas /
translated: The Blessed One, having arisen from the realm of space, which is the performance of the welfare of sentient beings,

original: de nyid du thim pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gdul bya rnams kyi yang ngo //
analyzed: de nyid du thim pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gdul bya rnams kyi yang ngo //
translated: dissolves into that very [space] in the nirvƒÅ·πáa that is the object of those to be tamed.

original: mkha' la dbang po'i mtshon cha'i kha dog du ma snang //üîΩde bzhin 'dir ni dge sogs las rnams ji bzhin du //
analyzed: mkha' la dbang po'i mtshon cha'i kha dog du ma snang // de bzhin 'dir ni dge sogs las rnams ji bzhin du //
translated: The colors of the weapons of the gods appear in the sky.üîΩIn the same way, here, the colors of the vajra-holder are complete, such as white and so on,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang dkar sogs kha dog phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang dkar sogs kha dog phun sum tshogs //
translated: in accordance with virtuous and so on karma.

original: ma lus de de 'jig rten 'dir ni ston par mdzad //
analyzed: ma lus de de 'jig rten 'dir ni ston par mdzad //
translated: He displays all of that in this world.

original: ces so // gnas skabs kyi dbye ba la brten @41b nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: ces so // gnas skabs kyi dbye ba la brten @41b nas gsungs pa /
translated: It is said in dependence on the division of the occasion:

original: sems zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The mind, and so on.

original: sems la sogs pa rnam grangs gzhan gyis gsungs pa //
analyzed: sems la sogs pa rnam grangs gzhan gyis gsungs pa //
translated: The mind, and so on, are said by another enumeration:

original: shes rab ces ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ces ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Wisdom, and so on.

original: slar yang gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: Again, another is said:

original: stong ba zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: stong ba zhes ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Emptiness, and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de nas stong ba chen po'i rgyu can las 'od gsal ba las langs nas spyod pa spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de nas stong ba chen po'i rgyu can las 'od gsal ba las langs nas spyod pa spyad par bya ste /
translated: Then, after that, having arisen from clear light which has the great emptiness as its cause, one should practice the conduct,

original: spyod bsdus su gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: spyod bsdus su gsungs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: according to the procedure taught in the Compendium of Practice.üîΩHow should one practice?

original: spyod pa ci ltar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: spyod pa ci ltar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is taught:

original: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The nature...

original: spyod pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: spyod pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: The result of the conduct is taught:

original: las kyi lus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: las kyi lus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The body of karma...

original: las kyi lus ni dge ba la sogs pa'i las las skyes pa'i mi la sogs pa'i phung po'o //
analyzed: las kyi lus ni dge ba la sogs pa'i las las skyes pa'i mi la sogs pa'i phung po'o //
translated: The body of karma is the aggregates of humans and so forth, which are born from virtuous and nonvirtuous karma.

original: rdo rje'i sku nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
translated: The vajra body is Great Vajradhara.üîΩThe mind...

original: thugs la zhes bya ba la sogs pas spyod pa ston par byed de /
analyzed: thugs la zhes bya ba la sogs pas spyod pa ston par byed de /
translated: and so forth teaches the conduct.

original: don spyod na don ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po spyod pa ni de rnams nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: don spyod na don ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po spyod pa ni de rnams nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: If one enjoys the meaning, the meaning is the five sense objects of form and so forth. Enjoying them is experiencing them.

original: 'jig rten pa ni 'jig rten 'di la yod pas 'jig rten pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ni 'jig rten 'di la yod pas 'jig rten pa'o //
translated: Worldly means existing in this world.

original: de 'di'o don to //
analyzed: de 'di'o don to //
translated: That is the meaning.

original: 'jig rten 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags pa rnams 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa nyid kyis gdul bar bya'o zhes thugs la bzhag nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags pa rnams 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa nyid kyis gdul bar bya'o zhes thugs la bzhag nas gsungs pa /
translated: The Lord, thinking, Those who are attached to the five worldly goods are to be converted by the enjoyment of desire, said:

original: sbrul zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sbrul zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The body is a snake, etc.

original: sku ni sbrul ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: sku ni sbrul ba'i sku'o //
translated: The body is the body of transformation.

original: longs spyod pa ni nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: longs spyod pa ni nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: Enjoyment is experience.

original: ji lta ji ltar ni ltar 'dod par ro //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar ni ltar 'dod par ro //
translated: As it is is as it is desired.

original: nye bar longs spyod pa'i don ni 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa mi'i lus so //
analyzed: nye bar longs spyod pa'i don ni 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa mi'i lus so //
translated: The meaning of enjoyment is the enjoyment of desire, the human body.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is said:

original: spyod pa longs so //
analyzed: spyod pa longs so //
translated: Enjoyment is enjoyment of the body.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is said:

original: spyod pa longs spyod las rab brjod //
analyzed: spyod pa longs spyod las rab brjod //
translated: Enjoyment is called enjoyment of action.

original: 'jig pa'i gzugs ni ngan par bshad /
analyzed: 'jig pa'i gzugs ni ngan par bshad /
translated: The form of destruction is said to be bad.

original: ces mnyam pa'i spyod pa'o ;
analyzed: ces mnyam pa'i spyod pa'o ;
translated: This is the equal enjoyment.

original: / ster bar byed ces pa la sogs pa ni don gyi spyod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po bzhin du rnam par rtog pa nye bar dga' ba ma lus pa yang ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: / ster bar byed ces pa la sogs pa ni don gyi spyod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po bzhin du rnam par rtog pa nye bar dga' ba ma lus pa yang ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: Giving, etc. means that the enjoyment of the meaning is like a great wish-fulfilling gem, all the delights of conceptualization as well.

original: stobs kyi zhes pa ni yid kyi kun du rtog pa tsam las so //
analyzed: stobs kyi zhes pa ni yid kyi kun du rtog pa tsam las so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the power of‚Äù means by the mere thought of the mind.

original: stobs la sogs pas 'di rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs pa rang 'byung ba nyid du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: stobs la sogs pas 'di rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs pa rang 'byung ba nyid du brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be said that all these perfections of power and so on are self-originated.

original: mchog thob pa'i nges par bya ba gsungs pa //
analyzed: mchog thob pa'i nges par bya ba gsungs pa //
translated: The certainty of attaining the supreme is stated:

original: gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever‚Äù and so on.

original: gang dang gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pas bya ba la nges pa med pa nyid du yang mnyam par gzhag pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang dang gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pas bya ba la nges pa med pa nyid du yang mnyam par gzhag pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúWherever‚Äù and so on shows that even in uncertain activities, one is in meditative equipoise.

original: thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyis @42a * //
analyzed: thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyis @42a * //
translated: ‚ÄúUnimpeded‚Äù means that one acts by means of meditative equipoise.

original: byed pa'o // mnyam par gzhag sbyor pa yi zhes pa ni bdun gyi mthar de sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa'o // mnyam par gzhag sbyor pa yi zhes pa ni bdun gyi mthar de sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe application of meditative equipoise‚Äù means that one should apply it at the end of the seventh.

original: gang yang gang gi phyir thogs pa med pa de'i phyir mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang gang gi phyir thogs pa med pa de'i phyir mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Also, because it is unimpeded, one is always in meditative equipoise, even with the application of non-equipoise.

original: 'gro bar gyur pa de dang de /
analyzed: 'gro bar gyur pa de dang de /
translated: That is the movement.

original: dbang po zhes pa la sogs pas gal te dbang po dang yul dag gi snang ba tsam nyid dang por bsgrub pa de bzhin du da lta ni /
analyzed: dbang po zhes pa la sogs pas gal te dbang po dang yul dag gi snang ba tsam nyid dang por bsgrub pa de bzhin du da lta ni /
translated: If the mere appearance of the sense faculties and objects is established first, then now,

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i dbang du byas nas de'i rab tu dbye ba'i brjod par bya ste/'dir yul du gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i dbang du byas nas de'i rab tu dbye ba'i brjod par bya ste/'dir yul du gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa /
translated: in terms of the application of non-equipoise, its division should be expressed, because here the object is clearly stated.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúvajra,‚Äù etc.

original: 'di dag nye bar mtshon par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag nye bar mtshon par byed pa ste /
translated: These are the illustrations.

original: des mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i snang ba yang bde ba'i bdag nyid ye shes gsum gyi char rig par bya'o //
analyzed: des mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i snang ba yang bde ba'i bdag nyid ye shes gsum gyi char rig par bya'o //
translated: By that, the appearance of the sense faculties such as the eyes should be known as the portion of the three wisdoms that are the nature of bliss.

original: gos pa ni yul la kun nas zhen pa'o //
analyzed: gos pa ni yul la kun nas zhen pa'o //
translated: Attachment is clinging to objects.

original: ma gos pa'i blo gros ni kun nas zhen pa med pa'i blo gros so //
analyzed: ma gos pa'i blo gros ni kun nas zhen pa med pa'i blo gros so //
translated: Unattached intellect is the intellect that is without clinging.

original: der na zhes pa ni yul la mchog tu 'dzin pa kun nas zhen pa'o //
analyzed: der na zhes pa ni yul la mchog tu 'dzin pa kun nas zhen pa'o //
translated: There, clinging is the grasping of objects as supreme.

original: de'i phyir bde bas gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bde bas gnas par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should abide in bliss.

original: rtag tu zhes pa ni bar skabs su bde ba dang 'brel /
analyzed: rtag tu zhes pa ni bar skabs su bde ba dang 'brel /
translated: Always means connected with bliss in the interval.

original: bar skabs su sdug bsngal 'byung ba las so zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bar skabs su sdug bsngal 'byung ba las so zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder is that suffering arises from the arising of the intermediate state.

original: rol zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rol zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The verse beginning with ‚Äúplay‚Äù

original: gtan la dbab pa'i gzhi la rim pa'i cha shas ston par byed do//
analyzed: gtan la dbab pa'i gzhi la rim pa'i cha shas ston par byed do//
translated: teaches the parts of the sequence in the ascertainment section.

original: rol par byed pa ni sems can gyi don du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis rnam par 'gyur par byed do //
analyzed: rol par byed pa ni sems can gyi don du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis rnam par 'gyur par byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúPlay‚Äù is the transformation into various forms for the sake of sentient beings.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: dngos bdag kun la ste /
analyzed: dngos bdag kun la ste /
translated: ‚Äúin all realities.‚Äù

original: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nature of the animate and inanimate.

original: sangs rgyas mdzad pa zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa khams sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rigs sems can smin par byed pa dang / grol bar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mdzad pa zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa khams sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rigs sems can smin par byed pa dang / grol bar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBuddha activity‚Äù is the ripening and liberation of sentient beings through the various elements such as desire and so on.

original: yang dag pa ji lta bar gsungs pa'i tshogs rab tu gsal bar bya ba gang yin pa zhes pa ni gtan la dbab pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta bar gsungs pa'i tshogs rab tu gsal bar bya ba gang yin pa zhes pa ni gtan la dbab pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe ascertainment‚Äù is the ascertainment of the correct teaching.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i lam mo //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i lam mo //
translated: It is the vajra path.

original: de la gnas pa ni de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni de'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: Abiding in that is by way of its nature.

original: rnal 'byor zhes pa la sogs pas ye shes kyi sku nyid kyis rnal 'byor ba zhi la sogs pa'i 'brel ba ston par byed do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes pa la sogs pas ye shes kyi sku nyid kyis rnal 'byor ba zhi la sogs pa'i 'brel ba ston par byed do //
translated: With yoga and so forth, he teaches the connection of the yoga practitioner with the body of wisdom, peace, and so forth.

original: rdo rje can zhes pa la sogs pas brtags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sku'i lus rnams par dben pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can zhes pa la sogs pas brtags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sku'i lus rnams par dben pa'o //
translated: With vajra and so forth, he teaches the body of the yoga practitioner, the imagined body, to be empty.

original: bkag pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bkag pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: With prohibited and so forth,

original: gos mi 'gyur zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gos mi 'gyur zhes pa ni /
translated: he teaches the yoga practitioner to be unstainedüîΩ by any of the prohibited actions.

original: bkag pa spyod pa'i byed @42b pa'i skye bo de gang gis kyang yang dag par gnod par mi 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bkag pa spyod pa'i byed @42b pa'i skye bo de gang gis kyang yang dag par gnod par mi 'gyur pa'o //
translated: The meaning of unstained is that he is not harmed by anyone.

original: do bo nyid shes ni ngo bo nyid shes pa'i phyir ro zhes mngon par dgongs so //
analyzed: do bo nyid shes ni ngo bo nyid shes pa'i phyir ro zhes mngon par dgongs so //
translated: The meaning of knowing the nature is that he knows the nature of things, as is the intention.

original: rang gi 'dun pa 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi 'dun pa 'jug pa'o //
translated: He is engaged in his own desire.

original: ngo bo nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i 'bras bu gsungs pa /
translated: The result of the yoga practitioner who knows the nature is stated:

original: 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: With change and so forth.üîΩ The eight qualities are the eight qualities that are to be practiced.

original: yon tan brgyad ni grangs brgyad du kun du spyad pas grang bar bya ba rnams zhes pas yon tan te /
analyzed: yon tan brgyad ni grangs brgyad du kun du spyad pas grang bar bya ba rnams zhes pas yon tan te /
translated: The eight numbers are the eight numbers.

original: sku'i dbang phyug las sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sku'i dbang phyug las sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The lord of the body, etc.

original: de rnams dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sku ni sbrul ba'i lus thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sku ni sbrul ba'i lus thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The body of knowledge endowed with those is the body of magical emanation, because it is impeded.

original: gang yang sbrul ba yang ma nor ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ye shes nyid kyis so //
analyzed: gang yang sbrul ba yang ma nor ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ye shes nyid kyis so //
translated: And it is knowledge itself, because the magical emanation is unerring.

original: ma lus par zhes pa 'di grangs med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams yang dag par 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: ma lus par zhes pa 'di grangs med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams yang dag par 'dzin par byed do //
translated: It is in its entirety because it is the support of the world systems that are innumerable, immeasurable, and inexpressible.

original: khyim zhes pa la sogs pa la gang du spyod pa zhes pa de nyid 'di'i khyim ste /
analyzed: khyim zhes pa la sogs pa la gang du spyod pa zhes pa de nyid 'di'i khyim ste /
translated: In the line in the house, etc., the house is that in which one acts, and it is the same as the house mentioned above.

original: nam mkha' ste nam mkha' khyim dang bral bar rang gnas so //
analyzed: nam mkha' ste nam mkha' khyim dang bral bar rang gnas so //
translated: It is space, and space is the house, since it is free of houses.

original: de nyid la ni ral bar byed pa ni mngon par dga' ba skyed par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid la ni ral bar byed pa ni mngon par dga' ba skyed par byed do //
translated: One dwells in it, that is, one takes delight in it.

original: de'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: khyim mngon par skabs yod pa la mngon par chags pas zhen pa ni 'di la med do //
analyzed: khyim mngon par skabs yod pa la mngon par chags pas zhen pa ni 'di la med do //
translated: One is not attached to it, because one is not attached to the house.

original: gang phyir mngon par skabs yod pa'i khyim 'dzin pa la khyad par du dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang phyir mngon par skabs yod pa'i khyim 'dzin pa la khyad par du dga' bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should especially delight in the house of the one who is open to experience.

original: 'di la zhes pa la sogs pas mtshan mo la sogs pa nyid bsdus par ston par byed do //
analyzed: 'di la zhes pa la sogs pas mtshan mo la sogs pa nyid bsdus par ston par byed do //
translated: He shows that the night, etc., are included in this with here, etc.

original: de la mtshan mo ni snang ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de la mtshan mo ni snang ba'i ye shes so //
translated: In this regard, night is the pristine wisdom of appearance.

original: nyin mo ni snang ba mched pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: nyin mo ni snang ba mched pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Day is the pristine wisdom of the increase of appearance.

original: thun mtshams ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
analyzed: thun mtshams ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
translated: The junction is the pristine wisdom of the attainment of appearance.

original: ye shes gsum ni bstan phyir ro zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ye shes gsum ni bstan phyir ro zhes pa ni /
translated: It is said, because the three pristine wisdoms are taught.

original: ye shes gsum po nyid kyi ma nor ba mtshan mo la sogs pa nyid kyis so sor gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes gsum po nyid kyi ma nor ba mtshan mo la sogs pa nyid kyis so sor gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because the three pristine wisdoms themselves are made clear individually by the non-erroneous night, etc.

original: gang yang ye shes gsum po nyid kyi dpe ston pa nyid kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang yang ye shes gsum po nyid kyi dpe ston pa nyid kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because the three pristine wisdoms themselves are taught by the very examples.

original: gang blun po dpe nyid kyis rnam par rig pa so sor sgrub par byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang blun po dpe nyid kyis rnam par rig pa so sor sgrub par byed pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable that the foolish should establish each awareness by means of the very examples.

original: gsungs pa yang mtshan mo snang ba'i cha ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyi'i'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa yang mtshan mo snang ba'i cha ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyi'i'o //
translated: It is said, the part of the night is appearance, etc., in general.

original: de bzhin du skye ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang ye shes gsum las ldang ba nyid du bsgrub par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du skye ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang ye shes gsum las ldang ba nyid du bsgrub par 'dod nas gsungs pa /
translated: Likewise, in order to establish that the conventions of arising, etc. are also the very emergence of the three intuitions, he says:

original: rnam pa sna tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The various, etc.

original: 'jig rten pas zhes pa ni 'jig rten tha snyad kyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyis so //üîΩdus gsum zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma @43a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten pas zhes pa ni 'jig rten tha snyad kyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyis so // dus gsum zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma @43a * //
translated: The worldly is that which follows worldly convention.

original: 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i dus gsum mo //
analyzed: 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i dus gsum mo //
translated: The three times are the past, future, and present.

original: dbye ba yis ni zla ba dang phyogs dang lo la sogs pas so //
analyzed: dbye ba yis ni zla ba dang phyogs dang lo la sogs pas so //
translated: The divisions are by the month, the fortnight, the year, etc.

original: ye shes rnam pa gsum 'byung do ni gang las yongs su brtags pa las so //üîΩskye ba la sogs pa yang bsdus pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: ye shes rnam pa gsum 'byung do ni gang las yongs su brtags pa las so // skye ba la sogs pa yang bsdus pa gsungs pa /
translated: The three intuitions emerge from that, i.e., from the imagination.üîΩHe also includes arising, etc.

original: skye dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Arising, etc.

original: gzhal du med pa nyid kyi phyir tha snyad rnams yang dag par bsdus pas bsdus pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa nyid kyi phyir tha snyad rnams yang dag par bsdus pas bsdus pa gsungs pa /
translated: He states the inclusion of the conventions by their inclusion in the three collections, because they are innumerable.

original: ji srid ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji srid ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: As long as, etc.

original: sems kyi rlung gi rnam 'phrul lo ni rlung dang ldan pa'i sems las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rlung gi rnam 'phrul lo ni rlung dang ldan pa'i sems las skyes pa'o //
translated: The year is born from the mind-wind-emanation, from the mind endowed with wind.

original: rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ba ma yin pa'i thun mongs gi bya ba la sogs pa sems tsam nyid du gsungs pa rgod dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ba ma yin pa'i thun mongs gi bya ba la sogs pa sems tsam nyid du gsungs pa rgod dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The common activities of the yogi and the non-yogi are said to be mind-only, beginning with ‚Äúthe dance.

original: sgeg pa la sogs pa gar gyi ro dgu dang ldan pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sgeg pa la sogs pa gar gyi ro dgu dang ldan pa gsungs pa /
translated: ‚Äù The nine flavors of the dance, beginning with the flirt, are taught.

original: dgu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dgu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Nine‚Äù and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor ba'i rang bzhin gyi bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba'i rang bzhin gyi bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: The natural activities of the yogi are taught.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú The seal‚Äù and so forth.

original: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams so ;
analyzed: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams so ;
translated: The seal is the great seal and so forth.

original: / sngags ni sbrul la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: / sngags ni sbrul la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The mantra is the snake and so forth.

original: de'i yul la rnam par rtog pa yang /
analyzed: de'i yul la rnam par rtog pa yang /
translated: The object of that is also conceptual.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' spyod pa'i ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ye shes gsum gyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' spyod pa'i ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir ye shes gsum gyi'o //
translated: The three wisdoms are of Vajrasattva, because of the nature of Vajrasattva.

original: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku longs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku longs su dag pa'o //
translated: This is also the pure enjoyment body of the Bhagavat.

original: rnal 'byor ba'i rgyud du gtogs pa ni yongs su dag pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba'i rgyud du gtogs pa ni yongs su dag pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The tantra that belongs to the yogi is not completely pure.

original: de'i phyir de dag pa'i rang bzhin du sgrub par byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag pa'i rang bzhin du sgrub par byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is established as having that nature.

original: rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The jewel, etc.

original: rin chen ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che ste /
analyzed: rin chen ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che ste /
translated: The jewel is the Tathagata-jewel of Vajrasattva.

original: de ma yin pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ma yin pa med pa nyid do //
translated: It is not non-existent.

original: 'di ni zhes pa ni khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa ni khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'gro ba la'o //
translated: This is in the world that has the nature of the three realms.

original: bdag byin brlab ba ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: bdag byin brlab ba ma gtogs pa //
translated: Except for the self-consecration,

original: gzhan chen po de phyir gsungs pa //
analyzed: gzhan chen po de phyir gsungs pa //
translated: the other great one is said to be

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu nyid //
translated: like the Tathagata.

original: med de slar yang mchog tu zad //
analyzed: med de slar yang mchog tu zad //
translated: It is not non-existent, but again it is supreme.

original: ces so // gal te 'ga' zhig 'od gsal ba rnam par dag pa las gzhan du ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ces so // gal te 'ga' zhig 'od gsal ba rnam par dag pa las gzhan du ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: If someone says that it is not other than the clear light that is pure, the remainder is to be said.

original: dpe gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpe gsungs pa /
translated: The example is said:

original: me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin //
analyzed: me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin //
translated: Like a jewel refined by fire.

original: zhes te / mya ngan 'das pa 'jigs chen po //
analyzed: zhes te / mya ngan 'das pa 'jigs chen po //
translated: Nirvana is a great fear.

original: thal ba de yang brjod bya min //
analyzed: thal ba de yang brjod bya min //
translated: And that ash is not the object of expression.

original: de dag de la yod pa yin //
analyzed: de dag de la yod pa yin //
translated: They exist in that.

original: dbang po'i don dag khams rnams med //
analyzed: dbang po'i don dag khams rnams med //
translated: The sense objects of the sense faculties do not exist in the elements.

original: ces gsungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ces gsungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: Has it not been taught like that?

original: de dag 'di'i dper ci ltar khong @43b du chud par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de dag 'di'i dper ci ltar khong @43b du chud par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one understand those as examples here?

original: chos kyi dbyings su stong bar yang //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su stong bar yang //
translated: The dharmadhatu is empty,

original: dri ma bsregs pas gos med ces //
analyzed: dri ma bsregs pas gos med ces //
translated: and the stains are not clung to by the fire.

original: mi gsung 'od gsal me la zhugs //üîΩlangs nas yongs su dag pa yi //
analyzed: mi gsung 'od gsal me la zhugs // langs nas yongs su dag pa yi //
translated: Without speaking, one enters the clear light fire.üîΩHaving arisen, one accomplishes here

original: bde bas 'dir ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: bde bas 'dir ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: with the completely pure bliss.

original: zhes dpe sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhes dpe sbyor ro //
translated: This is the application of the example.

original: de bzhin du me 'od gsal kyi dpe'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du me 'od gsal kyi dpe'o //
translated: Similarly, the example of the clear light fire.

original: nor bu yongs su dag pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: nor bu yongs su dag pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The completely pure jewel is the sambhogakaya.

original: 'od gsal du zhugs pa ni mer zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal du zhugs pa ni mer zhugs pa'o //
translated: Entering the clear light is entering the fire.

original: langs pa'i ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: langs pa'i ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i'o //
translated: The arising is the sambhogakaya.

original: me las byung ba'i nor bu'i mchog ste nor bu las dri ma med pa yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: me las byung ba'i nor bu'i mchog ste nor bu las dri ma med pa yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: The supreme jewel that arises from the fire is the completely pure jewel without stains.

original: de'i phyir 'od gsal du zhugs pa phung bo la sogs pa dngos po med pa bsgrub pa'i don du gal te 'di dper 'gyur na //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'od gsal du zhugs pa phung bo la sogs pa dngos po med pa bsgrub pa'i don du gal te 'di dper 'gyur na //
translated: Therefore, if this were an example for the purpose of establishing the non-existence of things such as the aggregates in the clear light,

original: de'i tshe 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then it would be contradictory.

original: dpe dang dpe can dag bdag nyid thams cad kyis mtshungs par 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi 'ba' zhig tu dbye ba lhag par gnas pa ni yod pa rnams kyis mtshungs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dpe dang dpe can dag bdag nyid thams cad kyis mtshungs par 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi 'ba' zhig tu dbye ba lhag par gnas pa ni yod pa rnams kyis mtshungs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The example and the exemplified are not the same in all respects, but only in terms of the remaining categories that are present, they should be said to be similar.

original: 'dir me dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa lngas mtshungs par sbyor ba nyid kyis rnam par mtshungs par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
analyzed: 'dir me dang mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa lngas mtshungs par sbyor ba nyid kyis rnam par mtshungs par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
translated: Here, fire and nirvana are connected as similar in five ways, and thus they are made to be similar.

original: yang 'od gsal du zhugs pa la rnam pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ci ltar thams cad dngos po med pa can gyi stong pa nyid kyi 'od gsal las ldang ba'am //
analyzed: yang 'od gsal du zhugs pa la rnam pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ci ltar thams cad dngos po med pa can gyi stong pa nyid kyi 'od gsal las ldang ba'am //
translated: Moreover, since there is no aspect in the clear light, how can one arise from the clear light of emptiness that is devoid of all things?

original: ci ltar de la dag par 'di dag brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar de la dag par 'di dag brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Or how can one say that it is pure?

original: snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la dmigs pa ni /
translated: The object of observation for the Enjoyment Body by the compassionate nature is

original: thog mar thams cad dngos bo med pa 'od gsal ba las /
analyzed: thog mar thams cad dngos bo med pa 'od gsal ba las /
translated: first of all, the non-entityness of everything, clear light.

original: rnal 'byor bas ldang bar byed do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bas ldang bar byed do //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ arises from that.

original: langs nas kyang 'grub pa'i dpes gsungs pa /
analyzed: langs nas kyang 'grub pa'i dpes gsungs pa /
translated: Having arisen, he/she is said to be like a person who has been accomplished.

original: klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa yang /
translated: NƒÅgabodhi‚Äôs commentary also says,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas stong pa nyid mngon sum du bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas stong pa nyid mngon sum du bya'o zhes so //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed with the yoga of the nature of all Buddhas, one should actualize emptiness.‚Äù

original: spyod bsdus su yang /
analyzed: spyod bsdus su yang /
translated: The Compendium of Practice also says:

original: sngon du shin tu bsgoms pa nyid la sngon gyi rnam pa can gyi 'bad pas 'di mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon du shin tu bsgoms pa nyid la sngon gyi rnam pa can gyi 'bad pas 'di mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the exertion of the previous form, this is actualized in the one who has meditated on it previously.‚Äù

original: rnal 'byor ba chung du ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba chung du ni /
translated: The lesser yogi/nƒ´

original: so sor rtogs par bshad do //
analyzed: so sor rtogs par bshad do //
translated: is explained as the one who has realization.

original: rnal 'byor ba 'bring po ni so sor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig pa'i de'i bdag nyid yongs su shes pa nyid 'od gsal du zhugs pa las ldang ba ni dag pa'o zhes so //
