analyzed: rnal 'byor ba 'bring po ni so sor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig pa'i de'i bdag nyid yongs su shes pa nyid 'od gsal du zhugs pa las ldang ba ni dag pa'o zhes so //
translated: The middling yogi/nƒ´ is the one who, having understood the nature of the clear light of the individual sa·πÉbhogakƒÅya, arises from the clear light.

original: rnam par bshad pa'i don du rang dpar yongs su sel ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa'i don du rang dpar yongs su sel ba gsungs pa /
translated: In order to explain the meaning, he states the self-elimination:

original: bzhugs pa'i @44a * //
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i @44a * //
translated: The words of abiding

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.üîΩThe words of abiding are the words of the ultimate abiding.

original: bzhugs pa'i tshig ni bzhugs pa'i mthar thug pa'i tshig gi brjod bya ni bzhugs pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i tshig ni bzhugs pa'i mthar thug pa'i tshig gi brjod bya ni bzhugs pa'i tshig go //
translated: The topic is the words of abiding.

original: 'di dag ni zhes ba brjod pa'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni zhes ba brjod pa'i rnam pas so //
translated: These are the words of expression.

original: dpal 'dus pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dpal 'dus pa zhes pa ni /
translated: The glorious GuhyasamƒÅja

original: rgyud gzhan du yang /
analyzed: rgyud gzhan du yang /
translated: is also in other tantras.

original: rnam pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i brjod par bya ba yong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i brjod par bya ba yong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the existence of topics such as this,üîΩMa√±ju≈õrƒ´,

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos so //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos so //
translated: by means of the great vajra holder,

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i rjes 'brangs nas ni 'dus pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i rjes 'brangs nas ni 'dus pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it following the explanatory tantra of the Guhyasamaja, following the Vajra-vali.

original: 'od gsal ba dang rnam par dag pa zhes ba la sogs pa brjod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba dang rnam par dag pa zhes ba la sogs pa brjod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: With reference to the statement ‚Äúluminosity, purity, etc.,‚Äù it is said:

original: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAgain,‚Äù etc.

original: 'di skad ces pa ji ltar so sor bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces pa ji ltar so sor bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus‚Äù is to be supplied.

original: bdag gis thos pa ni lhag par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: bdag gis thos pa ni lhag par rtogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúI heard‚Äù is the realization.

original: de'i rnam pas sems bskyed par gyur ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rnam pas sems bskyed par gyur ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: By that aspect, the mind was generated‚Äîthis is the meaning.

original: de nyid ni 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi 'gro ba brtan pa dang / g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can ma bcos pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi 'gro ba brtan pa dang / g-yo ba'i bdag nyid can ma bcos pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: That itself is the nature of luminosity, the essence of the unfabricated nature of the world, which is of the nature of the animate and inanimate.

original: dus gcig na ni gcig kho na dus te /
analyzed: dus gcig na ni gcig kho na dus te /
translated: ‚ÄúAt one time‚Äù means at one time only.

original: de tsam nyid kyi phyir dus rnams thams cad do //
analyzed: de tsam nyid kyi phyir dus rnams thams cad do //
translated: Because of that alone, it is ‚Äúall times.‚Äù

original: gsal ba ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba ni gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúClearly‚Äù means clearly.

original: 'di thos so zhes pa 'di sprel bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di thos so zhes pa 'di sprel bar bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúI heard‚Äù is to be supplied.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rtogs pa la bdud bzhi bo nyams pa'i phyir te ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rtogs pa la bdud bzhi bo nyams pa'i phyir te ;
translated: The Lord is Bhagawan because of the destruction of the four demons in the realization of the nature of clear light.

original: de rnams kyang de bzhin nyid gcig nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyang de bzhin nyid gcig nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: And those are also one suchness.

original: yang na bha ga de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes te de gang la yod pa de bha ga w'an no //
analyzed: yang na bha ga de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes te de gang la yod pa de bha ga w'an no //
translated: Or else, Bhaga is the exalted wisdom of suchness, and he who has that is Bhagawan.

original: dbyer med pa la yang ma tu pa ji lta ba'i ngo bor ldan no //
analyzed: dbyer med pa la yang ma tu pa ji lta ba'i ngo bor ldan no //
translated: He is endowed with the nature of the nondual.

original: rdo rje gsang ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The secret vajra is Akshobhya and so forth.

original: de rnams spro bar byed pa'i mnga' bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dbang po ste drug pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams spro bar byed pa'i mnga' bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dbang po ste drug pa'o //
translated: He is the lord of the emanation of those, and thus he is the sixth, the lord.

original: de'i rdor je gsum ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rdor je gsum ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
translated: His three vajras are the vajra body and so forth.

original: 'od gsal ba gang du de rnams yang dag par 'gro bar byed thim par byed pas mchog ste phul du byang ba'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba gang du de rnams yang dag par 'gro bar byed thim par byed pas mchog ste phul du byang ba'o //
translated: The supreme is the best, where those enter into clear light.

original: stong ba nyid kyis gnas pa la 'dir mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong ba nyid kyis gnas pa la 'dir mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not produced here in the state of emptiness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i ye shes 'di ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i ye shes 'di ni /
translated: Therefore, all the TathƒÅgatas, all the TathƒÅgatas, speak this wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: All the TathƒÅgatas are

original: de nyid kyi phyir slar yang de la 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir slar yang de la 'jug par byed do //
translated: Therefore, they enter into it again.

original: bas ma mi khyab ces pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: bas ma mi khyab ces pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: ‚Äú Inconceivable‚Äù and so forth.

original: de'i phyir 'od gsal las 'das pa gang yin pa'i yon tan ni stobs @44b bcu mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'od gsal las 'das pa gang yin pa'i yon tan ni stobs @44b bcu mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the qualities that transcend clear light, such as the ten powers, the four forms of fearlessness, and so forth, are inconceivable.

original: 'di lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'o //
translated: They are like this.

original: 'di tsam mo zhes pa bsam pa ste /
analyzed: 'di tsam mo zhes pa bsam pa ste /
translated: They are just this much.

original: de mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible to think of them.

original: de rnams phun sum tshogs pa la ni bskyed pa'i gnas la slar yang khyad par du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams phun sum tshogs pa la ni bskyed pa'i gnas la slar yang khyad par du byed pa'o //
translated: In their perfection, they are again distinguished in the basis of generation.

original: yod dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yod dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú Existence‚Äù and so forth.

original: yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug par brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug par brjod pa nyid do //
translated: It is said that they enter in accordance with the world through existence, nonexistence, and so forth.

original: de'i phyir 'dis 'das pa ni bral ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dis 'das pa ni bral ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the past is the separation from that.

original: bzhi brgya bar gsungs pa yang //
analyzed: bzhi brgya bar gsungs pa yang //
translated: And in the Catuh-≈õataka:üîΩExistence, non-existence, both existence and non-existence,

original: yod dang med dang yod med dang // gnyis ka min zhes kyang bstan te /üîΩnad kyi dbang las thams cad kyang //
analyzed: yod dang med dang yod med dang // gnyis ka min zhes kyang bstan te / nad kyi dbang las thams cad kyang //
translated: and neither is taught,üîΩand all are called medicine

original: sman zhes bya bar 'gyur min nam //
analyzed: sman zhes bya bar 'gyur min nam //
translated: according to the illness.
